chen po'i rgyal po dang / brtson 'grus chen pos rnam par gnon dang / rtsal chen dpa' ba dang / cher bsgyings dang / bsgyings pa chen po'i stobs dang / tshogs kyi dbang po chen
po dang / spos kyi bal glang glang po che chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba chen po dang / zla ba bzang dang / yon tan zla ba dang / rin chen zla ba dang /
kun tu snang ba'i zla ba dang / /chos dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / rnam par snang byed zla ba dang / rnam par bsgrags pa'i zla ba dang / 'od zer rab tu gtong ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla gang dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i dbang pos bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / sa'i sgra dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra
dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi rnga chen sgra dbyangs dang / kun tu go bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang / mi rtog rnam par mi
rtog dbyangs dang / sa steng sgra dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i dbyangs dang / kun nas snying po
dang | kun tu dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / yon tan snying po dang / rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / snang byed
snying po dang / /pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / khyad par blo gros dang / rnam grags
blo gros dang / rgyal chen blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mtha' yas blo gros dang / yangs pa'i blo gros dang / sangs rgyas blo gros dang / blo
gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / sangs rgyas mngon sum blo gros dang / ri rab
mar me dang / mar me chen po dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i mar me dang / phyogs thams cad du khyab pa'i mar me dang / kun tu mar me dang / mun pa thams cad sel ba'i mar me dang /
'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i mar me dang / gcig tu snang ba'i mar me dang / zla ba'i mar me dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i mar me dang /
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na phyag rgya rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rin chen 'od zer gzhon nur
gyur pa dang / nam mkha' mdzod gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nur gyur
pa dang / rnam par sel ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa dang / seng
ge gzhon nur gyur pa dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / zla ba'i 'od zer gzhon nur gyur pa dang / mchog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rgyan bkod pa gzhon nur
gyur pa dang / lag na pad+ma dang / lag na rdo rje dang / nyi 'od dang / nor bu dang / glog dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i
'od dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / mya ngan dang / mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul thams
cad las nges par 'byung ba'i blo gros dang / rdul med rnam par gnon dang / rnam dag rnam par gnon dang / phung po rnam par gnon dang / skye mched rnam par gnon dang /
khams rnam par gnon dang / stong pa nyid rnam par gnon dang / mtshan ma med pa rnam par gnon dang / smon pa med pa rnam par gnon dang / skye ba med pa rnam par gnon dang /
'gag pa med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'gro ba med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'ong ba med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'chi 'pho med pa rnam par gnon dang / mi skye ba rnam par
gnon dang / rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam par gnon dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / 'jig
rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par gnon dang / chos thams cad rnam par gnon dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad rnam
par gnon dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa rnam par gnon dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par gnon dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam
par gnon dang / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnon dang / mnyam pa nyid rnam par gnon dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dbyings rnam par
gnon dang / bdud yul mi gos dang / bdud las rgyal dang / bdud las rgyal chen po dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / 'od zer stong gi 'od 'phro dang / mngon par 'byung
dka' dang / rab tu thub dka' dang / rtogs dka' dang / bsnyen par dka' ba'i blo dang / ngan 'gro skem dang / bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /
ded dpon bzang po dang / mis byin dang / chu lha'i lha dang / zla ba'i lha dang / dri ma med kyis byin dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab
kyi rdul rnyed thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyis khams gzhan dang / gzhan dag nas 'dus pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can kyi khams
thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la dpyod pa dang / thabs dang / tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos la 'god pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad
kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad la dpyod pa'i tshul shes pa rab 'byams la zhugs pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa'i spyod yul
shes pa la dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang spros pa thams cad shin tu chad cing spyod pa len pa rnam par chad de sems can gyi khams thams
cad sdud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang mtha' dang / dpus med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa la shin tu mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can
thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi za ba mi dmigs par dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi
bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / dbang po dang / rtsom pa dang / sbyor ba la shin tu dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams
cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i don dang / tshig dang / yi ge gzung ba dang / blang ba shes pa
yang dag par 'dzin cing rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i chos kyi tshul la
'jug pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / dus dang / rim pa'i tshul la so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang 'das pa
dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig gcig gis de ma thag tu thob par gnas pa sha stag go/
thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad par sbyor ba dang / byang
chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po
kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems bskyed cing byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang ma bral ba sha stag go /thams
cad kyang sems can gcig gi sems kyi dmigs pa la 'jug pas sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi dmigs pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /thams cad
kyang rang byung gi ye shes kyi sa las mi bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ldan pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa thob par spyod pa las
phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs rgyun mi gcod cing mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes pa'i tshul la zhugs
pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi bya ba la bskal pa mtha' yas par spyod pa kun tu 'dzin par byin gyis rlob pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang
khyad par chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byin gyis rlob cing gdul bya'i khams 'gro ba thams cad 'dzud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gnas la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa'i stobs kyi khyad par dang / smon lam phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go/
thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sangs rgyas
'byung ba thams cad kyi thad du 'gro zhing skul ba la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu 'dzin pa la mkhas pa
sha stag go /thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par byed pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs
rgyas 'byung ba kun tu ston par byed pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa sha stag go /thams cad
kyang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod par byed pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa la zhugs pa sha stag go /
thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams ltar tshad med pa'i chos dang ldan pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go /
thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang las kyis kun nas bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin
pa la mos pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang rgyus kun bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la mos pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang rgya'i 'bur kun tu 'byung ba lta bur chos thams
cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan ltar ston pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go /thams
cad kyang chos thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par rig pa brag ca dang mtshungs pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam
gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtsen pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha'
yas pa'i mdog yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i gzungs la gnas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu
ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag tu skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang /
dka' ba spyad par sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / yongs su mya
ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang skyil mo krung gcig gis phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs par shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan zhing gcig tu ston pa la mkhas
pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang zhing gcig gi rgyan bkod pa zhing thams cad du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten
gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gang dag yin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor du ston pa la mkhas
pa sha stag go /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gang yin pa de phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du
kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang chos thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can thams
cad kyi lus rang gi lus su kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku sangs rgyas gcig gi skur zhugs par kun tu ston
pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sangs rgyas gcig gi sku sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur zhugs par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rang gi lus su chud par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi lus la dus gsum gyi sems can rnams
kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus la ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang lus gcig gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs la lus dpag tu med grangs med pa las ldang ba la mkhas pa sha stag go /lus dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la/
lus gcig las ldang bar kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyis lus snyed kyi mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas
pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus la sems can gcig gi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /sems can gcig gi lus la sems
can thams cad kyi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyis lus las sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu
ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku las sems can gyi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems can gyi
lus chos kyi skur kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing gcig tu kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /zhing
gcig gi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing thams cad du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang chos kyi sku sems can gyi lus su kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha
stag go /thams cad kyang spu'i khung bu gcig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jug par byed pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams
cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyi gnas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par kun tu ston pa la mkhas
pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na gdul bya'i sems can yongs su smin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang bskal pa bgrang ba thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i
spyad pa spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re na sgong las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs
can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / rkang mang dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa sems can gdul
bya yongs su smin pa thams cad ji lta bzhin du lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas kun tu ston pa la mkhas
pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad
med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag 'jug par byed kyang sems can la gnod pa med pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang
bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag yud tsam gcig tu byin gyis
rlob pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /yud tsam gcig bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du
med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu byin gyis rlob pa la mkhas pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang spyod lam ji lta bus sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta
de ltar lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par gzugs kyi lus kyi kha dog dang / spyod lam kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de dag dang / gzhan dag thams cad kyang yon tan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang ldan pa sha stag go /sangs rgyas kyi
zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang /
tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sha
stag dang yang thabs gcig go /'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya re re'ang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan
'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /brgya byin bye ba
phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul bye ba phrag brgya dang /
lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba phrag brgya la lha'i rgyal po re re'ang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i
phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi
lha bye ba phrag mang po dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /srin po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag bco brgyad dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad dang / lha ma
yin gyi rgyal po 'bum phrag brgyad cu dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa lnga dang / drang srong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu thams cad kyang mngon par
shes pa lnga dang ldan pa sha stag dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung dang / rnam par 'thor rlung chen po g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag dang / tshangs
pa bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs pa chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad med 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od gsal bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge
chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad med dge bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sprin med bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'bras bu che bye ba phrag brgya dang / bsod nams
skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang / gya nom snang bye ba phrag brgya dang / shin tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi gdung ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'og
min gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dag la tshangs pa chen po re re'ang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /
mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i
ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /klu'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / dri za'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang
po bye ba phrag brgya dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bye ba phrag brgyad na/ mi'am ci'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya re re'ang g.yog
'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /mi dang / mi ma yin pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod
pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
mang po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos
mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal gyi lha gang dag yin pa dag dang / lhun po dang / lhun po chen
po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / gangs ri dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po la sogs pa ri rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad gnas dang
bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba der lhags so/ /rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / chu klung dang / chu bran dang / mtsho bran dang / mtshe'u dang / chu mig dang / 'bab chu rnams kyi lha gang dag yin
pa de dag thams cad kyang gnas dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /
chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
dang | 'or rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rang gi gnas dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang /
bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
dang | mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rang rang gi gnas su zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya
ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mthus
sems can 'ga' la'ang gnod pa med cing sgrib pa med do/ /zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho bye ba phrag brgya re re'ang g.yog 'khor mang po dang
ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba der lhags so/ /klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa'ang 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang /
bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems
can thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mos pa/ theg pa chen po la gzhol ba/
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'dod pa sha stag go /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kha dog dang / gzugs dang / gzi brjid dang / 'od kyis 'khor thams
cad kyang zil gyis mnan te/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi mas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa phyung ste srin bu me khyer
thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad zil gyis
mnan te lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin gyi dra ba las grol ba ni skar ma'i tshogs thams
cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang / tshangs ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad spa bkong ste zil
gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar dpal gyis rab tu 'bar te/ sku mi g.yo/ mi 'gyur/ mi 'gul bar lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de
nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de
bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni sku mi g.yo/ mi 'gyur/ mi 'gul bar bzhugs so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
cad rnam par sel bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni
rab tu 'byung bar mngon du phyogs shing khyim nas mngon par 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni rab tu byung zhing dka' ba spyod pa la gnas par shes so/ /'khor 'di
nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi snying por gshegs par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang
nas kha cig gis ni bdud 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pas bskor ba bcom par shes so/ kha cig gis ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
dang | dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med grangs
med pa dag gis/ ded dpon chen po rgyal lo/ /rgyal lo zhes spros bar byed par shes so/ kha cig gis ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas brgya byin rnams gsol
ba 'debs par shes so/ kha cig gis ni tshangs pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams bcom
ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par shes so/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sbyin pa'i gtam ston par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig
gis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la tshul khrims kyi gtam ston par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni bzod pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis ni brtson 'grus kyi gtam/ kha cig
gis ni bsam gtan gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni shes rab kyi gtam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni thabs la mkhas pa'i gtam
kha cig gis ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni smon lam gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi gtam bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha
cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la
ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni dud 'gror skye ba'i chos rnams bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni yi dwags su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni gshin rje'i 'jig
rten du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni 'thab bral gyi gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
la ston par shes so/ kha cig gis ni dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni 'phrul dga'i gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas
su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni bdud kyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni tshangs pa'i gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston
par shes so/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang /
dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min dang / nam
mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skye ba'i chos
rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ /'jam dpal/ 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni mir skye ba'i chos rnams/ kha cig gis ni 'khor
los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i chos rnams/ kha cig gis ni gling gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum
gyi stong chen po dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i chos rnams
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ /'jam dpal/ 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dom do tsam du 'phags par
shes so/ /kha cig gis ni rgyang grags tsam du 'phags/ kha cig gis ni rgyang grags gnyis tsam du 'phags/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad tsam
du 'phags par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad gnyis tsam du 'phags par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag
tshad bcu tsam du 'phags par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad stong du shes so/ /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni dpag tshad 'bum dang / kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu par shes so/ /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku da pag tshad
'bum phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bgrang ba las 'das
par shes so/ /'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /kha cig gis ni nor
bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chen po an+d+ra rnyil gyi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu/
kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che skar 'od kyi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha
dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che nyi
zla snang ba'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che shel gyi kha dog tu
shes so/ /kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni
nor bu rin po che ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor
bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu shes so/ /'jam dpal/ 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig
gis ni de bzhin gshegs pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i kha dog tu shes so/ /'jam dpal/ kha dog dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs gang dang / gang kho nas sems
can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs de dang / de kho nar sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo / /
'jam dpal/ chos bstan pa gang dang / gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos de dang / de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ston par sems can rnams
kyis shes so/ /'jam dpal/ spyod pa gang dang / gang gis sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'dzud cing 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang / de la
de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par sems can rnams kyis shes so/ /'jam dpal/ gal te shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med/
bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma
yin pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la/ shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho dang / de
bzhin du lho nub dang / de bzhin du nub byang dang / de bzhin du byang shar dang / de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/
grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin
pa dag gis/ dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag /'jam dpal/ gal
te de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas 'dul ba yin na/ sems can de dang / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dom gang tsam na 'khod par shes so/ /'jam
dpal/ kha dog dang / spyod lam dang / gnas gang dang / gang gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang / de kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par sems
can de dag gis mthong ngo / /'jam dpal/ chos bstan pa gang dang / gang gis sems can rnams yongs su min par 'gyur pa de dang / de nyid kyi chos ston par thos so/ /'jam dpal
spyod pa gang gis sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams cad lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i dkyil 'khor nam phyed kyi
dus na dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyis so so'i mdun na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dug par shes kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni sems can de dag gis bdag ci'i
phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du shes par 'gyur bar bdag sems can de dag gi mdun na 'dug par bya'o/ /snyam du mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang / 'jam
dpal/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pas lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de lta bu'i bya ba 'di 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'khor dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa
med| gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i dbus na bzhugs na de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par
mthong mod kyi/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs pa shes par 'gyur bar sems can de dag
gis mdun du 'dug par bya'o snyam du mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs
par shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ sems can rnams kyi las tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi rnam
par smin pa'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi 'du byed tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams 'byung bar 'du byed rnams ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'du byed de
dag lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams kyi bya ba dag la 'jug go /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang /
rab tu sems can rnams kyis mthong yang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mdzad pa de lta bus de
lhun gyis grub par 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya rigs la ni ras tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal /
gal te nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya ras ser po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya kha dog ser por 'gyur/ gal te ras dmar po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin
po che bai DUR+ya kha dog dmar por 'gyur/ gal te ras sngon po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya kha dog sngon por 'gyur te/ de ltar ras kha dog ci dang / ci 'dra ba'i
steng du bzhag pa de dang / de nyid kyi kha dog kho nar 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par
mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sems can tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/
'jam dpal/ gal te sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis ni de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams mu tig gi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku mu tig gi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /'jam dpal/ gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog lta bus gdul
bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che 'od
thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong ngo //
gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal
po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog lta bus gdul
bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu
mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar
bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / /'jam dpal/ gal te sems can rnams
nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong
ngo| |gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog tu mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha
dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba'ang yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / /de
bzhin du sbyar te sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog gis gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de
dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog tu
mthong ngo / /gzugs med par skyes pa'i bar gyi gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam gang dang / gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs
dang | lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam de dang / de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher
las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med
min gyi sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam gang dang / gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam
de dang / der de bzhin gshegs pa mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag gis gser gyi kha dog mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i kha dog
tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni
ma gyur cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur
cig |sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma
gyur cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong
bar ni ma gyur cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas
rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam
par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur
cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog
tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che rgya byin thogs
pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i
kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i
kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog
tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni
ma gyur cig /sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni
ma gyur cig ces mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog go /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la'ang brjod par bya ste/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin
gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi / 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // //bam po
gnyis pa/ 'jam dpal/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang / lcags las byas pa'i yo byad rnams mi 'byung mod kyi/ 'jam dpal/ 'on kyang
nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'di snyam du bdag gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang / lcags las byas pa'i yo byad rnams 'byung bar ma
gyur cig snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de
bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba der mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas
thams cad mi 'byung / der lta bar gyur pa thams cad mi 'byung / der 'khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung / der mtshams med pa lnga po dag mi 'byung / der mi dge ba bcu'i
las kyi lam rnams mi 'byung / der rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / chos gces pa 'dor ba mi 'byung / der nyi zla'i 'od dag mi 'byung / der brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
'jig rten skyong ba dag dang lha thams cad kyi 'od dag mi 'byung / der nor bu rin po che'i 'od rnams dang / me'i 'od rnams dang / glog gi 'od rnams mi 'byung / der yud
tsam dang / yud tsam phyed dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lor bgrang ba rnams mi 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal/ gzhan dun sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de
bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni ma gtogs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis
lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che mthong ka chen po'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams
cad nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur yang nor bu rin po cha mthon ka chen po ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa'i yid la byed pa'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams
cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUR+ya byi dor legs par byas pa mgo'i rgyan nam /mgul
ba'i rgyan nam/ lag pa'i rgyan nam/ rkang pa'i rgyan yang rung ste/ gang dang / gang gis logs na rgyan du 'dug pa de dang / der rgyan du shin tu lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /nor bu
rin po che bai DUR+ya de nyid kyi mthus rgyan de dag kyang shin tu lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug kyang nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUR+ya mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun
kyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang spyod lam gyi gnas gang dang / gang gis nyan thos kyi spyod pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
'am| de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'am/ spyod pa po dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa'i spyod pa'am/ dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
rten dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srin po'i spyod pa'am/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i spyod pa'am/ spyod pa gang dang / gang la gnas pa'i spyod
pa de dang / de nyid shin tu lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi mthus spyod pa de shin tu lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger rnam par mdzes kyang
'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam
dpal/ dper na/ sa la gnas/ sa la brten nas sa bon thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams skye zhing 'phel la shin tu
rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ sa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /
'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye zhing
'phel te/ shin tu rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa
de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ sprin chen pos dzam+bu'i gling thams cad khebs par byas nas rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnam pa tha
dad pa rnams su char pa chen po rab tu bab ste/ ro gcig pa'i chu'i rgyun des rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnam pa tha dad pa rnams skye bar
byed cing gnas rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su chu de ro tha dad pa dang / kha dog tha dad par yang gnas la/ 'jam dpal/ sprin ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang
lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba tha dad pa rnams 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin gyis khyab par mdzad de/ sems can dge
ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa/ smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad cing mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa/ thams cad la chos kyi char chen po mngon
par phab ste/ 'jam dpal/ chos kyi char de'ang ro gcig pa yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa/ smon lam dang / lhag
pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad cing mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa la zhugs
pa rnams la rnam pa tha dad pa nyid kyi chos tha dad pa kho na'i char bas nus pa ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed kyang / 'jam dpal/ de
bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ sems can 'di dag la ni nyan thos kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam
par bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed pa bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni sangs
rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha'i gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag
rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te 'thab bral
rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / de bzhin du tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs chen rnams dang /
tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge
rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams
dang | shin tu mthong rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris rnams dang / 'og min rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ /bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams
kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o snyam du/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog go /sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal por skye ba'i
dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni mir skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed
par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag la ni dbang phyug tu 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o snyam du/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs
pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
mos pa ji lta ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du btang snyoms su bzhugs shing
btang snyoms la rnam par mi rtog go /'jam dpal/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas
dzam+bu'i gling gi mun pa mun nag thams cad med par 'gyur yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
par bya ba de lta bu da 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu ye shes kyi 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
grangs med pa btang bas sems can rnams kyi lta bar 'gyur ba'i mun pa thams cad med par gyur te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams su lta bar gyur pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngas sems can rnams kyi lta bar
gyur pa bsal la snyam mam/ bsal bar bya'o snyam du mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du rnam par mi rtog cing mnyam ste btang snyoms pa'o/ /'jam dpal/
dper na/ sgyu ma sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / lus tha dad pa sna tshogs ston kyang / 'jam dpal/ sgyu ma sprul pa de ni brjod du med
pa| ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ yul med pa/ dngos po med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ kun tu spyod pa
med pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing gnyen po med pa yin yang / 'jam dpal/ sgyu ma sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par
bya ba sna tshogs ston to/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems
can gyi dbang gis 'khor gyi nang na gzugs kyi sku dang / kha dog dang / sbyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas sna tshogs 'byung mod kyi/ 'jam
dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni brjod du med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ yul med pa/ dngos po med pa/ bsam gyis mi
khyab pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ kun tu spyod pa med pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs shing gnyen po med pa/ khams gsum las yang dag par
'das pa ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can gyi dbang gis mdzad pa sna tshogs dag ston to/
'jam dpal/ dper na/ nyi ma ni gcig kho na yin na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi rnams su sems can rnams kyis rnam pa mang po la mthong ste/ kha
cig gis ni de 'char bar mthong / kha cig gis ni shar zin par mthong / kha cig gis bag dros pa tsam du mthong / kha cig gis ni dros chen tsam du shes/ kha
cig gis ni nam phyed/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma mel tshe thun gcig tsam du shar bar shes/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed yol tsam du shes/ kha cig
gis ni nyi ma snur tsam du shes/ kha cig gis ni tho rangs tsam du shes te/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang gling bzhi dag tu sems can rnams kyi
gzhan dang / gzhan dag tu mthong yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba sna tshogs ston to/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can
gyi dbang gis 'khor gcig kho na'i nang nas kyang sems can kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes/ kha cig gis ni
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par shes so/ /'khor de nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni
bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das bar shes/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu lon
par shes/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan
'das kyis bstan pa snying por gyur par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa nub par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan
nas lo bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bcu
dang | nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo brgya dang / lo
stong lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya dang / lo stong lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs
su mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs
su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes so/ /'jam dpal/ 'khor 'di nyid
kyi nang nas lha dang / mi kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa lon par shes/
'jam dpal/ 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas lha dang / mi kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
du med pa lon par shes kyang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du sems can
gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i gling du rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po langs pas rtswa dang / shing
gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo ma thams cad g.yo/ rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab 'gul/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu
'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing lo ma kha cig ni shar phyogs su dma' la nub
phyogs su mtho/ kha cig ni nub phyogs su dma' la shar phyogs su mtho/ lo ma kha cig ni mtha' dma' la dbus su mtho/ /kha cig ni byang phyogs dma' la lho
phyogs su mtho'ang rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo ma rnams mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ rlung gi dkyil
'khor gyi dbang gis bya ba sna tshogs ston to/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang mi rtog /rnam
par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis rtag tu skad cig skad cig la gzugs kyi sku dang / kha dog dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / bya
ba la 'jug pa'i gnas grangs med pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ sems can rnams kyi
de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa yid la byed pa ji snyed 'byung ba de snyed kyi bskal par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i
'jig rten du skye ba'i rgyun chad cing ldog ste/ 'jam dpal/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan tshad med pa
dang ldan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la dmigs pa'i yon tan gyi mtha' yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag gis kyang rtogs par mi nus so/ /'jam
dpal/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha rnams dang / mi rnams ni ches nyung gi phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa 'dod
pa dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / /'jam
dpal/ phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa 'dod pa dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khams na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches nyung gi /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan
pas lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni/ 'jam dpal/ rang sangs rgyas kyis lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na
sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal/ rang sangs rgyas kyis lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can
ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad
tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab
pa la gnas pas lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas
lha'i sbyan gyis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag gzigs pa ni chos grangs med do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can re re'i sems dang / sems las byung ba'i
chos byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag gzigs pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du'ang bgrang ba'am/ bsam pa'am/ grangs su bya bar sla ba ma yin te/ 'jam dpal/ sems can 'das
pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag gis sems dang sems las byung ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyis lhun gyis grub par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems
can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las 'byung ba rnams rgyu gang dang / dmigs pa gang dang / rkyen gang gis ji ltar byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur
ba dang / sems can de dag gi spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas gang dag byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur
ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal/ sems can de dag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dul ba'ang lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par mi
rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal/ sems can re re'i ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas
mang ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/ /'jam
dpal/ rgyu gang dang / dmigs pa gang dang / rkyen gang gis nyon mongs pa de dag ji ltar 'byung ba dang / thabs kyi shes pa gang gis sems can de dag gis nyon mongs
pa ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar
na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis dzam+bu'i gling du gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / 'od rab 'bring tha mar snang yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'bri ba dang / 'phel
ba'ang med de/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas nyi ma bgrang ba dang / yud tsam dang / yud tsam phyed kyi grangs brtsi bar bya ba de lta bu de 'ang 'byung
la| 'jam dpal/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam
dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du
bsam pa rab 'bring tha mas sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / 'od rab 'bring tha mar mthong yang / 'jam
dpal| sems can gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs ci 'dra ba yin pa de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa
mthong ste/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni rab 'bring tha ma med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos kyi sku ste/ shin tu ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gags pa yin na/ 'jam dpal/ 'on kyang sems can rnams
kyi bsam pa rab 'bring tha mas de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'bring tha mar mthong yang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on
kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang /
gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang /
mi ma yin pa rnams dang / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol ba dang / gang dag bshos mi gsol
ba dang / gang dag mthong ba dang / gang dag mi mthong ba dang / gang dag stong pa dang / gang dag mi stong pa dang / gang dag gshe ba dang / gang dag mi gshe ba dang / gang
dag reg pa dang / gang dag mi reg pa de dag thams cad kyi bya ba de lta bu rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper
na| gang dag gis nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / spyod yul du gnas pa de dag thams cad ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur
yang nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog go /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha na ri mor bris pa dang / gzugs
su byas pa mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / de'i spyod yul yang shes pa de dag thams cad ni gzugs dang / kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'grub pa thob par 'gyur yang
de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog go /rnam par mi rtog /'jam dpal/ dper na rtsi'i rgyal po legs par mthong zhes bya ba sems can gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/
dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag gis mthong ba de dag gi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang
dag gis rna bas de rlung gis bskyed pa'i sgra thos pa de dag gis rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung
gang dag gis dri tshor ba de dag gi sna rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'ang
rung | gang dag gi lces de'i ro myong ba de dag gi lce'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag
lus kyis reg pa de dag gi lus rnam par dag par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ rtsi'i rgyal po legs par mthong ba ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun
gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag
gis de bzhin gshegs pa than ri mor bris pa dang / gzugs su byas pa mthong ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba des mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas
su song ba'ang rung ste/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag gis de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/ de bzhin
gshegs pa zhes bya ba'am/ 'jig rten mgon po zhes bya ba'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i sgra thos pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag
par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag gis de'i yon tan gyi dri tshor ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des sna rnam
par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag gis de'i chos kyi ro myong ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des lce rnam
par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'ang rung / gang dag gis lus kyi reg pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des lus rnam par
dag par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dper na/ rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba zhes bya bas bskus pa'i rnga sgra sems can zug rdus zug pa dang bcas pa/ dug dang
bcas pa gang dag gis thos pa de dag gis zug rdu thams cad 'byung zhing dug kyang mi gdug par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba ni mi rtog /rnam par
mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang dang / rgyu rkyen tshogs pas lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba'i bya ba
de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa'i zug
rdu dag 'byung zhing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dug kyang mi gdug par 'gyur yang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi
rtog ste/ 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres
ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches nyung gi /bcom ldan
'das shAkya thub pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams re rer
yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches nyung gi /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyun mi gcod par lhun gyis grub cing rnam
par mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
yongs su smin par mdzad zin pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur ba dag ni ches mang ste/ 'jam dpal/ de ltar de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis 'bri ba dang / skye ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyur bar yang snang la/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba dang / mi snang ba dang / skye ba
med de/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nyi ma'i grangs dang / yud tsam dang / yud tsam phyed dang / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba dang /
lo bgrang ba'i grangs bzhag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sa bya ba de lta bu dag 'byung yang / 'jam dpal/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba'am/
'phel ba'am/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba med de/ 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / nyi ma'i dbang gis lhun
gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa
yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gzud pa'i
phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'grib pa dang nub par kun tu ston te/ 'jam dpal/ sems can gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i
chos nub pa dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal sems can gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / 'jam dpal/ dper na/ nam mkha' la gnas/ nam mkha' la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba sna tshogs dag 'byung yang
nam mkha' ni ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ 'dus ma byas pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ brjod du med pa/ brjod par bya ba ma yin nam/ gnyis su med pa/ gnyen
po med pa ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba sna tshogs dag 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad
'byung yang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi skye mi 'gags te/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ brjod
du med pa/ brjod par bya ba ma yin pa/ gnyis su med pa/ gnyen po med pa ste/ 'on kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs
kyis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can rnams la de'i chos kyi mdzad pa sna tshogs dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i yid la bya ba gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdul
re re la sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur bar byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni tshangs pa thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs
med pa dag ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob
par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni 'thab bral gyi lha'i
gnas su skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med
bdag ni rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lha'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs
med pa dag ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems
can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni klu'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thob par byed/ sems can
dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni dri za'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu
med grangs med pa dag ni mi'am ci'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu
med grangs med pa dag ni mi'i rgyal po thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni mir skye ba thob par byed/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
ni rigs chen por skye ba thob par byed na thal mo sbyor ba lta ci smos/ bdug pa phul ba lta ci smos/ de bzhin du mar me phul ba lta ci smos/ spos phul ba lta ci smos/ me tog
phul ba lta ci smos/ mchod pa rnam pa mang po gzhan phul ba lta ci smos/ tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang nyan pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa lta ci smos/ dam pa'i chos
rnam pa mang po yongs su 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de bas chos grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa'
bskal pa'am/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba
thob pa ni sla yi/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas/ chos dang / dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /'jam
dpal/ de las sangs rgyas mi mnyes par byed pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mi mnyes par byed pa ni tha na bdag gi chung ma la mi tshangs par spyod pa las byung ba'i
tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par zhe sdang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
la khyad du gsod pa dang / chos spong ba dang / chos 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la gus par mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur mi
byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'dor ba dang / bla ma dang / sbyin pa'i gnas dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze yang
dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa la gus par mi byed pa dang / chos smra ba/ chos khyad par can rtogs pa/ chos rgya chen po ston pa theg pa chen po la
yang dag par gnas pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bya ba shes pa/ gzungs dang / mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa rnams la mi 'dud cing brjid byed pa dang / khengs
pa yin/ chos dang / chos smra ba la mi gus pa skyed pa dang / sri zhu dang / rim gro mi byed pa dang / chos rgya mtsho chen po bsgrags pa byung na la la zhig dad par gyur na mi rung
ngo snyam nas chos smra gang zag la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mi byed pa dang / bdag shes pa la mi 'jug pa dang / chos la nges par sems pa mi skyed pa dang / mngon
pa'i nga rgyal bskyed de bsngags par 'os pa'i gang zag rnams kyi bsngags pa bcabs shing mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / pha rol gyi yon tan dang / bsngags pa la mi
dga' ba yin/ gang zag la zhe sdang bas chos la zhe sdang bar byed cing chos spong ba dang / gzhan dag kyang rtsod du 'jug pa dang / stan mthon po 'dod cing
thabs tshol ba dang / gzhan las rim gror bya ba bdag gis byed cing mngon par dga' ba dang / gnas brtan rgan zhing yun ring du tshangs par spyad pa rnams la
rim gro mi byed cing bsu bar mi byed la bzhin khro gnyer can yin/ rtag tu sems rtsub cing klan ka tshol ba dang / glags lta ba dang / nga rgyal bskyed nas mkhas pa'i
gan du mi 'gro /mi ste na/ snyen par mi byed/ bkur sti mi byed cing dag ba ni gang / mi dge ba ni gang / bya ba ni gang / mi bya ba ni gang / bya ba ma yin pa ni gang / ci zhig
byas na yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur zhes mi 'dri ba dang / nges par 'byung bar mi lta zhing rtsod pa mang ba yin te/ 'jam dpal/
de ltar na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mi mnyes par byed pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
ni dbang skur bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ rgya mtsho dam pa'i snying po dri ma med par snang ba 'od gsal ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/
dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu sems can dmyal
ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rnams tshe 'di la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ klad pa tsha bas sam /
rims tsha bas sam/ rtsi ba logs na bas sam/ rgyal srid 'khrugs pas sam/ kla klo 'khrugs pas sam/ mu ge'i 'khrugs pas sam/ lus la gnod pa dang /
yid la gnod pa gang yang rung bas brgyad bkag pas kyang tshe gcig la byang bar 'gyur te/ tha na rmi lam tsam gyis kyang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang /
mchod pa las byung ba dang / de dag gi thad nas bslab pa bzung ba las byung ba rnams snga dro gcig gis zil gyis gnon te/ de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur
bya ba ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gter bcu rnyed par 'gyur te/ bcu
gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bgrang bar sbyor pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'i gter dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzungs snang ba'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu ston pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas
kyi chos thams cad la brjod du med pa'i tshul la mkhas pa rtogs par byed pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul thams cad mngon
sum du mthong ba'i gter dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral
ba'i gter dang / sgyu mar gyur pa'i bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'grub par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang / sangs rgyas dang /
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dang ba chen po 'thob pa'i gter ro/ /'jam dpal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs
su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu
byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir tshe la dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la nges par sems pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir sems la dbang ba dang /
