dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa pad+ma la bzhugs pa dag kun tu snang bar gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu gshegs te sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na chos ston par kun tu snang zhing / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus
chos ston pa de dag la 'dir kun tu grag go /de nas bu mo zla mchog gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid
bde ba skyes nas des lag pa g.yas pa na thogs par gyur pa'i pad+ma gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de me tog gi khang pa
brtsegs pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug
par gyur to/ khang pa brtsegs pa der yang khri gdan rkang pa rin po ches spras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu 'bum phrag du ma bting ba zhig byung bar gyur
to/ khri gdan de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shA kya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig bzhugs par yang kun tu snang ngo / /des pad+ma
de 'phangs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa de la gnas
pa'i sems can rnams la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma gnyis pa zhig
byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs
pa gnyis pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / des tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jigs tshogs la lta ba dang 'brel ba'i sems
can rnams la 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma gsum pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des
de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di
skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
gti mug spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bzhi pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bzhi pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad
ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis phyin ci log bzhi spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi
mthus de'i lag par pad+ma lnga pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan
'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa lnga pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sgrib pa lnga dang
ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sgrib pa lnga spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma drug pa
zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs
pa drug pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis skye mched drug la brten pa'i sems can rnams la skye
mched drug yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bdun pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bdun pa zhig tu gyur pa dang /
tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par
shes pa gnas pa bdun yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma brgyad pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang /
des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad pa zhig tu gyur pa
dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis log pa nyid brgyad la nges pa'i sems can rnams la log pa nyid brgyad nges par spang
ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma dgu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs
so| |'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dgu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu spang ba'i slad du chos ston
par gyur cig /yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bcu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ /'phangs ma
thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bcu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar da ltar bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur snang bas khyab par mdzad pa ltar stobs bcu dang ldan
pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig /de nas pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gong nas gong du brtsegs pa'i 'phang gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug par gyur to/ /de'i tshe
nas bla ba'i lha yan chad nas tshangs ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams la pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gis yang dag par bskul nas lha'i bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa dag 'dus
par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar
po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas
tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ 'od kyis nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od zil gyis mnan nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub
po| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba
de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa'i don yongs su zhus pa/ mkhyen pa kun la mngon sum spyan
mnga' zhing / /chos rnams kun la nem nur rnam par brgal/ /'jig rten kun dang mi mnyam mthu mnga' ba/ /rgyal dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ /khyod kyis mtha'
yas dus na sbyin pa byin/ /khyed khrims rnam dag nor bu rin chen 'dra/ /khyod kyi bzod pa'ang mi g.yo lhun po bzhin/ /drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/ /bsam
gtan brnyes shing brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa/ /gnod bral na dang rga las rnam par grol/ /rgya mtsho 'dra bar shin tu zab pa'i blo/ /thub chen ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu
mdzad/ /byams la gnas shing thugs rjer gnas pa po/ /thub pa btang snyoms dang ni dga' la gnas/ /'dod chags la sogs 'jigs bsal rab tu zhi/ /thub dbang ci
slad 'dzum par rab tu mdzad/ /khyod sgra gcig nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' yas khams rnams su/ /nyi zla myur du mog mog rab mdzad de/ /
gzi brjid zil gyis gnon cing mig kyang stsol/ /'gro ba'i mgon cig khyod gsung rnam par dag /snyan cing yid 'ong yan lag drug cu
ldan/ /gang dag mnyan pa de dag mi ngoms shing / /nyon mongs thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed/ /phyogs bcu mtha' yas sems can gang mchis pa'i/ /sems kyi
spyod pa du ma gang lags pa/ /de mkhyen de dag som nyi gcod pa po/ /rab byung ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ /deng su'i sems ni byang chub slad du nges/ /su zhig
sangs rgyas theg pa yangs par zhugs/ /khyab bdag gang gi yid bsams rab tu grub/ /thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ /gang gis de ring bdud bzhi pham bgyis
shing / /nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi ba dag bdud chen dang / /gang gis phung po lha bu mang po'i bdud/ /pham par bgyis sam ci slad khyod 'dzum mdzad/ /de ring su zhig
don chen yangs 'gyur zhing / /su zhig chos la legs bgyid mi'i seng+ge/ /de ring su yi sgra ni phyogs rnams mchi/ /thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ /kun mkhyen
mi dge thams cad rab spangs pa/ /sems can kun la mtshungs par byams pa po/ /g.yo ba kun dang log pa rnams spangs pa/ /drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/ /de
ring su zhig yangs pa chen po thob/ /deng su'i sems kyi smon pa legs 'grub cing / /deng su'i stobs bcu rnams dang ldan par 'gyur/ /dgra thul ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ /
mkha' la gnas pa lha klu bye ba dang / /gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye cher bcas dang / /sa la thal sbyar skyes pa bud med rnams/ /dga' zhing lha mi dbang po zla ba lta/ /rdzogs pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' mang po ni/ /dam chos 'tshal ba rgya mtsho lta bu dag /phyogs bcu dag nas lhags nas dgra thul ba/ /yongs dag thugs mnga' 'dzum don bshad du gsol//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang gi rgyal ba'i cho 'phrul mchog mthong nas/ /byang chub phyir ni rgya chen
sems bskyed cing / /nga yi mdun na thal sbyar gang 'dug pa/ /mdun gyi bu mo mthong ngam kun dga' bo/ /'dis ni sngon gyi srid par rtag tu yang / /rgyal ba sum brgya legs par
mchod byas shing / /ji ltar bdag ni byang chub mchog rig ces/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la mngon sum zhus/ /nam yang lan 'ga' ngan 'gror ma song zhing / /'di ni rtag tu lha mi'i
'jig rten skyes/ /nam yang byang chub sems ni ma brjed cing / /'chi dus byas kyang rtag tu tshe rabs dran/ /rgyal ba 'od srung zhes bya mthong nas ni/ /khang bzang steng nas mdzes
pa'i lus mchongs te/ /rgya chen sems kyis 'od srung de mchod nas/ /de nas rjes mthun bzod pa thob par gyur/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig ces
mtshan gsol pa/ /de la na bza' dam pa phrugs phul bas/ /de phyir 'di yi lus mdog gser 'dra la/ /mdzes shing dge la zla ba 'dra ba yin/ /ston pa gser thub ces
bya gang yin pa/ /de la bdug pa spos mchog phul bas na/ /de phyir 'di yi kha dang spu khung nas/ /ut+pal tsan+dan dri ngad rab tu 'byung / /gtsug tor zhes bya rkang gnyis mchog
de la/ /'dis ni mtshan bdun nges par brtags gyur pas/ /de phyir 'di yi mig mdog mthon mthing la/ /'gro ba rtog par byed pa ngoms mi 'gyur/ /tshe rabs lnga brgya dag
tu 'dod spangs shing / /tshangs spyod rnam par spyod pa dag byas nas/ /de phyir chags pas gdungs pas de mthong na/ /de tshe 'dod chags can dag chags bral 'gyur/ /sum cu
rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dir 'phos te/ /'dir li tsa bI khyim ni yangs par skyes/ /skye ba kun tu tshe rabs dran 'gyur zhing / /tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis smra ba'i bya ba shes/ /pha
ma yongs su smin par bya ba dang / /de bzhin sems can gzhan don byed 'dod cing / /la la byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed phyir/ /de phyir yangs pa'i khyim 'dir rab tu skyes/ /
bud med skyes pa nye du mdza' bshes dang / /gzhon nu gzhon nu ma dag gdul ba'i phyir/ /de dag stong phrag drug cu 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas theg pa mchog la yongs smin byas/ /
'di ni ring po mi thogs bud med kyi/ /lus bsgyur nga yi bstan la rab 'byung zhing / /tshangs spyod dam pa rgya chen spyad byas nas/ /shi 'phos lha yi 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur/ /lha
gnas de nas shi 'phos phyir yang ni/ /dus mtha'i tshe na chos 'di srung 'gyur zhing / /'dir yang skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni/ /'di nas phyir yang dga' ldan 'gro bar 'gyur//
gang tshe mi pham dgra las rgyal ba po/ /dung gi sras su gyur te 'byung ba'i tshe/ /de ni bzo don sgyu rtsal bya ba kun/ /shes shing mdzes la yon tan kun ldan 'gyur/ /srog chags pa rgya
phrag du mas mdun bdar cing / /zla ba gsum du rgyal ba mchod byas nas/ /de ni srog chags drug stong sum brgya dang / /lhan cig khyim gyis gnas nas 'byung 'gyur zhing / /rgyal
ba mi pham bzhugs dang 'das pa yi/ /chos kyi tshul yang kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i dpa' bo de nas shi 'phos nas/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams su 'gro /blo ldan
des ni 'od dpag med pa dang / /gzhan yang phyogs bcu mtha' yas bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bye mang gang+gA klung gi ni/ /bye snyed mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ /ting
'dzin mngon shes brtson 'grus stobs thob cing / /bskal pa bzang la gang dag phyis 'byung ba'i/ /rang 'byung 'jig rten rnams la phan brtson
na| |'jig rten mgon de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed/ /bye mang bskal pa de dag mchod byas te/ /sems can bye mang yongs su smin byas shing / /bskal pa bye ba stong
phrag brgyad cu na/ /rgyal ba zla ba mchog ces bya bar 'gyur/ /zla mchog rkang gnyis gtso bo mdzod spu nas/ /'od zer gser mdog shin tu yid 'ong ba/ /gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur
ba de dag gis/ /'jig rten khams de kun tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir 'od kyis 'jig rten de khyab pas/ /nyi zla med dang nor bu'i 'od rnams ni/ /snang bar mi 'gyur rgyu skar
tshogs min zhing / /nyin dang mtshan yang bgrang du yod ma yin/ /de tshe rang sangs rgyas dag yod min zhing / /nyan thos rnams med mu stegs can tshogs med/ /mnyam med de
yi dge 'dun rnam dag cing / /bud med rnam par spangs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mi rnams thams cad gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing / /bsod nams brgya yi mtshan can blta na sdug
mngal na mi gnas 'dod pa mi bsten cing / /pad+ma'i nang nas rdzus te skye zhing 'byung / /rgyal sras rnams kyi tshogs 'byung gang yin pa/ /de ni bgrang bas rtogs par mi nus shing /
thams cad mngon shes thob pa dal spyod dang / /mi skye bzod cing mnyam med chags pa med/ /de na bud med dmigs can yod min zhing / /bslab pa 'dral med phyogs 'dzin
yod ma yin/ /'jig rten khams de dag cing dga' ldan gyi/ /nye bar spyod pa'i rnam pa 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gser dngul mu tig dam pa'i dri mchog gis/ /spras shing gtsang la dri med
yangs pa yin/ /rgyal ba de yi sku tshe lo grangs ni/ /stong phrag bye ba bdun cu gsum du 'gyur/ /ston pa de ni zhi bar gshegs gyur nas/ /de tshe dam chos bskal pa gcig gnas
shing / /bzhugs bzhin mya ngan 'das na'ang de yi ni/ /dam chos mdzod la nyams par 'gyur ba med/ /gal te rgyal ba dang ni zhing de yi/ /phun sum tshogs pa bskal par brjod
byas kyang / /rgya mtsho dag las chu thigs gcig bzhin du/ /dpe yang brjod par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid mngon
sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags ma thag
tu bu mo de bud med kyi lus sgyur cing skyes pa'i lus mngon par grub par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten du sa chen po'ang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu bab/
lha dang / mi'i sil snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sgra 'khrol bar gyur to/ /'jig rten kun tu snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis bar snang de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ ri rab g.yo zhing nam mkha'
sar ltung ba/ /lha gnas skad cig tsam la 'jig 'gyur zhing / /rgya mtsho mi g.yo dgung zla lhung yang gda'/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sho be'i tshig mi gsung / /phyogs bcu'i
sems can lus rnams gcig 'gyur zhing / /zhugs ni chab gyur chab ni zhugs gyur gda'/ /mnyam med thub dbang yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /'gro la phan bzhed log
pa'i tshig mi gsung / /bar snang dogs kun tu 'dzin gyur zhing / /yungs 'bru'i nang du zhing brgya chud 'gyur la/ /gser ma zhags pas gzung bar rdo thogs gda'/ /rgyal ba
log pa'i tshig ni gsung mi 'gyur/ /de 'drar yang dag de bzhin nyid gsung ba'i/ /rgyal ba des bdag byang chub nges bstan cing / /gang phyir dogs kun tu rab g.yos pas/ /
byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur gor ma bkum/ /sangs rgyas theg mchog bdag lung bstan pas na/ /rang 'byung gis ni ji skad gsungs de dang / /sngon chad bskal brgyar bdag
gis gang btsal ba/ /de ltar bdag gis chos mchog 'khor lo bskor/ /lha mi lha min gnod sbyin dge slong dang / /dge bsnyen rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dag /thams
cad mnyam med mthu stobs ldan pa yi/ /bde gshegs 'gyur gyi som nyi ma byed cig /chos 'di thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis longs spyod rmi 'dra zhing / /
bdag med gso ba shed bu 'ga' yang med/ /sems can srog med gang zag med par gsungs/ /gzod nas ngo bo nyid kyis chos rnams kun/ /rang bzhin dag cing ngo bo nyid
med pas/ /bdag sngon bud med rang bzhin gyur pa gang / /de ni dngos med gsog stong ya ma brla/ /phyi ma'i dngos de'ang stong zhing skad cig ste/ /dngos med mi g.yo gsog
dang ya ma brla/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog pa bral gyur cing / /rtog 'gyur de yang mkha' la bya rjes bzhin/ /gang zhig mnyam med byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing / /thul dka' bdud
kyang rab tu gzhom pa dang / /stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams su ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam ba skor 'dod pa/ /des ni brtan par byang chub sems bskyed la/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa rab tu mchod bgyis dang / /des ni myur du yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /ston pa rgyal ba sdig med lam rtogs 'gyur/ /skyes bu rtsal 'phags gsung snyan mthar
byon pa/ /rgyal ba mi mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' mdzad rab dga'i dngos po stsol mdzad pa/ /thub pa chos dbyig 'byung gnas
dbang phyug bstod/ /bde ba'i 'byung gnas bde kun rab stsol ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi tsher ma dkrugs/ /bstod 'os rnams kyis bstod pa gang zag mchog /
rang 'byung dbang ldan sred bral bstod par bgyi/ /bdag gis phyogs bcu bltas na de dag tu/ /sdig med sangs rgyas brgya phrag bsam yas mthong / /shAkya seng+ge ji lta
de lta bur/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag bdag lung ston/ /rgyal ba thams cad chos nyid sangs rgyas gcig /de bzhin chos kyang de bzhin nyid kyis gcig /sems
can rnams kyang yang dag mthar nges pa/ /gang la bzod 'di mchis pa rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras
nas bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la rab tu gtugs so/ /des rab tu gtugs ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang snang
bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
de dag mngon sum du mthong zhing bdag nyid lung bstan pa'ang thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu dbyung bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ khye'u de'i phyir pha ma dag gnang bar byed du chug cig /de nas khye'u de'i pha ma dag gis cho 'phrul chen po de mthong zhing de mngon sum du lung bstan pa'ang
thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis khye'u 'di rab tu 'byung bar gnang lags so/ /bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag slad kyis thob par
bgyi lags so zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de rab tu phyung ngo / /de nas khye'u de rab tu byung ba dang / srog chags khris kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang / mi khrag khrig phrag bdun chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
rnam par dag go /dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /sngon byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i dge slong ma nyis brgya dang /
srog chags nyi khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad
dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
par bstod do/ /'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhus chen
gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya k+She ma ba tI byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/'phags
pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos
pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong nyi khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal
la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang /
sham thabs gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod
snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar chags kyis bsod snyoms rgyu zhing rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i pho brang ga la ba der
gshegs so/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma zhes bya ba khang bzang mchog gi steng na 'dug pas bcom ldan 'das thag ring po nas gshegs
pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sems dga' bar gyur te/ khang bzang gi steng nas babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
pa'i gdan dar dkar rin che ba bting ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de
nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i zhabs la
mgo bos phyag btsal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir zhes dang bcas/ gus pa dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa la gzigs nas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir mkhyen bzhin
du rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la bka' stsal pa/ bde ldan ma/ gang lus la thogs pa'i 'bras bu 'di lta bu shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lha nger 'dug pa'i shing de'i ming
ci zhes bya/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang gi 'bras bu khyod thogs pa//
shing de'i ming ni ci yin zhes/ /dpa' bo chen po mkhyen bzhin du/ /gang zag mchog gis smras pa ni/ /bdag gis sngon ni gang bskyed pa/ /bsod nams las byung
shing zhes bgyi/ /'dren pa bdag gis myong ba yi/ /'bras bu de dag de yi lags/ /ljon shing bshad pa de nyid kyang / /sangs rgyas nyan thos rnams la yod/ /sangs
rgyas ye shes 'thob 'dod rnams/ /byang chub phyir ni de la gnas/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims chab stsal bas/ /ljon shing de ni rnam par bsrung / /de ni rnam par 'khrungs
pa na/ /'bras bu bzang po rnams kyang 'byung / /bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus mthus/ /ljon shing bdag gis legs par bsrungs/ /de ni rnam par 'khrungs pa na/ /
'bras bu dri med 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shing 'di blta na mdzes pa ste/ /bsam gtan shes rab me tog rgyas/ /'dren pa bdag gis de dag gi /'bras bu rnams ni myong ba
lags/ /ji ltar ri la brten pa yi/ /shing rnams yal ga lo ma dag /chu zheng gab par rgya che ba/ /'phel bar gyur te bskyod mi nus/ /de bzhin ljon shing che bzang 'di/ /sangs
rgyas chos nyid 'tshal bas na/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sngon ni legs par bsrungs pa lags/ /'dren pa bsod nams ljon shing 'di'i/ /'bras bu gzhan
yang mchis lags te/ /bdag gis nyams su myong ba 'di/ /de yi me tog tsam du bas/ /de yi 'bras bu byang chub mchog /sangs rgyas byang chub bla med lags/ /de ni bdag
gis thob par 'gyur/ /smad pa bud med nyid spangs nas/ /skyes par bdag nyid 'gyur ba lags/ /sems can kun gyi dam pa mchog /chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin//
thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ /sdug bsngal kun gyi nyen pa yi/ /sems can rnams ni bdag gis dgrol/ /'jig rten kun la snying brtse ba'i/ /skyabs su
bdag ni 'gyur ba lags/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la bka' stsal pa/ bde ldan
ma| gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi don dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams
la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang /
snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po 'di rnams ci las grub lags/ de bzhin du gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis
pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams ci las grub lags/ de skad ces
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod pas na/ /sems can kun
la phan pa'i phyir/ /ngas kyang 'di ltar ljon pa'i shing / /sngon ni legs pa kho nar bskyed/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /de bzhin brtson 'grus bsam gtan
bsags/ /yun ring dus nas ting 'dzin dang / /shes rab nges par bsten pa yin/ /sems can rnams la mi mnyam sems/ /ngas ni bsgoms par mi dran te/ /rtag
tu sems ni mnyam gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni ngas brnyes so/ /nga yi sems ni mnyam pa yi/ /rtag tu sdug dang mi sdug dang / /mdza' dang mi mdza' snyoms pas
na| |bsod nams shing ni rnam par bskyed/ /des na ljon shing chen po 'di/ /yon tan mang por gyur pa yin/ /'khor los bsgyur nyid ngas thob ste/ /brgya byin nyid kyang
byas pa yin/ /rnam mang dbang phyug chen po dang / /tshangs pa nyid kyang de las thob/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas chos/ /chos nyid dag kyang ngas rtogs so/ /de nas
rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rnams thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par rab tu gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes
su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /ji ltar mi mchog dam pa po/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas/ /
sngon ni spyod pa shin tu bslabs/ /de ltar bdag kyang rjes su slob/ /yon tan mthar phyin khyod kyi ni/ /yon tan rnams ltar bdag slob ste/ /srid par sdug bsngal spangs
nas ni/ /bdag kyang 'di 'drar 'gyur bar bgyi/ /tshe rabs gzhan ni ma lus par/ /bdag gis sbyin pa gang stsal pa/ /mnyam med ye shes mthong slad du/ /de dag thams
cad yongs su bsngo/ /srid pa 'di'am gzhan dag tu/ /bdag gis tshul khrims gang bsrungs pa/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'thob slad du/ /de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo//
bzod dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin dang / /shes rab dge ba gang bsten pa/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyi phyir/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis bsngo/ /lus dang ngag dang yid
rnams kyis/ /las dge ba gang bdag gis bsags/ /sangs rgyas ye shes yon tan phyir/ /byang chub tu ni bdag gis bsngo/ /bud med lus 'di spangs nas ni/ /skyes pa
mchog tu bdag gyur cig /de ltar skyes pa'i lus thob nas/ /dam pa'i mchog tu bdag gyur cig /de ltar gyur nas bde gshegs kyi/ /'khor lo bla med bskor bar bgyi//
'khor ba'i btson rar bcings pa yi/ /sems can bye ba dgrol bar bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la tshigs su bcad pa dag
gis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ tshig 'di smras pa legs pa yin/ /sems ni rab tu sdom pa legs/ /khyod kyis bdud ni legs par mnan/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas su
khyod 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems
dpa' byams pa bza' ba dang / bca' ba mang pos tshim par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bstsang sder ni gyu/ phyag ni bcabs nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la chos
kyi gtam rgyas par yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ /yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas lung bstan te/ bde
ldan ma/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa du ma zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das yon tan rin chen dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mchog tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par
ltung ba'i sdug bsngal med pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ yid dang 'thad pa/ mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas yin te/ khyod
kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na dge bsnyen ma stong phrag mang po zhig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / lha dang / mi'i skye dgu rnams kyis ni chos kyi snang ba thob par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma dang / 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya shrI ya mahA de bI byA ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo chen po dpal lung bstan pa/ 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mang po 'di
lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig pa thams cad sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po dga' byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang / 'jig rten gsum 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa
dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po dang / thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /lha mo chen mo dpal yang
bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la'ang mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
brgya stong du mas brgyan cing de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod
cing bsngags pas lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas/ tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /rgyal po'am/ blon po'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
ma'am/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i
bstod pa 'chad na/ rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom
rkun dang / g.yon can dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel
bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du'ang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshig 'di legs par bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang /
thos nas nyams su len pa gang lags pa de dag gi yon tan dang / phan yon ni de dag tu 'gyur lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
de| spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me
tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUR+ya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan
dag la'ang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel
ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal gyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba
dang / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba
gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dul
zhing 'gugs par byed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug
rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUR+ya dang / gser gyi
ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad kyi bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa tsan+dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtsho snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su brjod pa mtshan gsol
dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mdog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs dpal la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi me tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs
kyi go cha ri rab kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma'i 'od bzang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron
ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog
gi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang / 'bru thams
cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i
dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo de la bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung bstan to//
lha mo chen mo dpal/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang lha'i rin po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /
'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang
rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de la ming brgya rtsa
brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa brgyad cu gnyis pa gang zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams
nyon cig /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ lha thams
cad kyi ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal/
tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ gnas thams cad na yod pa'i dpal/ lha dang / klu
dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags 'chang dang / lag na rdo rje
dang / rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyi dpal/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i dpal/ gza' brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpal lo/ /oM nyi ma'i bu mo/ ma ma yum/ rig
byed bzhi'i dpal/ bkra shis ma/ sems can rnams kyi ma/ rgyal ma/ rnam rgyal ma/ gang+gA ma/ mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad kyi bkra shis ma/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma med par
byed pa'i dpal/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/ rgyags pa med pa/ zla ba'i dpal/ nyi ma'i dpal/ zla thams cad kyi dpal/ seng+ge la zhon ma/ pad+ma'i mchog 'bum gyis
bkab ma/ pad+ma pad+ma la gnas pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa/ pad+ma las byung ma/ pad+ma dang ldan pa/ 'od zer 'bar ba du mas 'khor ba/ nor sbyin ma/
dkar mo/ dkar mo chen mo/ lag dkar ma/ bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po thams cad kyi lus can/ shes nyen can gyi bu mo/ lag pa 'bum
dang ldan ma/ mig 'bum dang ldan ma/ mgo 'bum dang ldan ma/ nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i cod pan thogs pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ gzugs
sna tshogs can/ rab grags ma/ shin tu grags ma/ zhi pa ma/ sprin ma/ sgra gtsang ma/ zla ba ltar mdzes ma/ nyi ma ltar mdzes ma/ dge ma/ dge byed ma/ sems can
thams cad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal/ 'phags ma/ me tog la gnas ma/ me tog gi dbang phyug ma/ ri bo'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyi dpal/ chu klung dang /
mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ chu thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i dpal/ mu stegs thams cad du mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ sman dang / rtsi tog dang / shing dang / nor dang /
'bru thams cad kyi dpal/ gser sbyin ma/ zas dang / gos sbyin ma/ 'od gsal ma/ snang ba ma/ lus gtsang ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang sgyur
ma| lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal/ sbyin pa ma/ longs spyod ma/ gzi
brjid ldan ma| phun sum tshogs ma/ 'byor pa ma/ rnam par skye ba ma/ mthong ma/ chos kyi dpal/ khyab 'jug la brten pa/ ku mu de la gnas ma/ bzod ldan ma/ mthu rtsal
gyi gnas/ dag byed dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal/ sa thams
cad dang / rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ 'byung po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags
dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ lha'i gnas dang / lha thams cad kyi dpal/ bzlas brjod dang / bzlas brjod du bya ba dang / sbyin
sreg dang / sbyin bsreg tu bya ba dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/ 'od la dga' ba/ skal pa dang ldan par 'dod pa/ drang srong thams cad dag par byed pa'i dpal/
bud med kyi gnas thams cad kyi gtso mo dang / dpal gyi mchog mi'am ci mo thams cad dang / lha ma yin mo thams cad kyi dpal gyi mchog /kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas
na 'dug ma/ yid du 'ong ma/ sim par byed ma/ ku be ra'i snying du sdug ma/ chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal/ oM sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam
par gzigs shig /sgrol cig /thar bar mdzod cig /bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig swAhA/ oM gaM ga sarba ti r+tha mu khi

swAhA/ oM sarba bi tri swAhA/ sarba maM ga la d+hA ra Nai swAhA/ tsa turbed sarba na k+Sha tra gra hA pa Na ga Na a d+hi mUr+t+yai swAhA/ brah+mA ya swAhA/ biSh+Na be swA hA/ ru dra ya swAhA/ bi shwa mu

khA ya swAhA/ oM kli ni kli ni sarba kAr+yA sA d+ha ni/ sa ni sa ni/ A ba ha de bi shrI/ bai shrA ba NA ya swAhA/ su bar+Na d+ha na d+han+ya/ A kaR+Sha N+yai swAhA/ sarba pUr+Na A kaR+Sha N+yai swAhA/

shrI ha ma ba tI A kaR+Sha N+yai swA hA/ sarba pA pa nA sha n+ye swA hA/ sarba a kA la mr-i t+yu pra sha ma n+yai swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka tA yai swA hA/ sarba de ba tA b+hi mu kha shrI ye swA hA/ A

yurba la bar+d+ha ka R+Sha yai swAhA/ sarba bi dwa maM ga la hastA ye swAhA/ saM haM ba hi nI yai swAhA/ pad+ma sam+ba d+hA yai swAhA/ sarba kr-i t+ya ka khorda bi nA sha n+yai swAhA/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug /gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ bsod nams thams
cad sdud par byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/ dpal dang / bde ba dang / skal ba bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang mar byas la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang / bdug pa gsol nas lha mo chen mo
dpal la'ang tsan+dan gyi bdug pa phul te/ bklags na des dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ lha thams cad
kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur la de'i don thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang
chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo dpal de dang / 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs
so|| ||rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya dza ya ma ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po dag dang thabs
gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal ba'i blo gros/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo bsod nams 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o/ /shes rab 'dod pas thos pa la brtson par bya'o/ /mtho ris 'dod pas tshul khrims bsrung
bar bya'o/ /longs spyod 'dod pas gtong ba spel bar bya'o/ /gzugs bzang ba 'dod pas bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /spobs pa 'dod pas bla ma la gus par bya'o//
gzungs 'dod pas mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par bya'o/ /ye shes 'dod pas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas par bya'o/ /thar pa 'dod pas sdig pa thams cad
spang bar bya'o/ /sems can thams cad bde bar bya bar 'dod pas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /skad snyan pa 'dod pas bden par smra bar bya'o/ /yon tan
'dod pas rab tu dben pa la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par bya'o/ /zhi gnas 'dod pas 'du 'dzi med pa mang du bya'o/ /lhag mthong
'dod pas chos stong par so sor brtag pa mang du bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dod pas byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /lha
dang / mi'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya'o/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar 'dod pas stong pa'i chos
la mngon par dga' bar bya'o/ /yon tan thams cad thob par 'dod pas dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a ba lo ki nI nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la
dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam
par dag pa/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa dang / bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros
rnam par dag pa/ byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ snying rje yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag
pa| rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ stobs
yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pa dang / rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa'i yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog
dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha'
rtogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i
mthar yang zad par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshad med pa de bzhin du de bzhin
gshegs pa la yon phul ba'ang tshad med do/ /mtha' yas so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mtshungs pa med do/ /dpag tu med do/ /grangs med do/ /dpag gis mi lang ngo / /
brjod du med do/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa
dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya mtha' ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ring
bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / yang dag par sems nye bar gzhag ste byang chub
tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang /
gsol ba dang / bsngags pa dang / skor ba byed pa des phan yon lnga yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan
par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa
skyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po de dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de chos bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan
pa 'dzin pa dang / de'ang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dang / bsgrubs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas
kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye par 'gyur te/ chos bzhi po de dag go /blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams
kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs mtho zhing rigs che nga dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus na dam
pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam par dag
pa| byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/ /'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la/ /su zhig skor ba byed pa ni/
tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan/ /bsod nams ldan zhing 'jigs med 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas
na ni/ /tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /srin po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur/ /ngas ni gang dag bstan pa yi/ /mi khom brgyad po de dag
spong / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes pa/ /mnyes par byed 'di dal ba gcig /mdog ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/ /mtshan gyis legs
par brgyan pa dang / /mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /le lo can du de mi 'gyur/ /de ni phyug cing nor cher 'gyur/ /bsod nams ldan zhing rdzi ba med/ /'jig rten sgron
ma mnyes byas nas/ /yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/ /bdag med stong pa'i chos thos na/ /de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur/ /myur du dad pa thob 'gyur zhing / /chos don
ji bzhin mkhas par 'gyur/ /tshong dpon khyim dang rgyas pa dang / /phyug po rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ /dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /gtong ba btang zhing
ser sna med/ /dzam+bu'i gling na gang yang rung / /khyad par can gyi rigs mdzes pa/ /der ni brtan pa de skye ste/ /dma' ba dag ni rnam par spangs/ /mchod rten bskor ba
byas na ni/ /skye ba thams cad kun tu yang / /dbang cher grags pa'i khyim bdag dang / /dpal dang gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/ /bram ze sA la che 'dra dang / /tshul khrims
ldan zhing mang thos dang / /rgyal rigs sA la che 'dra dang / /phyug cing nor cher ldan par 'gyur/ /ris bskor rgya mtsho tshun chad kyi/ /sa kun la ni gang smon pa/ /gling bzhi
dag gi dbang phyug bla/ /rgyal po chos dang ldan par 'gyur/ /'khor los bsgyur ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /rin chen bdun dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal srid gnas nas sangs rgyas
la| |yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/ /'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris su/ /song nas sangs rgyas bstan la dad/ /lhun po'i zom gyi dbang phyug go /lha yi dbang po brgya byin
'gyur/ /lha dbang shin tu 'thab bral dang / /de bzhin du ni dga' ldan dang / /lha dbang shin tu 'phrul dga' dang / /dbang sgyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /mchod rten
bskor ba byas na ni/ /de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du/ /tshangs pa'i dbang phyug mkhas 'gyur zhing / /lha rnams bye bas mchod par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon gyi mchod
rten la/ /mi gang skor ba byed pa yis/ /bsngags pa bskal pa bye bar yang / /brjod pas zad par bya mi nus/ /su zhig byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /ston pa'i mchod
rten phyag 'tshal ba/ /de ni bskal pa bye bar yang / /nam yang long zhing 'theng mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la/ /mngon du skor ba byed pa ni/ /bung ba sngon
po mdzes 'dra yi/ /rnam par dag pa'i mig 'thob 'gyur/ /mchod rten skor ba byed na ni/ /de ni nges par rtag tu yang / /mthun pa'i don kun thob 'gyur zhing / /don min rnams
ni spangs par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/ /mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de ni le lo med 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu bag yod ldan par
'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/ /brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu brtan la/ /brtan zhing rnam par gnon brtan dang / /de ni myur du mkhas par 'gyur/ /me dang dug
dang mtshon gyis de/ /nam yang 'chi dus byed mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pa tshe ni rdzogs rdzogs su/ /zad par byas nas 'chi dus byed/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/ /pho brang
'khor dang yul 'khor dang / /grong rdal rnams su longs spyod dang / /gzugs kyis khyad par 'phags par 'gyur/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /de ni 'dod pa mi bsten
cing / /lus kyang gtsang la gos gtsang zhing / /gtsang ma'i chos la gnas par 'gyur/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yang dag par
zhugs pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa bskyed de/ pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal zhing phyag byang
de| de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag gis lus kyang de 'dra bar gyur cig ces
de la mos pa skyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i
phyir ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi theg pa bla na med pas kyang zad par bya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rigs kyi bu des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs
su bzung ba'i phyir te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas pa grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong du 'jug kyang rung / 'chag kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / chos ston kyang rung / stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ mi'am/
mi ma yin pa'am/ sems can gyi grangs su ma gtogs pa shing ngam/ ri'am/ khung bu'am/ bu ga'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs
su 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud pa mi byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang
ldan pa la byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu/ de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/ rab
tu 'dud/ kun tu 'dud par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes
mos pa bskyed/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni pus mo gnyis 'jugs dang / /su zhig byang chub gzhol nas phyogs rnams kun 'gro ba/ /de 'gro chan 'jig rten gsum
po 'dud pa byed/ /mi rnams gtso bo rang byung gang du 'gro byed pa/ /de logs su ni rtswa dang shing dang sdong dum dang / /sman dang shing lo rnams dang 'bras bu 'dab ma dang / /
yid 'ong dri ldan me tog rnams ni 'dud par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus mo btsugs pa ni/ /de la mi yi dbang po kun kyang 'dud par 'gyur//
gnod sbyin dbang dang klu dang lha yi rgyal po dang / /tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad rkang par gtugs pa byed/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus btsugs
phyag byas na/ /dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan rnams kyis ni go char 'gyur/ /mthu che bla mar bya zhing thub par dka'
bar 'gyur/ /de yi yul na sems can gang dag gnas gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad byams pa'i sems dang dga' bar 'gyur/ /de la sems can gang yang sdig pa mi skyed
de| |skye bo tshogs chen dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba/ /de la 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal po rab tu 'dud/ /
lha dang klu dang mi dang lto 'phye chen po 'dud/ /bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs phyin thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba//
gang tshe rgyal ba dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba thob/ /'dren pa gzhal yas rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /'jig rten sangs
rgyas gyur ces mos pa bskyed nas ni/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya bgrangs zad 'gyur na/ /de ni ring por mi
thogs byang chub mtshungs med 'thob/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la/ /bskal pa bye ba gzhal yas bsti stang byed pa bas/ /gang zhig phyi dus mi zad bskal
pa 'di la ni/ /mchod rten phyag 'tshal de yi bsod nams ches mang ngo / /sangs rgyas dam pa sbyin gnas mtshungs pa med gyur pa/ /spyod pa dam
pa spyad nas khyad par brnyes gyur pa/ /mi yi khyu mchog de la 'dir ni mchod byas na/ /rnam par smin pa dam pa mtshungs med rang bzhin 'gyur/ /byang chub tu ni sems bsngos
te| |me tog phreng ba byas nas su/ /mchod rten dag la su 'bul ba/ /de ni nam yang phongs mi 'gyur/ /mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
der ni rin chen sna tshogs kyi/ /gzhal med khang pa thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten phreng ba 'di dbul na/ /khang bzang dag dang khang brtsegs pa/ /lha yi bu mos bsten pa rnams//
sum cu gsum du spyod par 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang zhing / /gser gyi bye ma brdal gyur pa/ /bai DUR+ya dang shel dag gi /lha yi rdzing bu thob par 'gyur/ /der ni
lha yi dga' spyad nas/ /mkhas pa tshe tshad rdzogs par 'gyur/ /lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /mi nang longs spyod ldan par 'gyur/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis/ /mkhas
pa bag yod gyur nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byas te/ /rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa byed/ /mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/ /de ni 'dod chags mi 'phrogs
shing | /zhe sdang gis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur/ /de ni nam yang rmongs mi 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis mchog la mchod byas na/ /de ni tshe rabs thams cad du/ /chags pa med cing zhe
sdang med/ /brkam pa med cing dbang po bsngams/ /mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/ /tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams dang / /khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs pa/ /kun tu bkur sti
byas par 'gyur/ /mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/ /de ni 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /brgya byin lha yi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs par 'gyur/ /
'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/ /dar gyi dbul ba phul byas na/ /lha yi dag dang mi rnams kyi/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dma' ba'i rigs ni rnams spangs
te| |der ni de skye 'gyur ma yin/ /phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang / /'jig rten dbang phyug de 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas na/ /gzugs dang don dang longs spyod dang / /
kha dog dang ni 'byor pa dang / /kun tu grags dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de ni che rabs dran 'gyur zhing / /'dod chags kyis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams kyi skyon shes
shing / /changs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod byas na/ /gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dag dang / /ro rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing / /sdig pa'i las
ni byed mi 'gyur/ /rnam par 'dren pa mchod byed na/ /de ni spos dang me tog gis/ /nam yang phongs bar mi 'gyur zhing / /dran ldan shes rab
ldan par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs la su mchod pa/ /de yi nor gyi phung po la/ /rgyal po dang ni chom rkun dang / /me dang chus kyang reg mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po'i
mchod rten la/ /dar gyi dbul ba su 'bul ba/ /de ni skam dang mya ngan dang / /nad bu can du gzhar mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten sgron ma mchod byed pa/ /tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du//
mya ngan med cing gnod med dang / /'khor los bsgyur ba 'byor chen 'gyur/ /'dren pa mchod pa byas na ni/ /rkang pa lag pa mnyen 'gyur zhing / /yan lag rnam par dag
'gyur la/ /gzugs dang kha dog ldan par 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod par byed/ /gang dag 'jig rten rab dkon pa/ /rkang gnyis
mchog rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang / /khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par/ /mchod cing bde la shes rab ldan/ /byang chub dam pa 'tshang yang
rgya| |'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/ /phreng ba'i khang pa byas na ni/ /de ni g.yog 'khor mi phyed cing / /rgyal po 'byor ba chen por 'gyur/ /'phags pa rnams kyis gang
spangs pa/ /sdig pa'i las ni spong bar byed/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yi/ /dge ba'i las la sten par byed/ /lha 'am 'on te klu rnams sam/ /'jig rten dag na gang
mkhas pa/ /de dag dga' zhing mgu ba dang / /bsti stang byas shing bsngags par 'gyur/ /brtan pa de ni gar skyes pa/ /bsod nams gzi brjid rab tu brjid/ /yul 'khor dag
dang grong khyer dang / /rigs der bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /rkang gnyis mchog la su mchod pa/ /de dag mthu stobs che ba dang / /g.yog
'khor chen pos mdzes par 'gyur/ /byang chub tu ni yongs bsngos te/ /phreng ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang bsngags pa'i/ /'byor pa dag ni des
'thob bo/ /de ni 'theng dang zhar ba dang / /dman dang ma rungs mi 'gyur gnas/ /gang dang gang du skyes par yang / /mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan par 'gyur/ /sems can dbul
po rnams mthong na/ /de ni nor gyis sdud par byed/ /de ni nor dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /de ni byang chub spyad pa spyod/ /blo gros chen pos sa 'di kun/ /yongs su btang ba byas nas
kyang / /dman pa'i sems su mi 'gyur zhing / /de ni nam yang phongs mi 'gyur/ /gang dag byang chub mngon zhugs pa/ /de dag bu dang bu mo dang / /chung ma dge zhing bzang mo dag /
btang nas mya ngan byed mi 'gyur/ /de ni sngon du 'gro 'gyur zhing / /bkri ba med la mthong na dga'/ /phrag dog dang ni nga rgyal gyis/ /nam yang de
la gnod mi 'gyur/ /gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa/ /de dag phrag dog med cing des/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /phan pa 'dod cing yon tan ldan/ /gang dag
byang chub mngon zhugs pa/ /'jig rten kun na de rin chen/ /de dag 'byung ba shin tu dkon/ /dmad pa med pa'i sbyin gnas 'gyur/ /sa 'di dag ni rim gyis su/ /bgrang
bar bya zhing dpag par nus/ /de dag rnams kyi yon tan mtha'/ /tshig gis bstan par mi nus so/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/ /dus gsum sems ni shes par
nus/ /de dag rnams kyi yon tan mtha'/ /tshig gis bstan par mi nus so/ /rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag /skra ni bye ba stong gshags pa'i/ /skra yis zad par bya bar nus//
de dag yon tan zad mi nus/ /sa rnams thams cad phyer brlags pa/ /rab tu phra rdul shes par nus/ /sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/ yon tan mtha' ni brjod mi nus/ /chu
klung thams cad rab 'bab pa/ /rgyun las bzlog ste 'gro yang srid/ /sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi /yon tan mtha' brjod de lta min/ /sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/ /
sngon gyis lus rnams ji snyed pa/ /bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus/ /de dag yon tan zad mi 'gyur/ /sngon gyis lus rnams thams cad la/ /spu phreng ji snyed yod pa rnams/
bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus/ /de dag yon tan zad mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba lnga por 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi spu rnams ni/ /bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus/ /de dag
yon tan zad mi 'gyur/ /sa 'di ji snyed thams cad pa/ /chu yi phung por gnas gyur kyang / /de ni bgrang zhing dpag par nus/ /de dag yon tan brjod mi nus/ /mar me mdzad
nas bzung nas ni/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa ji snyed pa/ /de yi bar du shing ljon rnams/ /ji snyed ma 'ongs 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de dag 'bras bu me tog rnams/ /de dag zad par shes
par nus/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang / /khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par/ /brtson pa zhig gis de dag gis/ /sngags phreng yid du 'ong brjod kyang / /sangs rgyas sras
po de dag gi /yon tan mtha' ni brjod mi nus/ /sangs rgyas sras po de dag la/ /mi gang mi dga' byed pa de/ /lha dang mi ni spangs nas su/ /de dag dmyal ba spyod yul 'gyur//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ /mi gang la la gnod byed pa/ /mig med pa'am long ba dang / /sdug bsngal dpung gnyen med par 'gyur/ /shi 'phos nas ni mnar med
'gro /de ni 'bar zhing 'jigs skrag 'gyur/ /lus ni chen por gyur nas kyang / /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur/ /tshe rabs de dag de dag tu/ /de
lus dpag tshad tsam 'gyur te/ /de dag phrum ltar zlum gyur la/ /kun nas yongs su bza' bar 'gyur/ /de tshe lus la mgo bo ni/ /lnga stong yod par 'byung 'gyur zhing / /
mgo bo de dag re re la'ang / /lce ni lnga brgya tham pa yod/ /gcig la'ang thong gshol brgya dag gis/ /lce ni rab tu rmo bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /mi
bzad chen por gshags par 'gyur/ /mnar med de nas shi 'phos nas/ /de ni tsha dang rab tsha bar/ /blo gros ngan pa tshor ba myong / /de sngon nyes byas 'bras bu yin/ /byang
chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ /ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa/ /de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / /dmyal ba'i sa ni dkon ma yin/ /tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams
dang / /khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrang bar/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing / /de ni bzang po nam mi mthong / /sangs rgyas sras po skyobs rnams la/ /gnod pa dag ni
byas gyur na/ /a la gar rta 'jigs pa yi/ /shin tu gdug pa'i sprul du skye/ /de ni bkres dang skom pas nyen/ /sdig pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /de ni zas kyang
ji rnyed de/ /nam yang 'grangs par za mi myong / /shi 'phos gshin rje'i 'jig rten du/ /de ni rtag par gtun du brdung / /dge slong dag la gnod byas pas/ /nam yang skabs
ni rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de nas shi 'phos dus byas te/ /mi yi lus ni thob gyur na/ /blo ngan de ni dmus long 'gyur/ /gnod sems ldan zhing sdom pa med/ /de ni nyes par smras byas
te| |'phags pa rnams la skur btab pas/ /mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas/ /ngan song dag tu myur du 'gro /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ /ma bsdams gang zhig gnod
byed pa/ /bskal pa bye ba stong dag tu/ /nam yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams la/ /gang zhig chos bzhin srung byed pa/ /des ni ngan 'gro kun
spangs te/ /myur du bzang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang / /stobs dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med/ /dran dang ldan zhing shes rab ldan/ /bde zhing ngo tsha khrel
las ldan/ /gang du 'jig rten rnams kyi sgron/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten mthong nas ni/ /yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas
kyis gsungs pa yi/ /'di 'dra'i chos 'di thos gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas sras po rnams la ni/ /su zhig phyi phyir dad mi byed/ /gang gis sangs rgyas stong rnams dang / /brgya dang
bye ba bgrangs dag la/ /bskal pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /de snyed bskal par bkur ba bas/ /'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yi/ /dam chos 'jig
tshe gang zhig gis/ /nyin dang mtshan du 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags/ /chos 'jig dus na chos 'dzin pa/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /
sangs rgyas ye shes rab gnas pa/ /nga la des ni mchod pa byed/ /dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe/ /ston pa'i bstan pa srung byed la/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/ /
de ni nam yang rgud mi 'gyur/ /lus kyis bde ba myong 'gyur zhing / /de ni nad kyis btab mi 'gyur/ /de ni yid du mi 'ong bas/ /nam yang 'phrogs bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ston
pa'i bstan pa bsrung byas na/ /bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / /des dang gsal dang mnyen pa dang / /sems can rnams la byams sems 'gyur/ /'jig tshe rgyal
ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ /bde dang dga' 'thob mdzod ni mang bar 'gyur/ /sngon gyi rim gro bya ba 'thob 'gyur zhing / /mi khom pa rgyad po ma lus zad par spong / /'jig
tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ /dper na nam mkha' skar mas yongs gang ltar/ /rtag tu mtshan gyis go char byas pa dang / /rab tu tshig snyan yid 'ong dbyangs ldan/
'gyur/ /'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ /gang na yid bde med cing rab sdug pa/ /rigs dman de ni de yis spang bar 'gyur/ /phyug cing shin tu bde la longs spyod
ldan/ /'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung ba/ /mthu dang stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan/ /mi dman pa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la bsnyen
bkur byed/ /'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ /mchog tu rab mdzes gzugs ldan shes rab ldan/ /mi yi 'jig rten mchog tu bsnyen bkur 'gyur/ /rgyal po mkhas
pa mdzangs pa rnams kyis bsngags/ /'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ /mchog tu gzugs mdzes blta na sdug pa dang / /skyes pa bud med lha rnams dga' ba
dang / /bde zhing mkhas la bsngags shing shes rab ldan/ /ston pa stobs bcu mnga' ba lha yi lhas/ /gang gi mdun du mdo 'di rab bshad pa/ /mi de lag tu mdo sde 'di 'dra
'di/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ston pa mi mchog gzugs byed pa/ /ras 'di rtsig ngos 'dri 'am gser las byas/ /de yi chos kyi khyad par gang yin
pa/ /de dag ma lus rab tu bstan gyi nyon/ /de ni blta min long bar gzhar mi 'gyur/ /sgur por mi 'gyur yan lag mi sdug min/ /de ni gzugs dang ldan zhing kha dog ldan//
sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur/ /lus ni rnam par dag cing khyad par 'thob/ /spobs pa 'thob cing sgra snyan yid du 'ong / /shes
bzhin ldan zhing 'jig rten kun gyi gtso/ /de mthong sems can bde zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ /sdig byed mi 'gyur zhe sdang med sems ldan/ /g.yo med mi rku rgyal po 'khrug
mi byed/ /mthu dang ldan zhing dbang cher grag par 'gyur/ /byams la gnas shing mi dman sems dang ldan/ /'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/ /de ni mchog
'gyur skye bo mang mchod 'os/ /blo ldan phyug cing de nyid rgya cher ldan/ /dbang ldan 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/ /
lha yi dbang po dbang phyug dbang thob pa/ /lhun po'i zom na dbang thob brgya byin 'gyur/ /bdag po lhun po'i zom na rgyal srid ston/ /de ni dran dang blo gros mi ldan min/ /de
ni rtogs mos shes rab tshangs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun na dbugs phyin thob 'gyur te/ /'di ni ye shes ldan zhing dmyal ba spangs/ /sems can snying po mtshungs
med mchod byas na/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas gshin rje'i yul mi 'gro/ /ngan 'gro gsum po ngas ni rnam spangs te/ /bdag der phyis mi skye bar shes par 'gyur/ /'dren pa'i
sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/ /dbang ldan dbang phyug nyid kyi lhar 'gyur te/ /mi dman dga' ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod/ /rgyal ba mchog gi bstan la dad par 'gyur//
tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dbang thob tshangs par 'gyur/ /yid 'ong shin tu mdzes pa'i spos ngad can/ /dzam+bu'i klung gser 'od byed dga' 'gyur ba'i/ /gzhal med khang mchog blta sdug
thob par 'gyur/ /de ni ded dpon stobs bcu ldan pa po/ /sems can snying po mtshungs 'dra med pa thob/ /kha dog mtha' yas 'jig rten kun na gsal/ /gser stong rin chen bai
DUR+ya dang mtshungs/ /su zhig dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog blangs/ /dad skyes 'jig rten mgon la char du gtor/ /de ni mi yi 'jig rten bsod nams ldan/ /rgyal srid gnas nas
rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur/ /mya ngan bskams shing tha ba drir ldan lus/ /yan lag legs gnas mtshungs med thob par 'gyur/ /skye bo mang pos blta ba'i 'os yin te/ /dmyal
ba dgra rtsa 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur/ /spyad pa rnam par spyad tshe 'dod pa la/ /ngan skyugs khung ltar smad par shes par 'gyur/ /tshangs spyod dge ba khyad par 'phags la spyod/ /dga'
ba'i sems kyis rtag tu spyod par 'gyur/ /bskal pa mtha' yas mang du de kha nas/ /rab mdzes ut+pal bsung ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing / /
tsan+dan lta bur dri zhim ngad kyang 'byung / /spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe khro ba dang / /tha ba dri skyon gti mug gnod mi byed/ /dman pa med pa'i sems
kyis dbugs phyin rnyed/ /bag yod lha yi nang na rgyal po 'thob/ /gang tshe rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa na/ /de ni gus pas de dag chos kyang 'dzin/ /mi dman dga' ba'i sems
kyis sbyin pa sbyin/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel mchod/ /rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig dus tshe/ /rab tu dga' bas ston pa'i chos tshul 'dzin/ /des ni
chos mchog mdzes pa de spyad pas/ /gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gzhar mi 'gyur/ /gal te sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shing / /nyon mongs med pa gser
mdog stobs bcur gyur/ /de dag bskal bye khrag khrig brgya stong du/ /rgyal ba mchog la mchod pa'i bsngags brjod nus/ /'jig rten kun tu sdig pa'i las spangs
te| |dga' ba'i sems kyis mchog gi las byas shing / /rlabs chen spyod tshe don ni legs byas nas/ /'jig rten mthu chen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /gang gis
spos chu yungs 'bru tsam blangs te/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la bdug byed pa/ /de yi phan yon brjod kyi sems dang zhing / /rdul dang dri ma spongs la mnyan
par gyis/ /de ni bsod nams ldan zhing phyogs kun rgyu/ /nad med gyur cing blo brtan bag yod la/ /spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe mya ngan 'dul/ /skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong /
rgyal po thob nas rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur/ /mthu chen rab mkhas 'khor los bsgyur 'gyur te/ /gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan gyi go cha can/ /'jig rten kun na yid 'ong dri
ldan 'thob/ /de la yid mi bde dang sdug bsngal med/ /spyad pa spyod tshe longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur/ /phyug cing nor ldan mdzod ni rab tu mang / /mya ngan med gyur 'jig rten kun
tu rgyu/ /skye bo mang po lhags te de la 'dri/ /rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa khyad 'phags chos/ /tshig rab brjod cing the tshom sel bar byed/ /chos thos yid bde slar yang smra bar
byed/ /sdig pa'i las med blo rgya che dang ldan/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos mchog khyad 'phags pa/ /dga' bar 'gyur la rtag tu mkhas byas te/ /mig kyang spyod cing mun pa
sel bar byed/ /'dod chags mi che zhe sdang che ma yin/ /mi yi 'jig rten gti mug che ma yin/ /de ni tshangs spyod dag pa mchog 'di spyod/ /mi yi don ni dpag tu med pa byed/ /
bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la spos bdug na/ /de la gnod par sems pa su yang med/ /de ni nam yang longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur/ /blta bar 'os shing nor chen ldan par
'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya rnams su/ /sems ni rnam dag sdig pa rnam dag cing / /zhi zhing rab zhi zhi dul ldan gyur nas/ /mi dman
sems kyis byang chub mtshungs med 'thob/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas/ /mya ngan med bde zhi ba mchog bkod cing / /'khor lo mtshungs med 'jig
rten kun bskor nas/ /phyi nas nyon mongs rdul med mya ngan 'das/ /su zhig dga' mgu sems kyi gos kyis ni/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la mchod byas pa/ /
de ni gos mdzes bye ba stong rnams dang / /khrag khrig brgya grangs mtha' yas rtag tu rnyed/ /bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na/ /de ni btsas ma thag tu gos
mchog 'thob/ /lha yi khyad 'phags dar gos rab bzang rnyed/ /btsas ma thag tu de lus shin tu bde/ /gang zhig gos kyis bcom ldan mchod rten dang / /'dren pa mtshungs
med rnams la mchod byed pa/ /de 'dir mtshungs pa med pa'i lus 'thob ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi me tog rgyas/ /bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyi dkris byas
na| |lag mthil nas ni mu tig phreng mdzes pa/ /sna tshogs dag dang seng ge'i phreng ba dang / /gser skud rab mdzes bskal pa mtha' yas 'byung / /bcom ldan mchod
rten gos kyis dkris byas na/ /lha 'am klu'am mi 'am lto 'phye che/ /su yang de la ma dad skyed mi byed/ /rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa mchog 'di spyod/ /bcom ldan mchod rten
gos kyis dkris byas na/ /stong gi 'jig rten khams kun zil gnon te/ /dzam klung gser gyis gser ni zil mnan bzhin/ /skye dgu don ni dpag tu med pa byed/ /gal te
rin chen rab mchog sna bdun gyis/ /stong gi zhing kun rab tu bkang ba yi/ /de 'dra'i dpal 'di zad par bya nus kyi/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba'i min/ /
nor bu rin chen zla ba'i 'od rnams kyis/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zhing bkang ba/ /de 'dra'i dpal 'di zad par bya nus kyi/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba'i min/ /'jig
rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de/ /bcom ldan mchod rten ba dan phul byas na/ /de ni skye bo mang po'i mchod 'os 'gyur/ /byang chub mchog spyod dam pa zhi ba spyod/ /
bcom ldan mchod rten ba dan phul byas na/ /dag cing mchog gi lus ni 'thob 'gyur te/ /dper na gser ltar shin tu dgar 'gyur zhing / /lha yis bsngags la mchod cing
bla mar byed/ /de yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur/ /ras kyi gos dang la ba bzang rab dang / /du gu la dang ko shi ka rnams dang / /shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyang rnyed par 'gyur/ /
dzam+bu'i gling na rigs mchog dam pa gang / /phyug cing che nyid bdag dbang nor mang ba/ /de dag tu ni rtag tu de skye ste/ /dman zhing mchog tu dbul ba rnam
par spangs/ /de la sems can su yang phrag dog med/ /sems can gnod par sems pa gzhar mi 'byung / /gzhan gyi sdig pa'i las la de smod de/ /rtag tu bag yod tshul
khrims rnam dag 'gyur/ /'dzin pa med cing ser sna med par 'ongs/ /gtong ba rab btang mya ngan med pa 'thob/ /de ni srog phyir gzhan la sbyin mi byed/ /phongs pa med byed rtag
tu bag yod 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas stobs bcu ded dpon mthong nas ni/ /dga' ba'i sems kyi gdugs dang ba dan dang / /mar me rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod/ /
byang chub spyod mchog 'di ni rtag par spyod/ /mi yi 'jig rten bla mar bsnyen bkur byed/ /lha nang lha yi dag dang mi yi gtso/ /yid 'ong spos mdzes blta na sdug pa dang / /nor
bu shel 'dra sna tshogs ldan pa 'thob/ /ri rab rtse mor lha nang rab tu gsal/ /lha kun slob mar gyur nas mngon du 'dud/ /chos kyis de dag yid bde skyed par byed/ /de la dad
mchog gzha' gsang thob par 'gyur/ /de nas shi 'phos mi yi 'jig rten du/ /rgyal po dam pa stobs ldan 'khor los bsgyur/ /de la sems can su yang sdig mi skyed/ /skye bo
mang po dga' zhing yid 'ong 'gyur/ /rdul bsal sems can mchog la rgyal mtshan phul/ /ring por mi thogs nor mang rnyed par 'gyur/ /shes rab mtha' yas mdzod ni mang ldan
'ong / /sems chud mi 'gyur dman pa'i sems mi 'gyur/ /longs spyod rnyed nas bgod cing bdag kyang spyod/ /de ni 'jig med yid mi bde ba med/ /rgyal po dga' nas grong
dang yul 'khor bgod/ /de la sems can su yang sdig mi skyed/ /gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa mdzad mang zhing / /khyim bdag rin chen sna tshogs lus brgyan 'gyur/ /rgyal
po'i bu'am de bzhin blon por 'ong / /rgyal por gyur na stobs ldan rdzi ba med/ /brnyas pa'i rigs dma' thams cad yongs su spong / /longs spyod khyad 'phags rigs mchog
rnyed nas ni/ /rtag tu bag yod sems ni zhum mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams ni ngan skyugs khung ltar spong / /khyad 'phags gzugs dang mtshan rnams rab tu 'thob/ /khyad 'phags
rigs dang de bzhin dbang phyug nyid/ /de yi g.yog 'khor rtag tu mi phyed 'gyur/ /skye bo mang pos mdun du bdar bar 'ong / /de ni gzhan la gnod pa'i sems mi skyed/ /
sems ni rab dang rtag tu bag yod ldan/ /de la me dang dug dang mtshon mi tshugs/ /skye bo tshogs chen gyis ni blta bar 'gyur/ /rab tu dga' zhing thub pa'i chos la spyod/ /shes
bzhin ldan nas yid bde skyed par byed/ /'dzin pa med cing chags med sems dang ldan/ /chags med gyur nas de la mi mthun med/ /de
yi lus gtsang kun nas nyon mongs med/ /rnam dag sems ldan de ni bden par smra/ /'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la yid bde skyed/ /sems can rnams kyi skyabs
dang dpung gnyen 'gyur/ /de ni bdag don rgya chen byas nas su/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la 'god/ /shing dbang shing mchog dam pa'i drung song nas//
mtshungs med mchog zhi byang chub 'tshang yang rgya/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul na/ /'di nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/ /sangs rgyas zhing na 'dzam klung
gser gyis gang / /de 'dra'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus/ /bcom ldan mchod rten mar me phul byas na/ /de yi lus ni mdog ngan yongs mi 'gyur/ /gzugs mchog sra
zhing lag pa gzu ba 'dra/ /snang ba thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/ /gal te rgyal ba dam pa byung gyur na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur/ /nye dur 'gyur ram/
yang na bur yang 'gyur/ /de ni ye shes phung po myur du 'thob/ /gal te khrag khrig brgya stong sangs rgyas zhing / /yungs 'bru dag gis byur bur gang 'gyur ba/ /bgrang ba dang ni
