gzhal zhing brjod par nus/ /bde gshegs mar me gcig phul de lta min/ /sangs rgyas dam pa mtshungs med sbyin pa'i gnas/ /spyod pa mchog spyod khyad par brnyas gyur pa/ /mi
mchog de la mchod pa 'dir byas pa/ /rnam par smin pa dam pa gzhal yas 'gyur/ /gal te mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'di kun/ /nor bu rin chen bai DUR+yas gang ba/ /zad
par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /ka ra Sha pa Na sa mi mjed 'jig rten khams/ /'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gang ba/ /
zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing stong de dag tsan+dan gyis/ /'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo bar gang ba/ /zad
par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yod pa'i lha ris kyi/ /gos kyis sangs rgyas zhing stong gang gyur ba/ /zad
par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /klu dang lha min mi dang lto 'phye che/ /lha yi lha rdzas nor bu rin chen mang / /zad par bya nus sangs
rgyas mchod rten la/ /mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /lha yi 'jig rten yod pa'i lha yi spos/ /de dag mi mjed 'di kun gang gyur pa/ /zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten
la| |mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tshad ni shes par nus/ /nam mkha'i khams 'di'i tshad kyang shes par
nus/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul ba'i/ /de 'dra'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus/ /sangs rgyas dam pa mi mchog bzhud pa'i tshe/ /'dren pa mtshungs pa med la
dad byas te/ /ston pa'i sku la nyi zer mi 'bab par/ /me tog ma li ka gdugs bcom ldan phul/ /de ni las mdzes dam pa gus byas pas/ /lha dbang brgya byin du ni lan
'bum gyur/ /'jig rten kun tu tshangs pa'i bdag por gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten la ni 'bum phul nas/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po stobs ldan gyur/ /stong
phrag bcu la dbang bar nga gyur te/ /nor chen rab tu mdzod mang tshong dpon gyur/ /khyim bdag blo ldan bsod nams ldan par gyur/ /bde gshegs mi mchog bye ba nyi shu
dag /ngas ni mnyes byas gzims cha na bza' yis/ /mi mchog dag la bla mar bsti stang byas/ /de dag gtsug lag khang la spos kyis bskus/ /nga yi kha dog ngan pa
kun med gyur/ /ngas ni tsha dang grang dang ngal ba spangs/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar dman med sems gyur cing / /de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod/ /rgyan gyis brgyan
ba'i gdugs mdzes blta sdug pa/ /su zhig bcom ldan mchod rten 'bul byed pa/ /de 'dir lus ni mtshungs pa med 'gyur te/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char
'gyur| /gang gis rgyal ba'i sku ni rab 'bar zhing / /khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dang sems 'dra dang / /'dzam klung gser ltar rab mdzes blta na sdug /mtshan gyi me
tog rgyas pas mngon du gang / /mngon par shes pa 'thob cing dbang cher grags/ /byang chub spyod mchog dam pa zhi ba spyod/ /de ni nam yang longs spyod 'grib mi 'gyur/ /
lhas kyang bsti stang bya zhing mchod par 'ong / /brtan pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gzhar mi dka'/ /tshul khrims rnam dag rab mkhas tshangs par spyod/ /yi dam bcas nas nags
dang nags 'dab song / /mngon shes 'thob cing khyad par 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la gdugs 'bul ba/ /ji lta bu yang byang chub sems mi 'dor/ /byams
la gnas shing mi dman sems su 'gyur/ /de yi shes pa rnams kyang nyams pa med/ /rol mo'i sgra yis mi mchog mchod byas na/ /mya ngan med cing dbang ldan rgyal por 'ong / /mi
yi 'jig rten yid 'ong sgra ldan 'gyur/ /de sgra yan lag tshang zhing dag par 'ong / /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /shes bzhin ldan zhing mig ni rnam dag 'gyur/ /rna ba
rnam par dag cing sems kyang dga'/ /sna yi dbang po mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de yi lce ni rab mdzes blta na sdug /thog mar rab mnyen mdzes
shing sgra yid 'ong / /dper na lha yi rin chen byu ru 'dra/ /sgra skad yan lag bye ba dpag med 'byin/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /nam yang sbrul du mi 'gyur lce
med min/ /zhar ba sgur po ya yo can mi 'gyur/ /lus ni khyad par 'phags shing shin tu mdzes/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /lha'am klu 'am mi 'am lto 'phye
che| |su yang de la ma dad skyed mi 'gyur/ /dbugs phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /de ni ma ning za mar gzhar mi 'gyur/ /nam
yang mdze dang sha bkra mi 'byung zhing / /bsngags par 'os pa'i lus ni thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /lce ring 'gyur zhing lus kyang che bar
'gyur/ /gser gyi gzugs ltar kha dog 'bar ba 'ong / /ting 'dzin brtan zhing shin tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/ /lha nang bdag por
'gyur zhing dbang phyug 'gyur/ /mi yi 'jig rten skyes na dga' bar 'ong / /brtson 'grus ldan zhing bag yod 'bar bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na//
de la su yang yid mi bde mi skyed/ /de la su yang tshig rtsub smra ba med/ /phra ma thams cad spangs shing yang dag smra/ /bsod nams 'dod pa su zhig phyags thogs te/ /bcom ldan mchod
rten gus par 'phyag byed pa/ /de ni smad cing mi gtsang lus mi 'gyur/ /ba spu khung nas tsan+dan dri ngad 'byung / /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong du/ /yan lag ma smad khyad 'phags lus 'thob cing / /mdzes la mtshan gyis go char byas par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /lha yi tsan+dan
khyad 'phags rab mdzes pa'i/ /gzhal med khang mchog yid 'ong dri ldan 'thob/ /de ni de la gzhar yang sred mi skyed/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /yid 'ong
dri ldan mchog tu blta sdug pa'i/ /lha yi bu mo bye ba stong 'thob cing / /de ni de la nam yang chags mi skyed/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /skyed mos tshal
mchog yod pa'i rdzing bu ni/ /yan lag brgyad ldan chu gtsang mdzes gyur pa/ /me tog ut+pal las ni rgyas pa 'thob/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /de yi
g.yog 'khor rtag tu mthun 'gyur zhing / /mi dman sems can lha yi sgra yang thos/ /lha mo rnams kyi glu dbyangs snyan sgra thos/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags//
'jig rten kun tu skyes tshe bdag nyid kyis/ /'di nas shi 'phos ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing / /mi yi 'jig rten sangs rgyas mthong bar shes/ /bcom
ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /de ni lha la snyan pa'i gtam byas te/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la lha bkod nas/ /shi ba'i dus byas dzam+bu'i gling du skye/ /
bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /btsas ma thag tu bskal pa mtha' yas dran/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas gtso rnams bkur ba dang / /de dag mtshan dang
yon tan chos kyang dran/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes te/ /mos pa skyes nas mchod rten rtswa skyes sel/ /de yi phan yon de dag ngas bshad kyi/ /tha ba dri sol
dang ba'i sems kyis nyon/ /mthu chen skyes bu dam pa khyad 'phags pa/ /rgyal ba dam pa ma 'ongs dus na mthong / /de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod/ /de ni gzhar
yang dad pa dam pa 'thob/ /sangs rgyas stobs bcu ded dpon des mthong nas/ /'dren pa mtshungs pa med la mchod pa byas/ /mtshan gyis go char byas pa'i sangs rgyas
su| |'gyur zhes thugs dgyes de dag lan yang ston/ /grong khyer yangs pa nyams dga' mchog gnas shing / /nga ni chos ston gang gis mthong gyur pa/ /de dag phyi dus rab tu
'jig pa'i tshe/ /rgyal mchog mya ngan 'das pa'i chos 'dzin 'gyur/ /mchod rten rtswa skyes sel bar byed ba ni/ /rgyal ba dam pa mi thul mthong 'dod pa'i/ /rgyu dang sa bon 'gyur ba 'di yin no/ /
'dod dang dmyal dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas spong / /byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mdo mchog 'di/ /phyi ma rab 'jig dus na 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas lha yi lha//
bsod nams khyad 'phags mtshungs med zhing du 'gyur/ /'di bshad tshe na gang dag 'dir mchod dang / /tshul 'di bshad pa gang dag thos pa dang / /gang dag mdo mchog 'di ni
'dir bzung ba/ /de dag phyi ma'i dus na 'dir 'di 'dzin/ /gang dag phyin chad mdo mchog 'di 'dzin pa/ /de dag rtag tu nga dang mthun pa'i sras/ /sangs rgyas bye bas de dag bsngags
brjod kyang / /de dag bsngags pa mthar ni phyin mi 'gyur/ /gang dag phyi dus rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas/ /bskal pa bye bar bzhugs
pa de dag gi /bsngags pa brjod kyang mtha' mar phyin mi 'gyur/ /dri zhim yid 'ong spos kyi cho ga bzhin/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni su bskus pa/ /de ni thob rnyed 'jig rten kun
tu rgyu/ /de ni sa 'dir snying po blangs par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig 'gyur tsha/ /dzam+bu'i gling du skye bar mi
'gyur zhing / /de ni de tshe mtho ris bdag por 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /dri mi zhim dang mi gtsang smad pa rnams/ /
rtag tu spong zhing tshul khrims phung por gnas/ /de ni rtag tu tshangs spyod mchog 'dir spyod/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris
lha dbang 'gyur/ /ring por mi thogs don stong rnams la rtog /lha rnams la ni rgya chen don kyang byed/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /gang gi tshe na mi yi 'jig
rten na/ /zhe sdang med sems 'jam zhing mnyen gyur ba/ /de'i tshe de na dzam+bu'i gling du gnas/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /khyad 'phags tshigs ldan sgra
dbyangs yid 'ong 'gyur/ /skye bo mang po yid 'ong dga' zhing bkur/ /de yi kha bzhin rtag tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /de ni ngan
song sa rnams ma lus spong / /de bzhin gshegs dang nye ba thob par 'gyur/ /dad pa thob cing rtag tu bde la dga'/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /rgyal po
stobs ldan 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /blon po tshong dpon khyim bdag bsod nams ldan/ /chos rje 'od mdzad sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis
mgu ba'i shugs bskyed de/ /bcom ldan 'das mchod rten nor bu'i dra ba 'bul/ /de ni rgyal po mtshan gyi go cha can/ /mthu che bla ma 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /blta 'os mtshan gyi
go cha ldan gyur nas/ /gzhal med khang chen rab mdzes blta sdug pa/ /kha dog sna tshogs dpag med ldan pa dang / /rin chen khang bzang che 'os dag pa 'thob/ /rgyal po pho brang
khyad par 'phags gyur pa/ /skyes pa bud med dag gis gang ba dang / /mnyam zhing legs byas rab mdzes blta sdug pa/ /dra ba sna tshogs bde byed bde 'jug 'thob/ /rgyal mtshan
ba dan gsal bar mdzes byas shing / /gdugs bres shin tu mdzes la blta sdug dang / /mu tig dra ba phreng ba de 'dra ba'i/ /rgyal srid yon tan khyad 'phags gzhan yang 'thob/ /de
yi yul na gzhan nor 'jig byed pa/ /chom rkun g.yo ldan g.yon can gnas mi 'gyur/ /sems can rgya chen blo mchog ldan pa dang / /phan byed byams sems ldan pa de na gnas/
shi 'phos bag yod de ni lhar 'gro ste/ /dkar gnag gang yin bdag cag ji ltar gnas/ /'di nas shi 'phos ji ltar mir skye zhes/ /blo ldan de ni mtho ris 'di gnas 'gyur/ /sangs
rgyas sbyin gnas myur du mthong 'gyur te/ /mthong nas mchod cing mtshungs med bsti stang byed/ /sangs rgyas mthong nas byang chub mos skyed cing / /rdul bral rnams la phyir zhing
bsti stang byed/ /ye shes mtha' yas ldan dang mthu chen 'gyur/ /khyad par sa gnas 'phags pa'i sems can 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das la
dad pa'i sems bskyed nas/ /'di 'dra'i dpal 'di phyir zhing myong bar 'gyur/ /nga yi bya ba 'di ni brjod par bya/ /ngas brjod 'di la the tshom ma skyed cig /sangs rgyas bka'
spangs mnar med 'gror 'gyur zhing / /phyin chad sdug bsngal nyon mongs gyur ta re/ /'jig rten sgron ma mtshungs med bsod nams zhing / /de yi mchod rten ba rgya su sel
ba| |bag yod gyur nas de ni bdud rgya 'dral/ /dus rnams kun tu ngan song sa yang spong / /rtag tu sangs rgyas rdul bral bsti stang byed/ /rtag tu stobs ldan 'khor los
bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /mi yi 'jig rten skyes nas bsod nams ldan/ /rgyal po kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ /lha nang lha yi dbang po mchod gnas 'gyur/ /
der ni myur du lha yi tshe yang 'thob/ /dpal ldan gser gyi gzhal med khang pa rnyed/ /lha yi bde ba mtshungs med dbang phyug nyid/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro mchog dang //
reg bya dpal ldan lha yi 'jig rten 'thob/ /mthu chen ldan zhing blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur/ /lha mo rnams la 'dod pa'i sred mi skyed/ /bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal
byas na/ /'di nas shi 'phos mi yi 'jig rten 'gro /yan lag legs gnas khyad par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /nam yang bstan bcos mi nyung mang po 'thob/ /bcom ldan mchod rten
ba rgya bsal byas na/ /de ni mi khom brgyad po kun spong zhing / /de ni dal 'gyur de bzhin khyad par 'phags/ /de ni sangs rgyas mtshungs med mchod pa byed/ /bcom ldan mchod rten
ba rgya bsal byas na/ /bag yod blo gros brtan la dpa' bor 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' mi skyed/ /mi dman sems kyis mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bcom
ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/ /de ni nam yang byang chub sems mi 'dor/ /tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams par 'gyur/ /rnam dag 'dod chags bral ba'i chos
kyang 'thob/ /bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/ /de yi mdog ngan lus rnams kun tu spong / /'chal pa'i shes rab ma lus rnam par spong / /shes rab rgya chen gyur
nas spyod la gnas/ /bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/ /kha zas gtsang ma dag kyang rnyed 'gyur la/ /khyad 'phags kha dog ldan zhing blta sdug la/ /reg dang ldan zhing
rab mdzes gos rnams 'thob/ /dad pa'i shugs skyes bcom ldan mchod rten la/ /me tog skam po nyal nyil phyags byas na/ /'dod pa smad pa sdug bsngal byed pa spong / /stobs
bcu mnga' ba'i ded dpon mnyes par byed/ /mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa/ /de ni mdzes shing rnam dag lus su 'gyur/ /skye bo mang
pos mchod 'os blta 'os 'gyur/ /de la rgyal po gnod par sems mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten dag la snga rabs mis/ /me tog phul ba skam po phyags byas
na| |ngan song sa yi lam ngan thams cad gcod/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phung por gnas/ /mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/ /bag yod mya ngan
rnams dang skyon rnams spong / /nad rnams du ma ma lus rnam par spong / /bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs phyin thob/ /mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag
pa| |sbyin gnas mtshungs med sangs rgyas thob par 'ong / /mtshungs med thob cing lha mis mchod 'os 'gyur/ /rnam dag lus ldan rgyan gyis brgyan par 'gyur/ /
lha yi me tog rab mdzes man+dA ra/ /mtshungs med pa ta la yang su 'bul dang / /mchod rten me tog nyal nyil su 'phyag pa/ /de dag rnam smin 'dra ste mchog tu 'gyur/ /
mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/ /de lus dug gis mi tshugs mtshon mi tshugs/ /me 'bar 'od 'phro phung po ches mi tshugs/ /nor gyi phung po rkun pos
brku mi 'gyur/ /mgu zhing rab tu dga' ba'i shugs bskyed de/ /bcom ldan mchod rten me tog skam 'phyag na/ /de yi bsod nams bzung bar gang gyur pa/ /grangs sam cha
yang brjod par sla ma yin/ /mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur/ /mi yi 'jig rten na ni rtag tu dga'/ /mthu dang ldan zhing
yid 'ong sgra skad 'byung / /mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/ /chos mchog rab mdzes yang dag sbyong byed cing / /de lus rnam par dag la chen por 'ong / /ring por mi
thogs 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur byas mos bskyed de/ /ston pa'i mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/ /'jig rten dag na bla mar
bkur stir bya/ /de ni mdzes shing blta na sdug par 'gyur/ /de 'dir rgyal srid thob nas lha klu mi/ /lto 'phye che dang 'jig rten thams cad 'dud/ /stong gi 'jig rten khams
kun rgyas par 'gyur/ /dbang phyug nyid du dbang thob rgyal srid ston/ /de yi yul na sems can gang gnas pa/ /de kun sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la 'god/ /de ni
ngan song sa yang rnam par spong / /de dag rnams kyi don mchog dam pa byed/ /bsod nams blo gros dran ldan mchod 'os 'gyur/ /dbugs phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun
tu rgyu/ /de yi g.yog 'khor yid 'ong sgra skad ldan/ /bsam pa ji bzhin de dag dga' ba skyed/ /sems can rnams la mi lhong zhi tshig ston//
de la su yang dbang phyug med mi byed/ /skye bo tshogs chen dag gis blta 'os 'gyur/ /de yi g.yog kyang sgra dbyangs yan lag dag /sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag
'tshal ba/ /sbyin dang snyan par smra dang don spyod dang / /don mthun pa dag skye bo mang la byed/ /spyos shing brgyad kyang khro ba'i dngos mi skyed/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar
phyag 'tshal ba/ /mtho ris 'jig rten gnas shing lha dbang 'gyur/ /mir gyur na yang mi yi rgyal por 'ong / /de ni gzhar yang yongs su nyams mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas
mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/ /de ni gzhar yang ngan song phyis mi ltung / /'jig rten 'dir de rtag tu 'dod pa spong / /nor can nang na phyug cing mdzod mang 'gyur/ /
yon tan ldan la tshig gcig su smra ba/ /de ni mi rigs sngags la gzhar mi spyod/ /mi yi 'jig rten gnas min spyod mi 'gyur/ /de la sems can mi
ngoms dga' bar 'gyur/ /yid 'ong dbyangs ldan pho brang 'khor gshegs shing / /'jig rten mgon po sgo gtan bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /su zhig shugs
bskyed me tog blangs te gtor/ /de ni brgyan nas rgyal ba dam pa mthong / /rang gis khyim du stobs bcu bsnyen bkur byed/ /de yis bshos gsol chos bzang ston pa
mdzad/ /dad pa skyes nas mi mchog bsnyen bkur byed/ /gos kyang thogs te rnam par 'dren la 'bul/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs med mchog thob nas/ /stobs
bcu ldan zhing g.yo ba med gyur la/ /byang chub sangs rgyas sdug bsngal skye bo 'gro la/ /'jig rten kun tu mtshungs med sangs rgyas shog /de yi smon lam 'di 'dra
'di dang ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes de sems dga' mkhyen nas/ /stobs bcu 'dzum mdzad 'jig rten thams cad du/ /mtshungs med sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes lung ston to/ /skyes
bu dam pa mchog gi gsung thos nas/ /bde gshegs mchog gsung gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ /bdag ni rgyal ba mchog 'gyur dogs med ces/ /dga' zhing mgu nas
bar snang kun tu rgyu/ /'jig rten lha yi lhar gyur sangs rgyas su/ /khyad 'phags mtshungs med sbyin gnas 'gyur ba dang / /de sems spyod dang 'gal bar gnas mkhyen
nas/ /de la stobs bcu mnga' bas bzhes par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mchog gis gos ni bzhes rig nas/ /de ni shugs skyes rab dga' sems mgu ste/ /mtshungs med
'jig rten mgon la bltas nas ni/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur mos pa bskyed/ /skye shi pha rol sems can bsgral bar bya/ /grol
nas skye bo mang po 'dus byas dgrol/ /'jig rten kun na long ba'i mig bdag gyur/ /snang ba thob nas mun pa rab rib bsal/ /de ltas phan yon dam pa 'di thos nas/ /me
tog phreng ba rgyal mtshan gos mchog dang / /rol mo sgra dang gdugs dang byug bdug gis/ /mgon po mchod la sangs rgyas 'gyur bar gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / blo gros rnam par dag pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang
bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya many+dzu shrI bi ha ra na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes
bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab
na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'chag cing dge slong lnga brgya po thams cad kyi gnas khang nas gnas khang du byung ste/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ste phyin
nas| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu gcig pu dben par 'dug ste nang du yang dag bzhag nas bsam gtan byed par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gnas
brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod bsam gtan byed dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa shA
ri'i bu/ khyod nyon mongs pa spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te ma spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod 'das pa
la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te da ltar byung ba la gnas te bsam gtan
byed| ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas te
bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod mig la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas te bsam gtan
byed| ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la gnas te bsam gtan byed/
ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan
byed| ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod nang la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te phyi rol la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te phyi nang la gnas te bsam gtan
byed| ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod lus la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sems la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/
'di ltar tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba dang / brjed pa med par gnas par bya ba'i phyir te de lta bu'i phyir bsam gtan byed do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun
pa shA ri'i bu/ chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'am/ tshe 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'am/ brjed pa med pa'i chos de dag dmigs sam/ shA ri'i bus
smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ bdag gis chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'am/ tshe 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'i chos de dag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing
mi dmigs mod kyi/ 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin pa de la bdag brten cing gnas so//
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang
la rten cing gnas/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di la dge slong ni 'das pa la rten cing gnas so/ /ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas so/ /da ltar byung ba la rten cing
gnas so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te sems kyi bar la rten cing gnas par khong du chud par bya ste/ 'jam dpal/ chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben
par gsungs pa yin te/ bdag chos de dag la rten cing gnas so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang gi phyir/ 'di skad ces/
'das pa la rten cing gnas/ ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ da ltar byung ba la rten cing rab tu dben pa la gnas pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems kyi bar la rten cing rab tu
dben pa la gnas shing smra/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang yod pa ma yin/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang yod pa ma yin/
gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de'ang yod ma yin te/ de ltar chos de dag ni yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar/ gnas brten shA ri'i bu/ de 'di skad ces/ 'das pa la rten cing gnas
ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ da ltar byung ba la rten cing gnas zhes smra/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos la ni gnas pa med do/ /yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid
dang | ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni tsa'ang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang gi 'ang ma yin/ gang la'ang mi gnas te/ gang mi
gnas pa de'i gnas dmigs su med do/ /yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ces brjod cing kun tu gnas
nas smra ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa'o/ /de ci phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni g.yo ba med pa rlom sems med pa'o/ /'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni nyams
pa med pa'o/ /'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni stong pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa'o/ /yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang dmigs su med/ gang
ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang dmigs su med/ gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de'ang dmigs su med pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems kyi bar gyi rang bzhin nyid de'ang
dmigs su med do/ /'on kyang / btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par gang bstan pa'am/ rab tu bshad par nus pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i
bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs nas chos ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid yod pa
ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ chos kyang yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la
bzhugs te chos ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/ chos thams cad kyang yod pa ma yin te
dmigs su med/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med do/ /de'i chos bstan pa ni 'di 'dra ste/ 'di la dmigs pa'am/ mi
dmigs pa gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa'am mi brjod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar de
bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa yang dag par chad pa/ btags pa med pa/ gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ su zhig chos bstan pa 'di lta bu
'di'i snod du 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang 'dus byas kyi khams rnam par 'khrugs par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod par
yang mi 'gyur ba de ni chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro/ /gang 'das pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing 'das pa'i chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang
'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba de chos
bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro/ /gang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mi mthong zhing de nye bar len par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu
'di'i snod du 'gyur ro/ /gang bdag dang / bdag med par yang spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang len pa dang / 'dor bar yang spyod par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu
'di'i snod du 'gyur te/ de ni bshad pa 'di'i don kun shes par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis
smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ bshad pa 'di'i don shes par 'gyur ba ci zhig yod na/ 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur zhes de skad 'dri/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
dpal/ chos zab mo bstan pa 'di mngon sum du 'gyur ba nyung / 'di ni yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba nyung ngo / /'jam dpal/ dgra bcom pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob
pa rnams kyang phyogs 'di la sgyid lug par 'gyur na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ dgra bcom pa rnams
la ni sa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'ang med na sa gang la dgra bcom pa gnas par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni gnas med pas rab tu phye
pa'o| |dgra bcom pa dag ni dmigs su med pas rab tu phye ba'o/ /dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang / mi brjod pa shin tu chad pas rab tu phye ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na /
'di ltar dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang / mi brjod pa yang dag par chad pa ste btags pa med pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa dag ni sar dbye ba dang
bral ba/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba/ 'jug pa med pa/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ dgra bcom pa dag ni 'dus ma byas pa/ gnas pa med pa yin na ci
zhig dgra bcom pa dag gi sar 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang / gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni ming dang / gzugs la rnam par
rtog go/ ming dang / gzugs de'ang rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med par dgra bcom pa rnams kyis shes te/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang / gzugs kyis
rab tu phye ba ma yin no/ /byis pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/ byis pa'i chos dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so/ /nam mi
dmigs pa de'i tshe na mi rtog go /kun tu mi spyod do/ /de spyod pa med/ spros pa med cing nye bar zhi ste/ yod do zhes khas mi len/ med do zhes khas mi len/ yod
kyang yod la med kyang med do zhes khas mi len/ yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin zhes de skad kyang khas mi len to/ /nam khas mi len pa de na dmigs
pa med do/ /de dmigs pa thams cad dang bral bas sems med cing sems dang bral te gnas med pa'i tshul gyis dge sbyong gi chos la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de'i dge slong lnga brgya po stan las langs nas/ 'di skad ces/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi blta'o/ /'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi mnyan to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de'ang spang bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ston pa mngon sum du gyur bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mtshan nyid gcig tu ston pas chos ma yin pa smra'o zhes
brjod nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod pa spyad snyam nas dong
ngo| |de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod 'di ltar sems can rnams kyis chos kun shes
par gyur par bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag stan
las langs nas 'phya smod/ mi snyan par zer zhing dong ngo / /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang gi phyir dge slong lnga brgya po de
dag 'di skad ces/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi blta'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi mnyan to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na gnas pa'i
phyogs de'ang spang bar bya'o zhes zer ba de ni legs so/ /legs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge slong de dag gi tshig de ni legs par smras pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med do/ /gang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med pa de la blta ba dang / mnyan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de'ang spang bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med pas gang
de'i gnas kyang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med do/ /gang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med pa de ni bsten par bya ba ma yin no/ /de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos pa dang / slar sa phyogs der log nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/
bdag cag ni ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar mi shes so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong dag /legs so/ /legs so/ /de lta bu ni ston pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis
bya ba ste/ dge slong dag/ 'di la ni kun shes par bya ba med/ rnam par shes par bya ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas med pa'i tshul
gyis gnas pa nyid do/ /chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de dbyings ma yin no/ /de ni yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med cing g.yo ba med la 'chi 'pho med do/ /gang g.yo ba med
cing 'chi 'pho med pa de kun shes par bya ba ma yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no/ /gang kun shes par bya ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba'i rlom sems med pa
de ni ston pa'i nyan thos zhes bya/ mchog thob pa zhes bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ sbyin gnas zhes bya'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya po de dag las dge slong bzhi
brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong brgya ni sems cher 'khrugs nas lus de nyid dang sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod
du lhung ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod sems can rjes su bsrung ba'i chos mi ston
pas dge slong brgya po de dag chud zos te ngo mtshar byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |shA ri'i bu/ khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ dge slong brgya po de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod du reg pa thang cig reg nas dga'
ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skya bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gal te dge slong de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos su zin na de dag gdon mi za bar
sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ las de zad nas mir skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten pas bskal par sems can dmyal ba
myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de'ang cung zad cig myong bar byas so/ /shA ri'i bu/ de'i phyir dge slong brgya po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog ma 'dus par
dgra bcom pa zag pa zad par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyi dang bcas pas thos na ni dam pa yin gyi/ bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms
par zhugs pas ni de lta ma yin/ tshad med pa bzhis ni de lta ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgoms pas ni de lta ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ma thos pas 'khor ba las yongs su ma grol/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na dang / 'che ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol zhes bshad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
'jam dpal/ 'di ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad pa ngo mtshar to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun
pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin nyid ni 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyang 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba 'ang ma yin no/ /sems can gyi khams kyang 'bri ba ma yin/
'phel ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med de tha snyad tsam du zad
pas ci'ang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang gi'ang ma yin/ gang la'ang mi gnas te gnas pa med do/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ gang 'di lta bu'i mi 'gag pa de
ni byang chub bo/ /byang chub gang yin pa de ni thar pa'o/ /thar pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni mi byed cing 'gyur ba med do/ /gang mi byed
cing 'gyur ba med pa de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid ni 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings
kyang 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no/ /sems can gyi khams kyang 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin
no| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med de tha snyad tsam du zad pas ci'ang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang gi yang ma yin/
gang la'ang mi gnas te gnas pa med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang / /
da ltar byung chos brjod pa ni/ /don gyis ma yin tha snyad tsam/ /gcig dang sna tshogs mtshan nyid min/ /mtshan nyid med par gang rtog pa/ /de dag nyid na mtshan
nyid 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid med la rtog pa med/ /rtog pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid min/ /'dus ma byas la gang rtog dang / /mya ngan 'das la gang rtog pa/ /gnyis ga
bdud kyi las yin zhes/ /de ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad/ /phung po skye mched khams kyi rnams/ /de dag ming gis brjod pa ste/ /ming dang skye med gang yin pa/ /de gnyis
mtshan nyid gcig pa yin/ /tshul bzhin la ni gang rtog pa/ /de nyid tshul bzhin ma yin no/ /mkhas pa cung zad mi rtog ste/ /stong pa ji bzhin spyod yul lo/ /gang dag
rtog pa de dag g.yo/ /rtog pa med pa g.yo ba med/ /rtog pa rnams ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /rtog pa med pa mya ngan 'da'/ /gang gis rang bzhin 'di shes pa/ /de ni
ye shes ldan zhes bya/ /de phyir zad pa rjes su thob/ /de ni rtog med ye shes so/ /ye shes kyis ni ye shes brjod/ /ye shes brjod pa rnams kyang gsog /ye shes
'di ltar gang bzod pa/ /de ni ye shes ldan zhes bya/ /gang gis stong gsum 'di dag rnams/ /rin chen bkang ste byin pa bas/ /gang gis dam chos 'di 'dra la//
bzod pa de ni bzod pa mchog /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan bsnyen pas ni/ /mdo sde 'di dang
mtshungs ma yin/ /chos 'di dang ni theg pa 'di/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs/ /mdo sde 'di la bsten byas na/ /thams cad de bzhin gshegs
par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags 'bu ma ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par
dag go /dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de dag thams cad bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog ces bya bar ming mthun par
'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan
pa shA ri'i bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /
'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su re n+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba
ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ A R+ya a mr-i ta byA ha ran nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi
brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
bdun khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig go /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya ba
'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo
g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te
zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod
la rtag tu skabs phye yi/ byams pa/ khyod ci dang / ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / dris pa de
dang | de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos du dag dang ldan na bdud kyi ris thams cad kyi sa bgegs
bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 'da' bar bgyi ba ma lags pa dang / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du tshe ring du skyong bar
bgyid pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /byams pa/ khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs
te| skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang | lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa khyod yang legs so/ /de'i phyir byams pa khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas
bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos lnga dang ldan na bdud kyi ris thams cad kyi bgegs bya bar mi 'gyur
ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir tshe ring du skyong bar byed pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /lnga po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyun mi 'chad par chos sbyin pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par sems
can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po bsgom pa
dang | rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten rnying pa bcos pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la mos par bya ba ste/ byams
pa| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na bdud kyi ris thams cad kyis bgegs bya bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor
thams cad kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir tshe ring du skyong bar byed pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos lnga bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med pa zag pa rnams las
sems rnam par grol lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la
chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba nyon mongs pa med pa rnam par dag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag spobs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
kyi bu| da de'i dus la bab par shes na'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba de'i tshe stan las langs te bla gos
phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug thams cad kyi bro nad can/ lta ba thams cad kyi rab rib dang / ling tog gi mun pas bsgribs pa thams
cad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bro nad gso ba dang / chos kyi mig bla na med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di ni a
la la rmad du byung ba chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di ni a la la bdud rtsi chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam
grangs bstan pa 'di ni a la la sman pa'i rgyal po chen po lta bu lags so/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'ang rung ste/ gang dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs
'di grag par gyur pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i tshogs bsags pa dag ste/ sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa lags/ sangs rgyas thams cad la
lta ba dang ldan pa lags/ skye bo mang po la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa lags/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa lags so/ /de dag las kyi sgrib pa de yongs
su dag nas dud 'gro'i yul de las yongs su thar te mi'i lus thob par 'gyur zhing / thob nas kyang tshe rabs snga ma dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa
rnyed nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'tshal ba de dang / der skye bar 'gyur na/ mir gyur nas thos pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni 'di ltar sems can rnams kyi don chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can de
dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges pa'i tshogs la gnas par 'gyur ba lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das / de dag ni de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /byams pa/ khyod kyis ji skad
smras pa de ni de bzhin no/ /de ni bden no/ /de ni kho na'o/ /de ni ma nor ba'o/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di the tshom dang bcas pas thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang
dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa ma yin na/ gang dag the tshom med par nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rgya cher
yang dag par ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mdo sde 'dzin pa de lta bu de dag la bdud kyi las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
mug dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la rims nad dam/ nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
yul gang na mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba gnas pa'am/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du bris te yod pa'i yul der nad dang / yams kyi
nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab cing
sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur ba 'jigs pa chen pos 'jig pa'i dus la bab pa na bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skyes bu dam pa de
dag la rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/ /de dag la gzi byin stsal bar bgyi'o/ /yul gang na mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa de lta bu dag gnas pa'i yul der bdag gis dus ma lags
pa'i bser ma dang / dgung char dang / mu ge dang / bro nad yang ba dang / mi ngas dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa
thams cad rab tu zhi par bgyi'o/ /yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / glegs bam du bgyis pa'am/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags pa
la mchod pa bgyid pa'i yul der bdag gis byin gyi rlabs kyis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad dang / chom rkun dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i
ya nga ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag na chos smra ba 'di lta bu dang / mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i yul der bdag gis lo tog dang / nor dang /
'bru dang / me tog dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba thams cad 'byung bar byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so/ /legs so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su
gtad kyi phyi ma'i tshe/ phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus la bab cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur la/ 'jigs pa chen pos 'jig pa'i
dus la bab pa'i tshe khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can thams cad la bstan par bya'o/ /rab tu bsgrag par bya'o/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag gis mos pa bskyed
par bya'o/ /don dam pa'i chos nyid tshad mar byas la mngon par brtson pas las gzhan mi bya bar rab tu bsgrag par bya'o/ /don dam pa'i chos nyid kho na las brtsams
te dbang du byas la bstan par bya'o/ /ci nas kyang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log par don rtogs par 'gyur ba de
ltar bstan par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mjug tu phyin pa'i dus la bab par shes nas/
bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod nas/ 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyi ba
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni a la la bdud rtsi brjod pa lags so zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
bo| chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos par dka' yi/ /khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig / yi ger bris shig/ chongs shig / lhogs shig / kun chub
par gyis shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
'di bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya bar zungs shig/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bdud
rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA wa rma dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya mai trI ya pra s+thA na nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam
po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu
rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i
dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa yin zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang phyir
mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs
pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob
dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'khod
do| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan
pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag
phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar dus yol bar mdzad do/ /de nas 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byams pa/ 'di ltar byas pa dang / zhus nas zhu ba lung
bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs 'byed par mdzad do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/
rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi phyed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched yongs su shes
par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zad par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed/ pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/
pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed na/ de ltar na zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs 'byed par
mdzad do/ /gal te khyod 'du byed rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/ gal te khyod bden
pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/ lam dang / lam bsgom par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/ gal te khyod 'bras bu thob par bya ba dang /
mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/ gal te khyod mi gnas pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed dam/ yi ge rnams mi brjod par zhu bar byed
na| de lta na zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs 'byed par mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa ji tsam du sgro 'dogs
pa de tsam du chags pa yod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ sgro btags pa/ sgro btags pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal/ ji tsam gyis na sgro btags par
'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ mtshan ma med pa mnyam pa nyid
kyis mnyam pa yin/ smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ ji lta ba bzhin mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis
mnyam pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ mi skye mi 'gag mi gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/
ma skyes ma byung ba mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin na/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang dag 'di ltar chos
thams cad mnyam pa nyid la mi mnyam par brtags nas med bzhin du sgro 'dogs pas sgro 'dogs par byed de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni chos so/ /'di ni dge 'dun
no| |'di ni bdag go/ 'di ni sems can no/ /'di ni gang zag go/ 'di ni shed las skyes pa'o/ /'di ni shed bu'o/ /'di ni byed pa po'o/ /'di ni tshor ba po'o/ /'di ni chad pa'o/ /
'di ni rtag pa'o/ /'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/ /'di ni nyan thos so/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/ /'di ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/ /'di ni
kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o/ /'di ni zag pa med pa'o/ /'di ni 'dus byas so/ /'di ni 'dus ma byas so/ /'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o//
'di ni rnam par byang ba'o/ /'di ni dge ba'o/ /'di ni mi dge ba'o/ /'di ni 'jig rten pa'o/ /'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /'di ni 'khor ba'o/ /'di ni
mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /'di ni dngos po'o/ /'di ni dngos po ma yin pa'o/ /'di ni yod pa'o/ /'di ni med pa'o/ /'di ni thob pa'o/ /
'di ni mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /'di ni mngon sum du bya ba'o/ /'di ni lam mo/ /'di ni lam gyi 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba 'di ni sgro btags pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ mnyam pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med cing gang dag 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid du sgro 'dogs pa yin
te/ mi mnyam par sgro 'dogs pa ni ma yin la/ gang dag mthong ba med par mnyam pa nyid mthong ba de dag ni mnyam pa nyid mthong ba yin / sgro 'dogs pa
la spyod pa ni mi mnyam par mthong ba yin zhing / gang dag mnyam pa nyid la sgro mi 'dogs pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid du mthong pa yin la/ sgro 'dogs pa la
spyod pa ni mnyam pa nyid mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol
te/ dge slong de dag 'dul ba la dbang mdzad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar dus yol bar mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po byams pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ kho bo ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu
bar mi byed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed pa nas/ kho bo ni mi
gnas pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed do/ /'jam dpal/ kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa la ci nas de bzhin nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ltar zhu bar byed do/ /'jam
dpal/ kho bo ni gang dag de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / gang dag chos thams cad dben pa nyid kyi phyir chos ci'ang mi dmigs pa dang / gang dag chos kyi dbyings
mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / gang dag 'khor ba mi dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba las 'da' bar mi byed
pa dang / gang dag gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa nyid dang / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa nyid kyi phyir mya ngan las 'das pa thob par mi byed pa de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs
pa la zhu bar byed do/ /'jam dpal/ kho po ni ci nas yi ge rnams kyang mi brjod/ tshig gi lam la'ang mi dpyod la/ shes rab kyis kyang bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba
dang / shes pa'ang gang yang med la/ 'di la rnam par grol ba'ang gang yang med pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed do/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ yi ge stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thams cad skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /de nas 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus par gyur pa de dag
'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de kho na ltar ldem po ngag snel zhir 'dug pa'i tshig 'di dag kyang ston la
brjod pa thams cad kyang chos nyid dang mthun par sbyor ba las na zab mo'i shes rab dang ldan no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di de tsam du zab mo'i bzod pa
la nges shing shes rab dang / spobs pa ston pa la mkhas pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas yun ji
srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de/ bcom ldan 'das/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bka' stsal du gsol/ de ltar bgyis na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis gnas de dag kyang thos la/ 'jug pa de'ang thos nas slar zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtson par 'gyur lags so/ /
de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po byams pas ni sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la bya ba byas so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/ /zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan no/ /rigs kyi bu / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po byams pa yang dag par zhugs te/ bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong lon nas de'i 'og tu gdong ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi tha dad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po byams pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mtshan ci lags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyis legs par bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal
lo zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rnam par rtse ba/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yun
ring zhing tshad med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ dpag tu med pa'i snga rol de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das gser bzang 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od kyi spu'i khung bu re re nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig
'bum phrag mang po byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag kyang gser gyi 'od ltar bzang la 'od zer re res kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
re re'i 'od kyis snang bar byed do/ /'od zer re res kyang pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis shar phyogs 'gengs par byed do/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs
dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /phyogs re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa re re sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig
'bum phrag du ma 'gengs par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re res kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma sangs rgyas dang / chos rnams la 'dul bar
mdzad de/ phyir mi ldog pa la 'god do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i gser gyi 'od
kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang bar byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyi ma dang / zla ba gnyis kyi ming med do/ /rgyu skar dang / gza'
dang / skar ma dang / me'i 'od kyi ming yang mi grag go /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse
bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ji ltar gdugs mtshan rnam par bzhag par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sa gzhi chen po de rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yin te/ lag
mthil ltar mnyam par gyur la rin po che sna bdun gyi sa gzhi chen po de las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam la mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang /
dri zhim po'i ngad ldang la yid du 'ong ba dag mngon par 'phags te/ pad+ma re re las dri bsung gi ngad ldang ba'i dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khams khyab ste/ sems can gang dag gis dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges so/ /pad+ma de dag kyang snga dro'i dus
kyi tshe ni me tog rgyas la/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe na rnyis par gyur te/ des na sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ phye ma red kyi dus la bab bo snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu
de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin mtshan rnam
par bzhag par mngon pa yod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad ni tha na ming tsam yang med do/ /sdug bsngal ba'i ming tsam dang / nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ming tsam yang med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khrig pa'i chos dang bral ba/ dri nga ba med pa 'ba' zhig gis yongs
su gang bar gyur to/ /'dus pa re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod de/ de'i mjug tu bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa'
dpag tu med grangs med par 'dus par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'ang chos gzhan mi ston te/
byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'ba' zhig ston par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i
'khor lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos gang yang de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
chos gang yang yang dag pa'i mtha' las phyir mi ldog pa dang / 'dod chags 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / zhe sdang zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi
ldog pa dang / gti mug gti mug gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / gzugs gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / mig mig gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa
dang | rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yid kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med la/ dngos po
med pa gang yin pa de ni gang nas kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ gang du'ang mi 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs
yang dag par ston to/ /de'i tshe chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gser mdog bya ba zhig byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/
rgyal po gser mdog des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
chen po dang bcas pa la lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod
pa byas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dag lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi med kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pas kyang rgyal po gser
mdog gi bsam pa rig gnas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de la bsnyen bkur bya bar spro bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po gser mdog
gi 'khor gyi khams dpag tshad brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po zhig byas te/ 'khor gyi khyams der dar gyi lda ldi ni bres/ me tog gis ni bus mo nub pa tsam du khyab par byas/ steng
gi bar snang la ni mu tig dmar po'i dra ba bres/ snying po'i spos kyi mchog gis ni bdugs te/ 'khor gyi khyams der de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
gdan bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba'i ras bcos bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bting ba khri'i rkang pa rin po che du mas spras pa zhig bshams so/ /byang chub
sems dpa' re re'i stan yang bye ba phrag 'bum ri ba dag bshams so/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de dpag tshad nyis stong na bzhugs te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar
rgyal po gser mdog gis gshegs shul dpag tshad nyis stong legs par brgyan nas/ 'di lta ste/ lam de'i ngos g.yas g.yon du stegs bu rin po che sna tshogs
kyis spras pa dag byas so/ /lam de'ang pus mo nub pa tsam du me tog gis khebs par byas so/ /steng gi bar snang la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i bla bre bres
so| /stegs bu de dag la'ang rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'phang du mda' rgyang gang tsam yod pa dag btsugs so/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa gcig nas rin po
che'i shing ljon pa gcig tu rin po che'i thag gu bres so/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rdzing rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba gser gyi bye
ma brdal ba/ bai DUR+ya'i the ma skas kyi rim pa dang bcas pa/ me tog ut+pal la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ dur pa skad 'byin pa dang / ldan pa dag
byas so/ /de bzhin du rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i bar thams cad du'ang rdzing dag byas te bkod pa de kho na dang 'dri bar bkod do/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi
drung du me tog sil ma thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /rin po che'i spos kyi snod thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / mkhar
rnga dang / kim pa la dang / pi wang dang / khar dkrol la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /gdugs dang /
rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /de ltar rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re'i drung thams cad du mi brgya phrag de snyed de snyed bkod nas/
gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od phan tshun du gshegs pa de'i tshe khyod kyis me tog sil ma 'di dag gis gtor cig /tsan+dan gyi phye ma
'di dag gis gtor cig /pog phor 'di dag gis bdugs par gyis shig /sil snyan 'di dag kyang dkrol cig /gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan 'di
dag kyang sgrengs shig ces bsgo'o/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du rin po che'i me tog gi snod thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga
brgya'ang bkod do/ /lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de lam 'di nas phan tshun du gshegs pa de'i tshe khyod kyis rin po che'i me
tog 'di dag gis gtor cig ces bsgo'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de gtsug lag khang de nas byung ma thag
tu 'khor gyi khyams su gshegs te de'i bar du gtsug lag khang nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang ba byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar lam dpag tshad
nyis stong po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re phan tshun du 'dom re re tsam na 'greng
ngo| |rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de phan tshun du gshegs pa na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' re re'i mgo bo'i drang
thad kyi steng na dngul gyi gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu ba can/ mu tig dmar po'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yar ka'i dra bas bskor ba/ ma bzung bar
nam mkha' la phan tshun du 'gro'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /rin po che'i gdugs de dag la dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba btags pa gang
yin pa de dag rlung gi bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/ rin po che'i gdugs de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra ji lta bu 'byung ba de 'dra ba ni sil snyan
yan lag 'bum dang ldan pa las kyang mi 'byung ngo / /rin po che'i gdugs dang / dril bu g.yer ka de dag dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i lo ma de dag dang / rin po che'i
thag gu de dag dang / rin po che'i stegs bu de dag dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs de dag las kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byung ste/
de na sems can gang dag sbyin pa la mos pa de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i sgra thos so/ /gang dag tshul khrims la mos pa de dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi sgra thos so/ /de bzhin
du gang dag bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan la mos pa dang / gang dag shes rab la mos pa de dag gis ni shes rab kyi sgra thos so/ /de bzhin du
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sga dang / de bzhin du dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang
chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi sgra dang / de bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par
rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gi sgra 'byung ste/ sems can rnams ji lta bur mos pa de lta bu'i sgra 'byung zhing thos so/ /chos kyi sgra de thos nas kyang
sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de lam de nas phan tshun du gshegs pa na/ dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che 'bum phrag du
mas spras pa'i lha'i rin po che'i gdugs ma bzung bar 'phags te phan tshun du 'gro'o/ /rin po che'i gdugs de dang / dril bu g.yer ka de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las
kyang sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa byung ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de'i rin
po che'i gdugs de las byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba'i chos bstan pa gang lags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par
bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i brtsams pa tsam ngas bshad par bya'o//
rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya dang / mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya dang / smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
dang | gnas pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang / dngos po med pa'i phyag rgya dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag
rgya dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgya dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgya dang / dben pa'i phyag rgya dang / rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag
rgya dang / byed pa med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa'i phyag rgya dang / gzung du med pa dang / gnas med pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i
phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni phyag rgya brko bar sla ba'ang ma yin la phyag rgyar yang 'dug pa dang / phyag
rgya'i 'bur yang gdab tu med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas kyang med/ rkyen kyang med/ rgyu'ang med/ bskyed pa'ang med/ rten yang med pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang / nam mkha'i rnam pa can dang / nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang / nam
mkha'i ston par yang dag par shes pa dang / nam mkha' la ni chos thams cad gdags su med par gnas te gdags pa tsam du zad do/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i chos thams
cad gdags su med par gnas te gdags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad la'ang gdags su med par gnas te/ gdags pa tsam du zad par yang dag
par shes pa dang / gang chos rnams gdags pa tsam du shes pa de ni de bzhin nyid dang 'gal par mi byed pa'o/ /gang de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa de
ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya ste/ des na de bzhin nyid la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /bstan pa 'di bshad
pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par
brtse ba la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de byang chub sems dpa'i
dge 'dun dang bcas par 'khor gyi khyams der gshegs te/ der byon pa na lha 'bum dag mchod pa'i las bya ba la spro bar gyur to/ /me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang /
ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams 'thor bar byed do/ /lha'i me tog mnad ra ba'i char yang 'bebs so/ /sil snyan bye ba phrag 'bum dag kyang dkrol bar byed do/ /rigs
kyi bu| 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de 'khor gyi khyams der bzhugs pa na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag
po tshangs pa mchod pa'i las bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par gyur to/ /mchod pa ji lta bu dag gi phyir spro bar gyur ce na/ 'di
lta ste| de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas par bzhugs pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' re re'i rgyab na glang po che dkar po rgyan
thams cad kyis brgyan pa nye bar gnas la/ glang po che'i rgyal po de'i sna la'ang 'di lta ste/ rlung dang / nyi ma bskyab pa'i phyir rin po che'i
gdugs gsal zhing blta na sdug pa thogs pa dang / glang po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sna la'ang mu tig sngon po gsal ba'i mu tig gi do shal 'phyang ba dang / mu tig
gi do shal de las kyang chu bsil zhing bai DUR+ya sngon po 'dra la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'bab ste/ chu des chu'i bya ba byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dag 'khod
ma thag tu/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mthus lag pa g.yas pa la rin po che'i lhung bzed byung bar gyur to/ /lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lhung bzed 'dzin
par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de la ni tshangs pa nyid rin po che'i gdugs thogs te snam logs na 'dug go /rin po che'i gdugs de las
kyang mu tig gi do shal dag 'phyang ngo / /mu tig gi do shal de dag las kyang chu bsil zhing bai DUR+ya sngon po 'dra la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'bab ste/ chu des de
bzhin gshegs pa de'i chu'i bya ba mdzad do/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni bcom ldan 'das de'i lhung bzed 'dzin to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de
byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas par bzhugs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag la lha mo re re'i mdun na 'dug ste/ lha'i spos dri zhim po sna du ma mchig la
'thag par byed do/ /spos de 'thag pa na'ang rdzi phyogs dang / rdzi phyogs ma yin par ser bu ldang ste/ ser bu des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la spos kyis phog par byed
do| |skyes bu dam pa de dag ni dring ba med pa ste/ de dag ni lha mo'i 'du shes kyang 'jug par mi byed la de dag ni spos kyi mtshan ma'ang mi skyed na chags par lta ga la 'gyur te
de ni gnas med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar rgyal po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od bzhugs par rig nas bu stong dang / bud med brgyad khri bzhi
stong dang / rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / khyim bdag brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / tshong dpon brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / blon po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / bu mo brgyad khri
bzhi stong dang / gzhan yang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag dang lhan cig tu rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba bsod pa mang po mchog tu gtsang bas tshim par byas te ci
bzhed pa bstabs so/ /tshim par byas shing ci bzhed pa bstabs te bshos gsol nas gtsang sder gyu ste phyag bcabs par rig nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bye ba 'bum
phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba'i ras bcos bu phrugs gcig phul lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' re re la'ang bye ba phrag 'bum ri ba'i ras
bcos bu phrugs re re phul lo/ /phul nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / yul mi gtso bo rnams dang lhan cig tu thal mo sbyar nas/ 'di lta ste/ chos mnyan
pa la gus pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des skye bo'i tshogs chen po gus
par 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'dod par thugs su chud nas sgo so so ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo so so ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis chos kyi rnam grangs de legs par bka' stsal du gsol/ de ltar bgyis na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang
sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de la slob par 'gyur lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse ba la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de las brtsams pa tsam
zhig bshad par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo so so ba ni gzhan ma yin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug kho nar zad de/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo so so ba ni de yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid la sngon gyi de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo'ang bskor/ sems
can rnams kyang yongs su smin par mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das la/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sgo so so ba 'di nyid la bslabs
nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa'i de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
'di dag nyid yang dag par smra bas smra'o/ /de la sgo so so pa de'i bye brag ni gang yin/ nyes pa ni gang yin/ rnam par gnon pa ni gang yin/ nges par 'byung ba ni gang
yin zhe na/ ser sna'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems
ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /nor kun tu bsrung la bgo bsha' mi byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' gang
ser sna'i sems rnam par gnon cing bcom nas sbyin pa yid la byed pa bskyed pa de ni de'i rnam par gnon pa yin no/ /de longs spyod ji ltar chung yang rung / longs spyod
rgya chen po dag yod kyang rung ste/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / slong ba rnams la bgo bsha' byed la de dga' ba'i sems dang / kun tu 'dzin pa med pa'i sems dang /
