mgu ba'i sems dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med par sems can thams cad la snying rje bas phan pa'i dngos po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pas lag pa brkyang
ste| sbyin pa byin par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sgo so so ba la slob pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges par 'byung ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'chal
pa'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang / zhig pa'i tshul khrims dang / ral pa'i tshul khrims
dang / nag nog gi tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dres
pa'i tshul khrims dang / zhig pa'i tshul khrims dang / ral pa'i tshul khrims dang / nag nog gi tshul khrims gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi
sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ dmigs pa can gyi sems bskyed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
pa'am/ dmigs pa'i lta ba 'dod pa dang / nyan thos kyi gtam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam mam/ dmigs pa can gyi gtam la dga' bar 'dzin pa 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa'i tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / tshul khrims 'dres pa dang / tshul khrims zhig pa dang / tshul khrims ral ba dang / tshul khrims nag nog can
zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la mi spyod pa dang / mi slob pa ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rab yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de
bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa gzhan las 'gal ba bgyi na ni tshul khrims 'chal par mi 'gyur la/ gang gi tshe na nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
sam| dmigs pa can gyi sems bskyed pa de'i tshe ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rab tu 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa gzhan las 'gal bar byas
sam/ ngas ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi gang dag gsungs pa de dag gi nyes pa byas sam/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 'dug gam/ mtshams med pa
lnga byas su zin kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi sems kyang ma btang ma spangs te/ byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral la/ dmigs pa can gyi sems dang / mngon par zhen
pa'i sems kyang mi skyed na byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa kho na yin pa dang / tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul khrims ma 'dres pa dang / tshul khrims ma zhig
pa dang / tshul khrims ma ral ba dang / tshul khrims nag nog can ma yin par gzung bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa'ang yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na| de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub la bar du gcod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i las byas pas srid par 'gro ba bskyed du zin
kyang 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni ji tsam du srid par 'gro ba bskyed pa de tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la bslabs su zin kyang de nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ dmigs par lta
ba dang lhan cig bsten par byed na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims las nyams par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
gang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong la/ dmigs par lta ba'i sems kyang mi bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa
yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / gnod sems kyi tha ba'i nyes pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /sems can rnams la mi snyoms pa'i yid la byed pa ni
byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /sems can rnams dang / chos rnams la tha dad par 'du shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /sems can la dmigs pa la
brten pa'i byams pa phyogs gcig pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /stong pa nyid la mi bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di la ni sbyin no/ /'di la ni
mi sbyin no snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di la ni yon dbul lo/ /'di la ni mi dbul lo snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di la ni chos bshad par bya'o/ /

'di la ni chos bshad par mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di la ni bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /'di la ni bsnyen bkur mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /byang chub
sems dpa' ji tsam du so sor 'gyed par byed de/ 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'o snyam du so sor phye nas tshul khrims 'chal pa la brnyas par
byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad la sems mnyam
par bya dgos shing / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' lta bur snyoms pa'i sems dang / stong pa nyid la bzod pa dang /
ldan par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can gang yang yongs su mi gtong la/ mi gnas pa'i sems dang / tshad nges par mi byed pas sems can thams cad
kyi phyir snying rje bskyed cing byams pas mos par byas te/ khyab par byas nas bsgrubs te gnas la/ chos rnams la'ang stong ngo snyam du bzod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub
sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa yin no/ /gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khor ba la tshad nges par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ste/ bskal pa
'di tsam gyi bar du ni bdag 'khor bar bya'o/ /bskal pa 'di tsam gyi bar du ni 'khor bar mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /sems
can 'di snyed cig ni bdag gis dgrol bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di nyid cig ni bdag gis dgrol bar mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /'di ni brtson 'grus
so| |bdag ni brtson 'grus can no/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes
pa'o| |de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar go cha bgo bar bya ste/ 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha'
mi mngon no zhes ji skad du 'byung ba de srid du bdag 'khor ba na 'khor 'khor te/ gal te bdag sems can re re'i phyir yang bskal pa de kho na snyed du 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya
dgos par gyur na'ang bdag gis spro bar bya'o/ /rnam grangs 'di bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa de ji srid pa de srid du 'khor ba na 'khor
dgos na'ang bdag gis spro ste/ de'ang brtson 'grus dang / nga rgyal dang / byang chub la mngon par zhen pa spangs la mi dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go chas spro bar bya'o snyam ste/ de
ltar byang chub sems dpa' go cha bgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' gang grong dang / grong
khyer dang / gros rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu song na sems can rnams kyi don nus shing lcogs la/ 'os yin bzhin du de dgon pa'i phyogs dben pa zhig tu
'dug nas dben pa na spyod cing bsam gtan gyi ro'i dga' ba dang / bde ba la brten cing gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin pa'ang byin
par byed la skyo ba'ang med/ sems kyi dmigs pa la'ang mi brten/ nang du yang dag 'jog kyang 'phel bar byed/ bsam gtan gyi ro myong ba'ang med/ mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan
pa'ang yin na byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa na chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par shes nas 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gang yang med do snyam du de ltar shes nas
bdag nyid dul bar bya ba dang / zhi gnas la rnal 'byor du brtson par gnas la/ sems can gzhan phyin ci log tu dmigs pa'i 'dzin 'khris zin pa de dag la stong pa nyid
bdag med pa'i tshul de mi brjod mi ston/ brda sprod par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i thabs la mi mkhas pa yin par rig
par bya ste/ nyes par byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par shes
shing chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par shes nas 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gang yang med do snyam ste 'di de ltar
ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos 'di dag lus kyis mngon sum du byas te thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan la sems can phyin ci log tu sems shing
dmigs pa can gang yin pa de dag kyang phyin ci log gis zin cing dmigs pa'i sems su gyur pa de las rab tu grol bar byas nas/ de dag la'ang chos thams
cad ngo bo nyid med do zhes ston cing de dag kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya ba la 'dzud par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni thabs
la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang / slob pa'ang yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od bshos gsol nas/ 'khor gyi khyams der 'khor de'i nang du byang chub
sems dpa'i sgo so so ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can tshad med pa dag bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam
grangs las brtsams te/ chos bstan du zin kyang spobs pa'am/ chos kyi sgo rnams zad par mi 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang de'i brtsams pa tsam bstan pa yin no/ /rigs kyi
bu| de ltar na rgyal po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi tham
par bkod pa de lta bu dang / bsnyen bkur dang / phu dud du bya ba de lta bus bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas so// //bam po
gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal
po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gtsug lag khang ma bgyis lags sam/ de bzhin
gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na bzhugs bzhugs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rang rang gi sprul
pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang na gnas gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la bka' stsal pa/
rigs kyi bu/ de ltar lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag 'das pa'i tha ma'i nyin par rgyal po gser mdog gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bshos gsol /
yon phul te/ slar gshegs par rig nas bsam pa 'di lta bu zhig bsams te/ ci bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya'am/
'on te tshangs par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya'am/ 'on te 'khor los bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya snyam mo/ /de nas de'i sems bskyed
pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des thugs su chud do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis
mkhyen nas rgyal po dang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gi mdun du steng gi bar snang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de kho na bzhin du rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
pa'i lus shig sprul te/ de steng gi bar snang de la 'dug nas rgyal po gser mdog la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/ /dper na mi ni shes rab 'chal/ /byis
pa'i rang bzhin gyur pa zhig /rgyal po bsnyen bkur byas nas ni/ /bya dga' chung ngu gsol bar byed/ /de bzhin la las sangs rgyas la/ /bsam gyis mi khyab
mchod byas nas/ /tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal po'i srid/ /dma' ba'i gnas la 'dod par byed/ /rgyal por gyur dang brgya byin dang / /de bzhin tshangs par 'gyur ba
rnams/ /'di dag mi rtag brtan ma yin/ /brnyan ma yin te 'jig tshul can/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis/ /sangs
rgyas 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyis/ /de 'dra'i sems ni bsngags pa yin/ /rgyal po khyod ni yul 'khor bcas/ /mchod pa rgya chen byas zin gyi/ /byang chub sems
ni bla na med/ /rgya chen sems ni khyod kyis bskyed/ /dma' ba'i smon lam ma 'debs shig /de ni byis pa'i spyod yul yin/ /shes rab bzang
po mkhas par gyis/ /byang chub mchog la 'jug par gyis/ /mya ngan 'das pa 'dod pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs rnams la/ /gang gis stong gsum
thams cad kyang / /rin chen bkang ste phul ba pas/ /gang gis thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /sems kyis byang chub bsngo byas la/ /tshig tu brjod pa ma byas kyang / /de ni de
bas shin tu che/ /gang gis sems can thams cad la/ /bskal pa bye ba brjod med du/ /sems can kun la bsnyen byas kyang / /de yi bcu drug char mi phod/ /gang
zhig thal sbyar byang chub sems bskyed dang / /phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten don mdzad pa/ /rnam 'dren sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs rnams la/ /bsod nams
'dod pa'i mi 'gas sngon chad kyi/ /'khor bar bskal pa bye bar mchod pa bas/ /mi gang mkhas shing mdzangs pa'i rang bzhin can/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan
la yid ches shing / /byang chub sems ni brtan por bskyed nas kyang / /bde gshegs mchod rten la ni me tog 'bul/ /'di ni de bas bsod nams khyad par
brjod/ /byang chub sems kyis me tog 'bul byed la/ /bsod nams snga ma de ni dper mi rung / /rgya mtsho dang ni chu yi thigs pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems
can ji snyed pa/ /bskal pa re re la ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bskal pa mang por las gzhan mi byed par/ /bsod nams bshad kyang mtha' ni thug pa med/ /de dag byang
chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan/ /bskal pa mtha' yas bar du bshad na yang / /cung zad tsam yang yongs su brjod mi 'gyur/ /sa gzhi dag las rdul ni blangs pa bzhin/ /
de ltar rgyal po skyes mchog khyod kyis kyang / /byang chub sems kyi phan yon 'di thos nas/ /myur du blo gros dma' ba kun spongs la/ /byang chub phyir ni rgya chen sems skyed cig/
'jig rten 'dren pa gser gyi mchod sdong 'od/ /bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan kun ldan pa/ /de yis byang chub sems kyi rnam par smin/ /'di 'dra zhes ni phan yon 'di dag
bstan/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan pa yi/ /bsod nams de la gal te gzugs yod na/ /zhing rnams gang+gA'i bye snyed gang byas kyang / /de dag bkang bas cha tsam zad pa
med| |rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra thos nas kyang / /rgyal po'i gtso bo sems ni dga' gyur te/ /sor mo bcu yis thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes ni
tshigs su smras/ /byang chub phyir ni bdag gis sems bskyed do/ /bdag ni chos rje sangs rgyas grub par shog /byang chub rdul bral 'dus
ma byas rtogs nas/ /sems can gang+gA'i bye snyed dgrol bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas sku des tshigs bcad 'di brjod nas/ /de tshe rgyal po'i gtso bo dga' gyur pa/ /shes nas
stong gsum thams cad rab g.yos te/ /ngang ba'i rgyal po bzhin du mkha' las song / /rgyal po gser mdog sems ni dad gyur nas/ /bu dang bu mo de bzhin chung ma
dang / /rgyal po dang ni tshong dpon khyim bdag rnams/ /sangs rgyas la ni phyag 'tshal 'dod zhes pos/ /bye ba brgya phrag drug cus yongs bskor zhing / /me tog rnams dang
phreng dang bdug pa thogs/ /sangs rgyas ga la bar ni gnyi rgyud song / /zhabs la phyag btsal nas ni phyogs gcig 'dug /de bzhin bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /blon po
dang ni tshong dpon khyim bdag dang / /rgyal po gzhan dang de bzhin 'khor gyi rnams/ /de dag kyang ni phyag btsal gus par 'khod/ /lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin bar
snang thams cad khyab/ /sil snyan dkrol zhing me tog char pa phab/ /gser gyi mdog de yul gyi mis bskor nas/ /thal mo sbyar byas sangs rgyas zhu bar byed/ /
stobs bcu ldan pa dpag med lha yi lha/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba khyod la zhu/ /gang gis byang chub sems ni brtan por bskyed/ /de yi bsod nams ji tsam bskyed 'gyur
lags/ /bcom ldan ji ltar spyod pa spyad bgyis na/ /bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal mi mthong par/ /nges par bde dang bde blag tshim gyur pas/ /byang chub bdud rtsi mya
ngan med pa rtogs/ /bdag gzhar rkang lag btang yang mi 'tshal zhing / /mgo dang rang sha stsal yang mi 'tshal bar/ /bdag ni nges par bder gnas spyod pa yi/ /
thabs 'dir thub pas bdag la bstan du gsol/ /rtag tu bde dang bde blag ldan par shog /nam yang bdag lus sdug bsngal ma gyur cig /byams dang bzod dang
dul dang sdom pa la/ /gnas nas bdag gis byang chub mchog reg shog /le lo ma mchis rtag tu bslab la slob/ /bdag gis bslab pa nam yang gzhig mi bgyi/ /'dren
pa bdag ni dam bcas brtan par bgyi/ /nam yang tshig tsam lhur len yong mi bgyid/ /rang byung bsod nams 'bras bu bdag la gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa
bde ba gsungs/ /ji ltar spyad pa'i bslab pa bka' stsal pa/ /thos nas ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par bgyi/ /gser 'od gser bkod 'od bzang des gsungs pa/ /kye
kye sa yi bdag po mnyan par gyis/ /bde ba'i rgyu yi bsod nams khyod la bshad/ /bslab pa'ang bshad kyi de phyir nga las nyon/ /gang gis
stong gsum rin chen gang byas la/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la 'bul byed pa/ /de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa/ /bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur/ /
gang gis zhing rnams gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ /rin chen gang bar byas nas sbyin pa byin/ /de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa/ /bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur//
gang gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /sems can thams cad la ni mchod pa byed/ /de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa/ /bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur//
gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom gyur/ /ye shes dbang thob gyur pa de dag la/ /bsod nams 'dod pa'i gang zag la la zhig/ /bskal pa khrag khrig bar du
mchod pa byed/ /gang gis snying rje bskyed nas byang chub tu/ /rgya chen sems ni skyed par byed gyur te/ /sems can la la gang gis byang chub tu/ /sems kyi gtso bo bskyed
pa byas nas kyang / /gom pa bdun ni bor ba'i bsod nams 'di/ /de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin/ /gal te sems can mtha' dag sangs rgyas te/ /
spobs pa mtha' yas ldan pa nyid gyur pa/ /ji ltar sngon gyi 'khor ba'i bskal pa'i bar/ /sems can gcig pus mchod pa byas pa dang / /mkhas pa'i mi ni gang yang rung
ba yis/ /byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed nas kyang / /me tog gcig bu phul ba'i bsod nams 'di/ /de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin/ /bskal pa bye ba
khrag khrig mang por ni/ /bsod nams de yi bshad pa brtsams byas kyang / /bsod nams 'bras bu de yi bshad pa ni/ /nam yang zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des rgyal po gser mdog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ chos gcig dang ldan na/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du theg pa bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur la/ /sdug bsngal ba
dang | yid mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag yod pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni myur du bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa yongs su mi gtong
ba dang / dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs
su mi gtong ba dang / byang chub la 'dun pa brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la brten cing bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / /
chos la gus pa dang / thos pa mang pos chog mi shes pa dang / gzhan dag la chos kyi bgo bsha' byed pa dang / zang zing med par chos ston pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan
dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams mi gtong ba dang / 'dod pa nyung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pa dang / chos mnyan pa la rna ba blags te nyan pa dang / bla ma
la gus pa dang / bzod pa la gnas pa dang / gnod sems kyi tha ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs pa dang / zab mo stong pa nyid kyi chos la mos pa dang / dmigs par lta ba
thams cad rnam par spangs pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi g.yel ba dang / 'du shes
zlog pa dang / bre mo'i gtam rnam par spong ba dang / lus dang / sems dben par gnas pa dang / dgon par gnas pa dang / sems mnyen pa dang / tshul khrims mchog
tu mi 'dzin pa dang / bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / 'gyod pa thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byed pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dge sbyong
gi tshul la rgyun du dga' ba dang / gsong por smra ba dang / bzhin khro gnyer med pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la 'dzud pa dang / chos thams cad
nam mkha' dang 'dra bar rtogs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyan
thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / dmigs par lta ba'i sems tha na rmi lam du'ang yid la mi byed pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod
pa'o| |rgyal po chen po| chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
te| mgo bo dang / rkang lag dang / mig dang / yan lag dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / mdog dang / pags pa dang / lus thams
cad yongs su gtong ba'ang yongs su btang mi dgos par bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar yang 'gyur la/ theg pa bde bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i chos
yongs su btsal ba la yi dam brtan pa yin te/ de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci bskyed kyang rung ste/ de la brtan por gnas shing zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan la theg pa chen
po la shin tu brtan no/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims kyi phung po shin tu yongs su dge pa/ 'phags pa dang / mkhas pas bsngags
pa| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa yongs su zin pa dang ldan pa yin te/ des ni bdag nyid tshul khrims la gnas par rig nas chos kyi dga'
pa nyams su myong ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' ni byams pas gnas pa dang / bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa dang / mi gnas pa'i
bsam gtan pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa yid la byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang
ldan pa'i bde bar gnas pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bde ba'i rnam pa gzhan med do/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' ni ji lta ba bzhin du chos la rtog
pa yin te/ de ni 'di ltar ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rtog ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa 'di dag thams cad ni stong pa ste/ 'di ltar bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/
gang zag gam/ yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa'am/ yongs su btang ba gang yin pa'am/ len pa gang yin pa'am/ bzod par byed pa gang yin pa'am/ gang la bzod
par bya ba'am/ bzod par bya ba gang yin pa'am/ rtsom pa gang yin pa'am/ gang gi phyir rtsom pa'am/ bsam gtan byed pa gang yin pa'am/ bsam gtan du bya ba
gang yin pa'am/ sgom par byed pa gang yin pa'am/ bsgom par bya ba gang yin pa gang yang med do snyam mo/ /de de ltar ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa na 'dus byas kyi chos
thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par rig nas dmigs par lta ba gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med la bde bar yang gnas te/ rgyal po chen po/ chos bzhi po de dag dang
ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bde ba thams cad dang ldan par myur du bal na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar rgyal po gser mdog des bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba'i gos kyi sbyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa de la phul
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad la glo ba rje ba'i slad du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes gsol nas/ de'i tshe tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /bdag ni zhum pa ma mchis sems kyis su/ /mi mchog spyan sngar tshig ni gsol bar bgyi/ /sems can kun la snying rje bskyed nas kyang //
'dren pa sems ni byang chub gzhol bar bgyi/ /bdag la nam yang g.yo sgyu ma mchis te/ /stobs bcu ldan pas bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen/ /yon tan mnga' ba grags
chen 'dra ba ni/ /lha mi gzhan la bdag gis dbang ma mchis/ /bdag ni sdug rnams skyabs dang skyob pa dang / /dpung gnyen gyur te sdug bsngal chos rnams dgrol/ /khyu
mchog bdag nyid bde la gnas nas kyang / /srog chags rnams ni bdag gis de la dgod/ /'dren pa bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos gang dag /de la bdag ni spyad
phyir gnas par bgyi/ /'dren pa ji ltar khyod ni lha mis mchod/ /de ltar bdag kyang mi rnams mchod rten shog /byang chub thams cad mchog ni tshol bgyid cing / /bskal
pa mang por sbyin pa byin par bgyi/ /zas skom gos dang shing rta bzhon pa dang / /gser dngul rin chen du ma'i sbyin pa bgyi/ /'dren pa bdag ni bslab la gus par bgyid/ /
de ni ji bzhin yongs su bsrung bar bgyi/ /nyams par mi bgyid gang la'ang gnas mi bgyid/ /'dren pa bdag ni tshul khrims dag par bgyid/ /sems can kun la snyoms
pa'i bsam pa yis/ /srog chags rnams la byams pa'i sems su bgyi/ /bkur sti bgyis dang bkur stim bgyis la/ /mtho bar 'gyur dang dma' bar 'gyur ma mchis/ /
bskal pa bye ba mang po bsam yas par/ /bdag ni ji srid sngon chad 'khor bar gyur/ /mi dpa' khyod la brten nas de srid du/ /sems can gcig gi phyir yang spro bar bgyi//
lha mi'i 'dren pa bde gshegs gsungs pa yi/ /bsam gtan bde ba de la gnas par bgyi/ /'dren pa bsam gtan bde la reg gnas shing / /rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas su
gnas par bgyi/ /bdag ni stong pa nyid la nges par bgyi/ /lta ba la ni brten par yong mi bgyid/ /dma' ba'i spyod pa rtag tu rnam par spang / /mchog gi spyod pa dri med spyad
par bgyi/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar rgyal po gser mdog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag pa de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /khyim bdag brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang / tshong dpon brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma de dag dang / gzhan
skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams rgyal po gser mdog de'i rjes su slob cing thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar rgyal po gser mdog des bu thu bo rgyal por bcug go /bcug nas kyang bu rnams dang / bu mo rnams dang / chung
ma rnams dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / rgyal phran rnams dang lhan cig tu srog chags bye bas bskor te dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab
tu byung ngo / /de dag de ltar rab tu byung nas lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba spyad do/ /rgyal po gser mdog gis kyang mngon par shes
pa bsgrubs nas mang du thos pa'i mthar phyin par gyur to/ /byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang bsgrubs so/ /de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par
zhugs pa des 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pas sangs rgyas nyi khri mnyes par byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la'ang na bza' dang /
zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ bla mar byas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
cad kyi thad du dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gser mdog tu gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am/
yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
po gser mdog tu gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshangs par gyur pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas gser bzang 'od de la mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur pa gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za na/ rigs kyi bu/
khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par rtse ba khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na tshangs par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin
@#/ |bcom ldan 'das gser bzang 'od la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro byed par spro bar gyur pa gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am/
yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur te/ byang chub tu sems
ma bskyed par mi gnas pa'i sems kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de la bsnyen bkur byas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can ji snyed kyis rgyal po gser mdog
dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag gi nang na tha na sems can gcig kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub las phyir ldog pa ngas ma mthong ste/ de dag thams cad ni shes rab che ba dang / brtson 'grus che ba sha stag ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par
bsgrubs shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu mtshan tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur te 'jig rten du
byung nas thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang nga dang / khyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / 'khor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'dus pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis kyang mthong ngo / /mchod pa byas so/ /bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang bzung ngo / /de nas bcom
ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
de tsam du yun ring du thogs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'ang de tsam du dka' ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe
na| des srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag de snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od
de'i gsung rab la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ma bskyed pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ni de bzhin te/ khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin
du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di ni yun ring du thogs so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
pa'ang dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas mngon par shes pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i
sngon rol dang / de'i 'og tu 'ang sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag la ngas ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas mod kyi/ de srid du ngas bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed de gzhan du na nga 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag de tsam du mdzes shing de tsam
du blta na sdug la/ de tsam du snying du sdug pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam ste/ /de dag la nga'i sdug pa'i sems dang / dga' ba dang / gus pa bskyed par zad de/ ngas bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni sems ma bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bas na rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang / rang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig
'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar mchod pa byas su zin kyang de srid du'ang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu sems mi bskyed de/ gzhan du na phyis gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dus par gyur pa de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
zad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /dang po nga ni don dam gzigs pa dang / /grags pa chen po shes rab pha rol son/ /mi
mchog sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / /bsam yas rnams la gus pas mchod pa byed/ /dang por yon tan 'byung gnas rnams mchod kyang / /bdag ni mkhas pa chos kun
shes pa'i mchog /'jig rten mchod rten sangs rgyas gyur cig ces/ /de srid du yang sems ni skyed mi byed/ /de dag rang rgyal bye ba snyed la yang / /gus pa bskyed nas mchod
pa byed mod kyi/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gyur ces sems ni de srid skyed mi byed/ /gus pa rgya chen yang dag bskyed nas kyang / /dbang du gyur pa bye snyed
mchod mod kyi/ /ye shes rgya mtsho mi mchog 'dra bar ni/ /de srid du yang sems ni skyed mi byed/ /don dam gzigs pa rnams kyi gzugs mthong nas/ /dga' ba'i shugs
ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab/ /mkhas pa mi 'dul rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su/ /gyur ces sems ni de srid skyed mi byed/ /gang tshe de dag bsod nams
rgya chen bsags/ /lus dang yid kyis bden pa bsgoms pa na/ /'dren pa mi rnams mchog tu gyur cig ces/ /byang chub don du sems ni skyed par byed/ /de dag gis
ni bskal pa bye ba snyed/ /bsnyen bkur byas pas bsod nams tshogs bsags nas/ /sems dge ba dang 'jam zhing mnyen pa yis/ /de tshe byang chub tu yang sems
bskyed de/ /bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa/ /des ni bdag kyang thams cad gzigs gyur cig /nam yang bdag gi smon lam nyams ma gyur/ /de dag
de skad smon lam 'jug par 'gyur/ /bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa/ /des ni srog chags thams cad brgal gyur cig /mi dge'i las ni bdag
gis gang byas pa/ /de yi 'bras bu mi zad bdag gis spangs/ /mthu dang brtson 'grus brtan po bskyed nas ni/ /phyi nas byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/ /sems
ni nam yang zhum par ma gyur cig /dga' ba rgya chen bsam yas thob gyur cig /mkhas pa sems la dmigs par mi byed de/ /byang chub mi dmigs bdag nyid
kun mi dmigs/ /chos 'di mtha' dag stong par shes na ni/ /des na byang chub sems ni brjed mi 'gyur/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
byams pa la/ byams pa zhes bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'dis ming 'di ga las rnyed lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa
grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa yun ring po tshad med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig
pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs de btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun por ba na gnas
gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis steng gi bar snang la rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs bzung ngo / /rin po che'i gdugs des kyang stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so/ /der lha rnams kyis kye ma 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra bsgrags
te| des na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan rin chen gdugs rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs de'i gsung rab la dge slong blo gros brtan po zhes bya ba tshong dpon gyi rigs las rab tu byung ba zhig yod de/ rigs kyi bu/
dge slong blo gros brtan po de bsod snyoms par gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs de'i bstan pa la bab pa na dzam+bu'i gling de na grong brgyad
khri bzhi stong yod do/ /grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /grong rdal brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /yul 'khor brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /tshong 'dus brgyad khri bzhi
stong yod do/ /dge slong blo gros brtan po de'ang grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / tshong 'dus de dag thams cad du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu
bar gyur la/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ nam srog chags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la ma bkod kyi bar du bdag gis zan mi bza'o snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar
dge slong blo gros brtan po des de lta bu'i yi dam de bcas nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ tshong 'dus gang dang / gang du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba
de dang / der nam srog chags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la ma bkod kyi bar zan mi za'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dge slong blo gros brtan po des gang gi tshe nyi ma gcig gis srog
chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang / de'i skabs kyang yod do/ /gang gi tshe nyi ma gnyis kyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang / de'i
skabs kyang yod de/ des zan bcad nas nyi ma gsum pa'i tshe zan za'o/ /gang gi tshe nyi ma gsum gyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang / de'i skabs
kyang yod do/ /nyi ma bzhis srog chags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang / de'i skabs kyang yod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe nyi ma lnga dang / drug dang /
bdun gyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang / de'i skabs kyang yod de/ de zhag bdun gyi bar du zan chad kyang sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i
phyir sems yongs su mi skyo ste zhag brgyad pa'i tshe zan za'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ rnam grangs de lta bus dge slong blo gros brtan po des lo brgyad khri bzhi
stong gi bar du yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems kyis grong khyer chen po de dag tu song zhing grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / tshong 'dus de dag tu song
nas sems can de dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ dge slong blo gros brtan po des lo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag 'das nas srog chags skyes pa
dang | bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de 'di
snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can mang po 'di dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod zin gyi/ bdag gis 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
la gzud gor ma chag go snyam ste/ de de dag gi thad du song nas lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /chos kyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /dge
'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod do/ /sems can bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa gang yin pa'i sems can de dag gi nang nas lo
brgyad khri bzhi stong po gzhan 'das nas srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu tshang ba gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rgya chen po la mos pa de dag bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud do/ /lhag ma dman pa la mas pa rkyen gyi mthu dang ldan pa de dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems
bskyed du bcug go /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag theg pa gsum po la mos par byas zin gyi /
bdag gis sems can 'di dag bag yod par gnas par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzud pa bstan to snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po des yang
lo nyi khri chig stong gi bar du srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i lung phog go /rigs kyi bu/ dge slong blo gros
brtan po des srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug po'i sems can de dag thams cad ci nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur gdams
ngag bstan cing / de lta de lta bur rjes su ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de gang gi tshe grong du 'gro ba de'i tshe byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te 'gro'o/ /de byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ tshong
'dus su bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ste/ de 'gro ba na sems can byams pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad dge slong blo gros brtan po de'i rkang pa sgo'i them
pa la bzhag pa'i tshe byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la yid ches pa dang / stong pa
nyid la mos pa'i khyad par la ltos/ de'i phyir dge slong blo gros brtan po'i rkang pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag pa'i tshe sems can de dag thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
ji ltar btsud pa bzhin du byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe dge slong blo gros brtan po de'i byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul
pa de lta bu mthong nas sa bla ba'i lha rnams kyis/ a la la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar 'di grong dang / grong khyer dang /
grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / tshong 'dus su 'gro ba na sems can rnams byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes sgra sgrogs shing skad 'byin
par byed do/ /sa bla ba'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas bar snang gi lha rnams kyis sgra bsgrags shing skad phyung ngo / /de dag gis sgra thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi bar
du gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos nas/ a la la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar 'di grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /
yul 'khor dang / tshong 'dus su song ba na sems can rnams byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i phyir ro zhes sgra bsgrags shing skad phyung ngo / /de'i ming de la'ang
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs des rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/ 'di skad du/ byang chub sems
dpa' dge slong blo gros brtan po 'di ni srid par 'gro ba'i 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te mngon
par grags par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub thob pa'i tshe'ang 'di'i ming de nyid du 'gyur te 'jig rten du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang / rin po che bkod pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing gi bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'dus pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong blo gros brtan po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du
khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za bar srid de/ de tshun chad tshe rabs thams cad du ming / 'di lta ste/ byams pa zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig tu gyur to/ /byang chub
thob pa'i tshe'ang 'di'i ming / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya ba de kho nar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ rgyu
ni de yin no/ /rkyen ni de yin te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la byams pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sngon byung ba 'di bshad ma thag pa de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /steng gi bar
snang la'ang lha'i glu dbyangs grag go /me tog gi char yang bab bo/ /de nas de'i tshe rgyal bo chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
dang | gzhan yang / lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dag khyer nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ga la ba der gtor to/ /tshig
'di skad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang sems can bye ba khrag
khrig 'bum phrag de snyed kyi don byas pa'i phyir ro/ /sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ming tsam thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa'i mchog
legs par rnyed pa yin/ sha'i mig gis mngon sum du mthong nas dga' ba thob pa de dag lta ci smos/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po byams pa la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag pa de'i mod la skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang bcas/ lha dang / mi
dang | lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis tshig mthun par/ tshigs 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na srog chags khri nyis
stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /srog
chags stong phrag du ma ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur te/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i 'khor
'dus pa gnyis pa la dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las
langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming byams pa'i dang po sems
bskyed pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse bas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs
shig| de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba zhes bya bar zungs shig /kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs
'di gzung ba'i phyir dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir khyod la gtad do/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul ba bas ni gang gis byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i dang po 'jug pa 'di thos nas sems kyi rgyud byang chub tu gzhol ba dang / byang chub tu smon pas mos par byed dam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ kun chub
par byed dam/ sgom mam/ gzhan dag la rgyas par yang dag par ston par byed na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /mi lus 'thob pa rnyed par dka'/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rnyed par dka'/ /sangs rgyas dad pa rnyed par dka'/ /byang chub sems
kyang rnyed par dka'/ /gnas skabs bzhi po 'di dag ni/ /bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ste/ /de phyir thob nas ma spangs shig /mthu rtsal dag kyang chud ma
gzan/ /mi lus thob pa rnyed pa dang / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed pa dang / /sangs rgyas dad pa'ang rnyed pa dang / /byang chub sems ni bskyed gyur na/ /de phyir brtson 'grus bskyed
nas kyang / /rtag tu bag ni yod par gyis/ /drang srong chen po de dag gis/ /bag yod pas ni byang chub brnyes/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /rtsa ba'i sgo dang tshul gyi
lam| |bag yod pa dang brtson 'grus yin/ /mkhas pa rnams kyang 'di la slobs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs
te| bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi
mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang / dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
rgya'i skad du/ kwan ji li'u phus zhang sh+yan te'u shis th+yan kyin/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnam du skye ba blangs pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas
dang | byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi yul/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon
med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das mtshan mo'i thun dang po la sku las 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu byung nas rgyal byed kyi tshal lan bdun bskor te/ khyim bdag su ta shal sogs pa 'od kyis reg
par byas nas/ 'od gser gyi kha dog lta bu nam mkha' la sprin bzhin du khyab par byas nas mnyan du yod pa'i yul kun tu gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i me tog char rab tu phab bo/ /'od
gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i nang nas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa brgya stong snang ba thams cad kyis gsung mthun par bskal pa 'di nyid du/ byang chub sems dpa'
stong gi dang po log par dad sel sangs rgyas pa nas/ tha mar snang mdzad sangs rgyas pa'i don bka' stsal to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya ting nge
'dzin las langs nas 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 'khor
nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / ma ha ba sha pa ti la sogs pa dge slong ma stong dang / khyim bdag su ta sha la sogs pa dge bsnyen pha
sum stong dang / byi shwa khra 'pho ta la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma nyis stong dang / kun tu bzang po la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dang / chos kyi rgyal
bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa 'khor thams cad/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis bskul nas sprin bzhin du 'dus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po las 'od zer stong phyung nas/ 'od zer re re kha dog
stong stong / kha dog re re'i nang nas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa snyeng snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung mthun par byang chub
sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa zab mo'i gzungs bstan pa 'di lta ste/ a nan ta mu dra zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes
zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / sgrib pa med pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / mtshan ma med par rnam par grol ba chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs la sogs pa/ sgra skad gcig gis
brgya phrag bye ba'i gzungs kyi sgo bka' stsal to/ /gzungs kyi sgo bka' stsal ma thag tu 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas/ de ma thag tu bye ba brgya phrag khri'i gzungs kyi sgo thob nas/ stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
'khod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa u pA li stan las langs te/ gdong dang / spyi bos phyag btsal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis sngon du'ang mdzod kyi chos thams cad las/ ma pham pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas par gsung na/ ma pham pa so so'i skye bo'i lus dang ma bral/ zag pa'ang
ma zad/ ma pham pa 'di nyid du rab tu byung yang / ting nge 'dzin mi bsgom/ nyon mongs pa ma spangs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par sangs rgyas par bka' stsal na/ ma pham pa
de tshe'i dus byas nas khams gang du skye ba len par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis u pA li la bka' stsal pa/ u pA li/ gcig tu gyis la nyon cig /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad mkhyen pas 'khor 'di'i nang du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas par 'gyur bar lung bstan gyi/ dus 'di nas lo bcu gnyis kyi 'og tu tshe'i dus byas nas/ nges par dga' ldan gyi gnam du skye ba len par 'gyur
ro| |de nas dga' ldan gyi gnam gyi steng na/ lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga brgya yod pa/ lha'i bu re res kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyod pas/ skye ba gcig gis
thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i don du/ lha'i bsod nams kyi mthus gzhal med khang byas te/ rang rang gi lus kyi gos dang / tsan+da na dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan
phud de/ pus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ /bdag gi rin thang med pa'i rin po che dang / lha'i dbu rgyan gyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po la
mchod pa'i don du/ ma pham pa 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus su ring po mi thogs par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas/ bdag cag gi rin po
che'i dbu rgyan 'di/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas su gyur cig ces lha'i bu thams cad rang rang pus mo btsugs te/ smon lam de
skad ces btab pa dang / de nas lha thams cad kyis smon lam btab ma thag tu/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan thams cad bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga brgya'i gzhal med khang du gyur te/ rin po che'i
gzhal med khang re re la'ang skyed mos tshal bdun bdun/ skyed mos tshal re re 'ang rin po che sna bdun bdun las grub pa/ rin po che re re las kyang bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i 'od kyi
'od zer re re las bye ba phrag brgya'i pad ma/ pad ma re re las bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi phreng ba/ shing re re'i lo ma las bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i
kha dog /rin po che'i kha dog re re las kyang bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i 'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od/ 'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od re re'i nang nas kyang bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i lha'i bu
mo| lha'i bu mo re re'ang shing gi drung na 'dug nas/ lag na bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che grangs med pa'i do shal thogs/ ngo mtshar che ba'i glu dbyangs snyan pa len/ glu dbyangs
snyan pa'i nang nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i chos kyi 'khor lo spyod/ shing de dag las 'bras bu skyes pa'i kha dog bai DUR+ya bzhin du 'dug /kha dog de dag thams cad bai DUR+ya'i nang
du 'dug pa/ 'od zer de dag thams cad g.yas phyogs su 'khor ba/ sgra snyan pa sna tshogs 'byung ba/ sgra thams cad las byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i chos 'chad
pa| re re'i pho brang mtho khyad ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa gnyis/ rngams su dpag tshad bcu bzhi/ klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag lnga brgyas ni pho brang bskor/
klu'i rgyal po re re'ang bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi char phab pas pho brang gi steng brgyan/ rang bzhin rlung byung bas shing de dag bskyod pa dang / shing de las
mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sgra byung bar gyur to/ /de nas pho brang de'i nang na rgyal po chen po le'u
du ba ti zhes bya ba/ stan la 'dug pa las langs te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag btsal nas/ smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/ /bdag
gi bsod nams kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i chos kyi pho brang byed pa'i bsod nams dang ldan na/ bdag gi smin mtshams par nas nor bu rin po che rang
byung bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / de ma thag tu bye ba phrag brgya'i rin po che byung nas/ rin po che bai DUR+ya la sogs pa'i kha dog thams cad rdzogs par grub pa/
shel gyi kha dog bzhin phyi nang gsal ba/ rin po che de dag nam mkha' stong pa la 'khor zhing / ngo mtshar che ba'i rin po che'i pho brang rim pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sprul par gyur
to| |re re'i lan zhun re re las kyang bye ba 'bum phrag gi rin po che pad ma 'dis spras pa la grub pa/ lan zhun gyi bar thams cad na rdzus te skyes pa'i lha'i bu bye ba phrag dgu dang /
lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag lnga brgya la/ lha'i bu re re'i lag nas rin po che sna bdun bdun las grub pa'i pad+ma dpag tu med pa bye ba phrag bcu/ pad+ma re re'i steng du 'od bye ba phrag
dpag tu med pa/ 'od de dag gi nang na lha'i rol mo'i cha spyad ma dkrol bar sgra rang byung ba/ sgra de dag byung ba dang / bu mo thams cad langs nas rol mo'i cha spyad thogs te gar
dang | glu dbyangs snyan pa len pa'i sgra las dge ba bcu dang / smon lam bzhi la sogs pa'i sgra lha thams cad kyis thos pas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de

nas skyed mos tshal thams cad kyi nang na skyed mos tshal kha dog brgyad kyi bai DUR+ya'i rdzing bu/ rdzing bu re re'i nang na bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che las grub pa/ rdzing bu re re'i nang na
yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ chu de dag kyang gyen du 'bab pa/ sgo bzhi'i phyi rol na rdzus te skyes pa'i pad+ma bzhi/ pad+ma de dag las chu byung ba rin po che'i pad+ma'i
kha dog bzhin du 'bab pa/ pad+ma re re'i steng du lha'i bu mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi bzhi/ lus kyi kha dog ngo mtshar che ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhin du brgyan pa/ lus mtshan dang ldan pa
lag na rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi snod bye ba phrag lnga brgya sprul/ snod re re'i nang na lha'i bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin thams cad kyis gang ba phrag pa g.yon
la thogs pa/ do shal dpag tu med pa phrag pa g.yas la thogs pa/ rol mo'i cha byad dpag tu med pa sprin bzhin du nam mkha' la 'dug pa/ chu las byung ba/ byang chub sems
dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod pa/ dga' ldan gyi gnam du skyes pa'i lha'i bu gang la la zhig rang bzhin gyis lha'i bu mo rnams kyis g.yog byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun
gyi seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi yod pa/ 'dzam bu'i gser dang / rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa/ zur bzhi la 'dug pa/ pad+ma bzhi las skyes pa/ pad+ma re re
la'ang rin po che phrag brgya las grub pa/ rin po che re re la'ang bye ba phrag brgya'i 'od zer/ 'od zer de dag las ngo mtshar che ba sprul pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sprul
pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i yol ba bres pa de'i phyogs na tshangs pa'i rgyal po bye ba phrag stong gis rang rang gi tshangs pa'i lha'i ngo mtshar che ba'i dril bu khyer nas yol ba'i steng
du dbyangs pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chung dus kyang rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dra bas yol ba'i steng du bres pa/ de nas lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i 'khor
gyis rin po che'i me tog pad+ma thams cad khyer nas khri'i steng du bdal ba/ pad+ma de dag thams cad rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bu mo bye ba phrag lnga brgya byung ba de dag gi lag na rnga yab
dkar po thogs pa/ yol ba'i nang na 'dug pa/ pho brang zur bzhi la rin po che'i ka ba bzhi yod pa/ rin po che'i ka ba re re la'ang brgya phrag stong gi khang pa brtsegs pa/ bu mo 'di'i nor
bu ni bres/ lan kan bar kun tu lha'i bu mo brgya stong yod/ kha dog ngo mtshar che ba dpag tu med pa'i rol mo'i cha spyad lag na thogs pa/ rol mo'i sgra'i nang nas sdug bsngal ba
dang | stong pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sgra 'byung ba / lha'i pho brang de dag nas rin po che'i kha dog dpag tu med pa bye ba phrag brgya
yod pa/ bu mo re re kun kyang rin po che'i kha dog dang mthun par sprul to/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i lha dpag tu med pa thams cad dga' ldan gyi lha'i pho brang du skye ba len par smon
lam btab bo/ /de nas dga' ldan gyi pho brang na rgyal po chen po lnga po la rgyal po chen po dang po ni/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lus la rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs
pas pho brang gi nang du 'thor ba/ rin po che'i nor bu re re'ang rol mo'i cha spyad dpag tu med par sprul pa/ nam mkha' la kun tu 'phyang ba/ ma brdungs par sgra snyan pa dpag tu
med pa rang 'byung ba/ sems can gyi yid rtog pa/ rgyal po gnyis pa me tog 'thor ba zhes bya ba lus la me tog sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/ pho brang
thams cad khyab par me tog gi gdugs sprul/ gdugs re re'ang brgya phrag stong gi rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan gyis lam drangs pa/ rgyal po gsum pa ni/ spos kyi dbyangs zhes bya
ba lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu'i nang nas ngo mtshar che ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi tsan+dan gyi spos kyi char 'bebs pa/ spos de dag sprin bzhin du chags pa/ kha dog brgya phrag gis
pho brang lan bdun du bskor ba/ rgyal po chen po bzhi pa/ dga' ba bde ba zhes bya ba lus la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i char 'bebs pa/ rin po che re re'ang rang bzhin gyis rgyal
mtshan dang / 'phan gyi steng du 'dug nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar 'chad pa dang / yan lag lnga'i tshul khrims kyi
sgra dang / dge ba'i chos dpag tu med pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / byams pa byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra la 'dzud pa/ rgyal po chen po lnga pa/ sgra dbyangs drag po
zhes bya ba lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas chu 'bebs pa/ chu re re'i steng du me tog pad+ma bye ba phrag lnga brgya yod pa/ pad+ma re re'i steng du shel gyi bu mo nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga/
shel gyi bu mo re re'i lus thams cad kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re'i nang nas lha'i bdud las rgyal ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byung ba sprul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis u pA li la bka' stsal pa/
dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas zhes bya bar dge ba bcu dang / rgyal ba la drin bsab pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba bskyed pa'i bsod nams ni ngas bskal pa chung du gcig gi bar du 'dug
nas skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' drin bsab pa dang / dge ba bcu'i 'bras bu bshad kyang rdzogs pa'i mtha' med de/ 'dir ngas khyed la sogs pa la mdo
tsam zhig bshad cing bstan par bya'o/ /u pA li/ dge slong ngam/ 'khor thams cad kyang rung ste gang la la zhig skye shi la mi skyo bar lha'i gnas su skye bar 'dod na/ bla na med
pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa byams pa'i zhabs 'bring byed 'dod par lta ba ni/ yan lag lnga'i khrims brgyad rdzogs pa/ lus sems kyi brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa/
dge ba bcu'i chos la spyod pa/ bde skyid phun sum tshogs par 'dod pa/ sems rtse gcig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye bar 'dod pa de dag ni yang dag par lta ba zhes bya ste/
gzhan du lta ba ni log par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas u pA li stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas gdong dang / spyi bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dga' ldan gyi gnam du de lta bu'i bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa der skyes bu chen po 'di dus ci tsam du 'dzam
bu'i gling nas lha'i gnas de lta bur skye par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus 'di nas lo bcu gnyis lon nas dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes bco lnga'i nyi ma la
yul bar ni kra ba li'i grong khyer na bram ze chen po pa pa li zhes bya ba'i khyim nas skye ba blangs pa'i sa nas skyil mo krung bcas nas ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa bzhin du
lus gser gyi kha dog dang / 'od zer dmar po nyi ma brgya stong bas lhag /steng gi dga' ldan gyi gnam du lus kyi sku gdung yang / dper na/ gser gyi gzugs bzhin du mi g.yo
mi 'gul bar lus kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang nas rnam pa thar pa gsum dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yi ge gsal bar ston te/ de nas lha mi thams
cad rjes su 'brang nas/ rin po che sku gdung gyi mchod rten la mchod nas/ de nas dga' ldan gyi gnam du rin po che sna bdun gyi pho brang na 'di gzhal med khang seng ge'i
pad+ma'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas nas lus 'dzam bu gser gyi kha dog bzhin du rdzus te skyes nas/ sku tshur dpag tshad bcu drug /mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis/ dpe byad
bzang po brgyad cus rdzogs par brgyan pa/ dpu'i thor tsugs dang ldan/ dbu skra bai DUR+ya'i kha dog dang 'dra ba/ shi kra bi li kra dang / ma 'di dang / gyen shugs kyi rin po che sa lha'i dbu rgyan

brgyan pa/ rin po che lha'i dbu brgyan de dag la bye ba phrag brgya'i rin po che'i kha dog re re'i nang nas/ sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa brgya stong phrag khri'i sprul pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' mang pos zhabs 'bring byas pa/ de nas zhing khams gzhan gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad cho 'phrul bco brgyad ston cing / lha'i dbu rgyan gyi nang na yid la smon
pa'i rjes su mthun par lha'i dbu rgyan gyi nang na gnas so/ /byams pa'i smin mtshams nas 'od zer dkar po byung ste 'od zer de dag las brgyan phrag gi rin po che'i kha dog dang /
ldan pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis/ mtshan re re'i nang nas bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i kha dog dpe byad bzang po/ dpe byad re re la'ang bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i
mtshan dang / dpe byad kyi kha dog 'bar ba'i lha'i bu re re'i 'od zer brgyad khri bzhi stong gi sprin thams cad pad+ma las rang rang 'dug nas/ nyin mtshan rtag par phyir mi ldog
pa'i sa'i chos kyi 'khor lo spyod pa/ bgrod pa gcig cing don grub par byed pa phrag lnga brgya'i lha'i bu de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
'di dag tu/ dga' ldan gyi gnam du nyin mtshan rtag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la lha'i bu thams cad 'khod pa/ 'dzam bu'i
gling gi tshe lo'i grangs bye ba 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa drug lon nas byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnam nas 'dzam bu'i gling du skye ba blangs pa'i mdo bshad par 'gyur ro/ /u
pA li/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling nas tshe 'phos nas dga' ldan gnam du skyes pa'i yon tan ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan
las 'das nas de'i 'khor nye gnas las gang la la zhig brtson 'grus su bsod nams bsags pa/ sdom pa ma zhig cing mchod rten la phyag ba dar dang / maN+Dal byed pa
dang | spos dri zhim pa dang / me tog gi mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa gsum la spyod cing / zab cing drang ba'i chos la spyod pa dang / mdo sde klog cing / sems rtse gcig tu rgyun
mi 'chad par yid la zlos pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang / byams pa'i mtshan brjod pa de lta bu la
sogs pa'i mi de dag ni 'di skad cig tsam du khrims brgyad mnos nas sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed cing / smon lam btab nas tshe'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu/ dper na/
skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brgyang ba tsam du dga' ldan du skyes nas pad+ma'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas nas/ brgya phrag stong gi lha'i bus lha'i rol mo byed cing me
tog man+dAr ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po 'thor zhing legs so/ /legs so/ /zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni 'dzam bu'i gling du bsod nams rgya chen po bsags
nas| 'chi 'pho ba'i 'og tu 'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas zhes bya ba yin te/ 'dir lha'i rgyal po byams pa zhes bya ba la/ khyod skyabs su gsol/ phyag 'tshol cig dang / phyag
'tshal na smin mtshams kyi mdzod sku nas 'od zer dkar pos reg par byas nas/ bskal pa dgu bcu'i skye shi las grol zhing sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa'i rjes su mthun pa'i yon tan gyis ngo mtshar chos bshad nas/ brtson pa mi 'dor ba phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / bla na med pa'i lam yid la sems pa de lta bu la
sogs pa'i sems can sdig pa thams cad byang zhing chos drug la spyod na the tshom med par nges par dga' ldan gyi gnam du skyes nas/ 'phags pa byams pa'i zhal mthong / byams
pa'i zhabs 'bring nas 'dzam bu'i gling du dang por chos thos nas ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa 'di nyid kyi sangs rgyas dang / bskal pa skar ma lta bu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'ang
zhal mthong nas sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi drung du byang chub tu lung ston pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /u pA li/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las
'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
la sogs pa 'khor thams cad las gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i mtshan thos nas dga' ba dang / gus par phyag 'tshal ba'i
mi de dag tshe'i dus byas nas se gol gtogs pa tsam du gong ma ci lta ba bzhin du/ byams pa'i mtshan thos nas tshe'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu mun pa'i khams su mi ltung /
mtha' 'khob kyi yul dang / log par lta ba dang / mi dge ba thams cad spyod par mi skye/ skye ba thams cad du drang por lta ba dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dkon
mchog gsum la mi smod par skye'o/ /u pA li/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ sdom pa bshig pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas pas byang
chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po'i mtshan thos pas mtshan nas brjod cing / yan lag lnga gtugs te/ sems rtse gcig tu bshags na sdig pa thams cad myur du
byang nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po'i mtshan brjod pa dang / sku gzugs bris nas spos dang / me tog dang / gos
dang | gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phyag btsal zhing yid la zlos na mi de dag tshe'i dus byas pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ mi chen po'i
mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od dang / lha'i bu thams cad kyis man+dA ra ba'i char phab nas mi de dag bsdus nas skad cig yud tsam gyis lha'i gnas su skyes/ /'phags
pa byams pa'i zhal mthong nas gdong dang / spyi bos phyag btsal nas de ma thag tu chos thos pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi la mthob pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / /
ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /u pA li/ khyod rtse gcig tu nyon la yid la gyis shig /
byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba la ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad skyabs su 'gro ba na gang la la zhig skyabs su 'gro ba'i mi de dag ni bla na med pa'i lam
dang | phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'thob nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i dus kyi tshe/
mi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer mthong nas lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /u pA li/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og
tu 'khor bzhi po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa gang la la zhig dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa'i dus kyi tshe/ 'di ltar blta bar bya ste/ dga' ldan yid
la byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdom pa blangs nas/ nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma bdun gyi bar du/ dge ba bcu yid la byed pa dang / dge ba bcu'i lam la spyod pa'i bsod
nams de dag byams pa'i mdun du bsngo zhing smon lam btab pa de dag ni lta ba de dag gi lha'i bu mthong ba dang / pad+ma mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig skad cig tsam
byams pa'i ming nas brjod pa'i mi de dag ni/ bskal pa stong nyis brgya'i skye shi las grol zhing sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa'i mtshan thos pas thal mo sbyar
ba'i mi de dag ni/ bskal pa lnga bcu'i skye shi las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig byams pa la gus par phyag btsal bas bskal pa bye ba brgya'i skye shi las grol /
thar zhing sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gnas la mi chags shing ma 'ongs pa'i dus su klu'i sdong po byang chub kyi shing drung du bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam du sems
bskyed pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor mang po dpag tu med pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas
byams pa'i zhabs la'ang phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das dang / byams pa la la na brgya stong du bskor nas lam mthob par dag rang rang gi smon lam btab pa/ bdag
cag la sogs pas lha dang / mi dang / sde brgyad po 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mos pas smon lam btab pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su lus spangs nas/ 'phags pa
byams pa'i zhal mthong ba dang / thams cad dga' ldan gyi gnam du skye ba thob par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod la sogs pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus su
bsod nams byed pa dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / thams cad byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i drung du skye ba blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas phyin gyis
rlob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis u pA li la bka' stsal pa/ u pA li/ de lta bur lta ba ni yang dag par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan du lta ba ni log par lta ba zhes
bya'o| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan la 'dug pa las langs te pus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /legs
so| |bcom ldan 'das/ byams pa'i yon tan legs par bshad do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe bsod nams byed pa'i sems can 'bras
bu thob pa bdag cag gis thob par 'tshal bas/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mtshan ci lags/ bdag cag gis ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma brjed par gzung la ma 'ongs pa'i don du lha'i gnas su skye
pa'i lam 'byed pa dang / byang chub kyi mtshan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi gcod pas mdo sde'i ming / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mya ngan las 'das pa
zhes kyang bya/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnam du skye ba blangs nas byang chub kyi snying po la bskul ba zhes bya bar zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
skad ces bka' stsal nas/ zhing khams gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu bzhi'i le'u brgyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /lha'i bu 'bum
phrag brgyad kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas thams cad kyis byams pa'i rjes su 'brang nas 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar smon lam btab bo/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'khor bzhi po dang / lha dang / klu la sogs pa sde brgyad po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/ thams cad mngon par dga' ste/
bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas phyir dong ngo / /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnam du skye ba blangs pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //zhu ba'i
lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ba btong dang / ban+de shes rab seng+ges rgya'i dpe las bsgyur// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya lo kA nu sa mA nA a ba tA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ thub pa'i rgyal po ril bzhugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de nas mkhas pa
'jam dbyangs kyis/ /btud de rgyal la 'di skad gsol/ /slad ma'i skye bo rnams slad du/ /dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'byung / /
zab cing rgya che phun sum tshogs/ /mdo sde dam pa blo rab kyi/ /smra ba'i mchog gis bshad du gsol/ /'jig rten mgon po'i thugs skyes sras/ /gces 'dzin mchog la
bka' stsal pa/ /rtse gcig sems su yid byos la/ /nyon cig ngas ni bshad par bya/ /blo dang ldan pas yon tan zhus/ /de bzhin gshegs
pas bka' stsal pa/ /chos smra sems can mchog rnams kyis/ /chos nyid de ni mnyan par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dpag med las/ /rang sangs rgyas ni thams
cad dang / /nyan thos dag gis rnam kun tu/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsags pa na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spros med la/ /byis pa spros pa spyod pa yi/ /sems can
kun gyis rgyal ba rnams/ /rig par mi nus smos ci dgos/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni sangs rgyas dang / /sangs rgyas chos nyid gang yin dang / /rang byung sku thugs ci 'dra dang / /
shes rab ci 'dra rab tu mkhyen/ /'jig rten du ni 'jig rten sgron/ /rnam par 'dren pa rnams byung yang / /'jig rten dang ni 'dres med la/ /'jig rten du yang snang ba
ston| |sku dang sku yi phrin las dang / /gsung gis gang dag brjod pa dang / /yid dang yid kyi rnam rtog rnams/ /rgyal ba'i thams cad 'jig rten 'das/ /'jig rten na ni
thugs brtse bas/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /'jig rten ji ltar rtog pa bzhin/ /sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod rnams
kyis| |sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'phags/ /de dag phrin las 'jig rten 'das/ /rnam par smin pa bla na med/ /gal te 'jig rten rnam 'dren rnams/ /'jig rten
mthun par mi 'jug na/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid gang yin dang / /sangs rgyas sus kyang shes mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun la phan bzhed pa/ /skyob pa rdzu 'phrul ldan pa po/ /rang
byung sdig pa mi mnga' ba/ /de dag g.yo ba bsam mi khyab/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku/ /'khrig pa las ni byung min la/ /yab dang yum yang ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig
rten mthun 'jug yin/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med nas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin las byung / /'on kyang byis pa nyid ston pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /sangs
rgyas 'od ni dpag med de/ /phyogs bcu dag tu snang mdzad kyang / /'dom gang 'od du ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /mi yi dam pa nam du yang / /zhabs
gnyis sa la mi reg ste/ /'on kyang lam srang de ston pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /'dod pa de dag rnams smad de/ /'dod pa'i rdzab las yang dag 'phags/ /'on
kyang sras la sogs ston pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /mar me mdzad nas bzung nas su/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags bral/ /sgra gcan 'dzin la sras
zhes gsungs/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /lha dang 'jig rten bcas pa yi/ /nga ni mchog ces bka' stsal pa/ /phyin nas chos ni
tshol mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /thub chen 'dzam shing grib ma la/ /bzhugs te bsam gtan mdzad bstan dang / /lo drug par du dka' spyod pa/ /'di
ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /gnyis su med par zhing 'di na/ /byang chub snying por bzhugs nas ni/ /bdud 'dul rnam par ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun
'jug yin/ /byang chub mtshungs med sangs rgyas te/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten ston yin yang // thugs las chung ngu nyid ston pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin//
dpa' bo thugs rje che ldan pa/ /bstan pa'i phyir ni 'dir gshegs la/ /gsol ba 'debs la gzhes mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rang byung rnams
kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /phyir zhing 'jug pa mi mnga' yang / /de dag dran pa ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ni/ /byon
dang bzhud pa mi mnga' yang / /'on kyang bzhud par rnam snang ba/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rgyal ba rnams ni mkha' 'dra ste/ /chos rnams kun la mi gnas
kyang | |ldang ba ltar yang snang ba ni/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /zhabs ni pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra ste/ /de dag rdul gyis mi gos la/ /zhabs kyang 'khru ba mdzad pa ni/ /
'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /de dag dri ma mi mnga' ste/ /sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra yang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khrus mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug
yin| |zhal ni pad+ma'i dri ldan zhing / /tshems ni dri med mu tig 'dra/ /'on kyang tshems shing gsol mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /de dag bsgrim pa mi mnga'
yang | |de dag zhal zas gsol mdzad cing // sbyin pa po la 'bras bu tshe/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /sku mkhregs rdo rje 'dra ba'i phyir/ /zag pa dag ni mi mnga' yang //
bshang ba'i sar ni gshegs mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /de dag snyun ni mi mnga' yang / /dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad pa'i phyir/ /sman kyang bsten par
mdzad pa ni/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /sangs rgyas yon tan kun ldan te/ /sku la 'gyur ba mi mnga' yang / /de dag rga ba ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten
mthun 'jug yin/ /'jig rten khams ni dpag tu med/ /zhabs kyi mthe bos g.yo mdzad la/ /'on kyang nyam chung ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /
yid kyi sku dang rab ldan pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos sku yang / /rang can sku ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /
sangs rgyas rnam rtog mi mnga' yang / /sems can spyod yul ji bzhin du/ /de dag spyod pa rnam par rtog /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /de dag rtag tu mnyam
bzhag la/ /'greng dang bzhugs dang bzhud pa dang / /de bzhin mnal bar snang ba yang / /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub dka'
la| |grang dang tsha dang grib ma dang / /de bzhin nyi ma ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /tshangs pa'i khyim na tshangs pa ltar/ /rgyal ba rtag
par na bza' gsol/ /'on kyang na bza' legs mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /spyi gtsug ltar ni mi mthong phyir/ /spu gris gcad du mong med
kyang | |dbu 'dreg par ni ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rab bsgoms te/ /de dag rdzu 'phrul nam ston la/ /bsam
gtan mdzad pa snang ba yang / /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa kun/ /ro bro mchog rnams brnyes gyur kyang // ngan ngon dag ni
bsten mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /bsod nams mi zad thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'phags/ /'on kyang ma brnyes ston mdzad
pa| |'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /dga' ba'i zas ni mngon bsgrubs te/ /bskal pa bye ba bzhugs mdzad kyang / /rtag tu zhal zas gsol mdzad pa/ /'di ni
'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /bsod nams pha rol phyin pas 'phags/ /lha yin bza' brnyes gyur kyang / /phyag dar khrod pa gsol mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun
'jug yin/ /'og min gzhal med khang pa rnams/ /rnam 'dren rnams kyis yongs spangs te/ /rtswa khyim rnams ni bsten mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug
yin| |'dren pa rnams ni zhal dbugs kyis/ /rgya mtsho chen po bskams mdzad kyang / /char pa'i skyabs kyang rab 'dzin pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /bdud
rnams bye ba dpag med pa/ /thugs bskyed tsam gyis 'dul mdzad kyang / /bdud kyi bgegs rnams ston mdzad pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ /nga dang nga zhes lta
